name: A. L.
text: I have never felt so unwelcome at a business.  I got a new Rx yesterday and stopped by to check out their frame selection.  They had a sign on the door with their phone number stating that only one person at a time was allowed inside.  I called and was told that they were finishing up with a customer and then I could come in, so I waited on the sidewalk.  The employee, Beth,  held the door for the other customer to leave but stopped me before I could go in to tell me that they would be closing soon.  I asked when and she said at noon.  I pulled out my phone and it was 11:41. She kept repeating that they would be closing soon, wanting to make sure I knew that I had to be out by then. After hearing this several times, I gave up and left having never stepped foot inside. I found another place in town that was way more friendly and welcoming.  Fortunately, it wasn't hard to do.

name: Janice Cagle
text: Very professional staff and Dr. Griggs is wonderful! I also selected eyeglasses with the help of a very friendly and knowledgeable employee. They took very good care of me!

name: Heather Wilson
text: Do not do not buy anything or make an appointment at Jody’s Optical. Rude and unprofessional. This was the worst experience ever.

name: Rebekka Sharpe
text:
SLOW.
Everyone is nice, but nothing gets done in a timely manner.They are fine if you are willing wait at least a week for an appointment and another week or longer to actually get your glasses. If you actually need glasses go somewhere else.

**Apparently they are capable of making some glasses within a day however they are not upfront with you if they don't have your lenses in stock and it may take a few days or a week so ask them before you pay, or even before you pick frames.

And no matter what if you get transitions lenses it will take a week. (Also something they should tell you upfront)

name: KELI SPARKS
text:
Understand Dr. Griggs is the attending Optometrist, as well as the new owner, 2018.  We've received comprehensive eye exams, eye care tips and advice in a professional manner, in a clean, well-lit office.

He has a nice selection of frames, and his staff will order lenses, contacts, and work with your glasses until they are comfortable.  The staff is always pleasant, helpful, kind, and professional.

They've reviewed our vision benefits with us.  Twice staff has  confirmed vision benefits via phone calls.  Not everyone does that.

Kudos to the staff for double-checking, and finding TWO lens issues on a pair of glasses made by A DIFFERENT company, not - not - made at Jody's Vision.  After having fuzzy vision issues with lenses from a different company, I had to have the right lens re-done, and then the left lens re-done.  Axis was off 10%, then 5%.  This issue is almost resolved.  I will definitely bring my glasses back to Jody's Vision to check my lenses the third time!

Thank you, staff, for all the help!

name: John Pierson
text: Dr. Griggs was very through and explained all that he was doing and his findings.  His staff was friendly and professional.  I'd recommend them to any one.

name: david reynolds
text: Absolutely love Dr. Griggs and his staff. So glad he purchased the practice. They do an excellent job making my glasses. Wouldn't trust nobody but him and his staff with my eyes.

name: Kimberley Scott
text: The staff and Dr. Griggs are all very welcoming and enjoyable to deal with. Dr. Griggs was intentional about explaining his thoughts on various questions I had. Great experience overall. I switched to them after seeing how they dealt with my son’s appt.

name: K McIntyre
text: Dr Scott diagnosed me with a hereditary eye disease after 2 other eye doctors missed it.

text: My visit was wonderful. Dr. Collins and her staff were kind, professional, thorough, and knowledgeable. Considering the pandemic we are in, all protocol was followed to keep everyone safe. The chairs and other equipment was wiped down between each patient. And every one wore safety mask. Overall the visit was pleasant I look forward to my next eye exam to come in the future.

I have my husband going to see her as well for his exams.  I would recommend her to anyone.

text: Love Dr J!! Recommend her all the time to friends and family

name: Pamela Hastings
text: I made an appointment online. It was the last available and needed my son to see an eye doctor quickly as he is home from college for a very short time and his glasses broke. This was the only place in an 80 mile radius that had availability on a Saturday. We drove over an hour to make his appointment on time only to be told it had been cancelled. No message, phone call, voicemail or email was made or sent. I even checked for an email or voice-mail before we left to make the hour plus drive. NOTHING! Just the confirmation email for his appointment. All they would have needed to do was send me a message and cancel but they couldn't even do that. Very disrespect and inconsiderate of other peoples time.

name: Scott Dennis
text: Office is well run.   Very little waiting ( very appreciated).    Dr. Collins appears very knowledgeable and explained things to me that had not explained during all my previous eye exams.  Plenty of parking, check in and billing was smooth and efficient.

name: Best Lee Sin NA
text: Dr Collins is always a huge help. She is patient, explains everything, and makes you feel welcome in her office. The staff are incredibly helpful too. Janet spent more than enough time explaining different types of lenses and coatings to me as well as how my lenses will turn out based on my specific prescription. Although I didn't learn everyone's name while I was there, the rest of the staff were courteous and thorough as well. I was happy with my choice of frames and lenses after the staff assisted me in picking ones that would hold my lenses properly. I have never had as good an experience going to the optometrist and optician. They will certainly be getting all my future business.

name: Vibeke Frøyen
text: It took 7 months and countless appointments to get a contact prescription. Eventually I insisted they prescribe what I had been wearing for the last 6 years. They did it, but HAD to make a change, which messed it up slightly. Never going back.

name: Mike Hope
text: Awesome!

name: Mike Emerson
text: The Best

name: Joanna Acker
text: Very professional and prompt.

name: Paula Watson
text:
I used this facility for the first time out of necessity.  Recieved an eye exam and contact fitting.  Could not get contacts for clear distance and reading after several tries. Went through two types of frames and three lenses and still could not read. I spoke to insurance company for advice and followed through with their recomendation. Full return and refund of all out of pocket expenses paid. Plus credit back to my vision insurance. This was a 6 week progress.
I recieved  and eye exam and contact fitting  with another Dr.  and I sit here another week and a half later with contacts I can see out of and 2 pair of designer frames I can actually read out of. Bottom line,  the script from eye exam was wrong from the start. I also was able to buy 2 pair of designer frames with minimal charge without insurance than I did one pair from them with insurance.  A frame style does not make a difference if you can read clearly of not if your script is wrong. First step should have been to recheck the eyes. Lesson learned, I have no plans to return their again.

name: Kim Clarke
text: Eye doctor and her assistant and the ladies at front desk was absolutely wonderful!!!  But the lady that took care of ordering of glasses has no communication skills.  Order the glasses she said they would be in on a Monday. I waited till Wednesday to call about the glasses still haven't came. On Thursday got a call saying the lens were broke and they had to redo glasses.  It would have been nice if we would have gotten a phone call to lets us know what was going on.  Also it would have been even better if the lady that order the glasses would have went out of her to get the glasses sooner.  It took over a week to get glasses.

resp.text: Mrs Clarke I completely understand your frustration. Nothing frustrates us more than when product does not arrive in a timely manner. Please understand that despite our multiple calls to the lab and requests for a priority to be placed on the job, lab errors kept the lenses from passing inspection. The last thing we want to deliver is substandard product. In the end, better communication from the lab And us would have helped all parties understand the delays. Again we are sorry for your inconvenience.

name: Durwin Unruh
text: We have been using the Atmore Vision Center for several years now and have been completely satisfied. They go out their way to make our experience an exceptional one.  Everyone there is so knowledgeable and kind. Our six year old granddaughter always looks forward to going there for her glasses and adjustments. We would highly recommend them to family, friends and anyone needing vision services.

resp.text: It is always a pleasure seeing you and your family.  Patients like you make our job enjoyable. We appreciate you and your family so much and always look forward to seeing you every year.

name: Lily Liles
text: I went in with a voucher from voc rehab and was sold a low quality frame.even the lenses werent fit in the frame right as dirt already around the lenses and cracks on nose piece and ive only worn them 5 times.they said to fix them i would have to see if state will pay for another appt. I cant even see without squinting. Wasted the state 350 dollars Will never go there again... Even walmart eye vision did better than them for 200 dollars.

Pain is now gone and I have regained my sight. The entire staff was great. The Doctor takes the time to listen to what has transpired since the last visit. She is absolutely great.

text: Auburn Eye Care was amazing to work with! I was a bit worried since I do not have eye insurance but they are priced reasonably well compared to other eye doctors I have used in the past. Furthermore, when I called, I was able to get an appointment the next day which was nice. All the staff are good to work with and have a friendly aura around them. As long as I am a student here in auburn, I will absolutely use Auburn Eye Care and recommend anyone else in the auburn area as well!

name: Charlie Barton
text:
The doctor was awesome and always has been. Very attentive and seems to really care about your issues and concerns.
The young lady at the front not so nice and not very knowledgeable of the prices of the frames out front.
Each time you asked a question she couldn't answer she went back to ask she was still in your line of sight she would make unnecessary comments and her body language towards us was very unprofessional.
My insurance only allows 150.00 towards new frames and we asked where are the ones in that price range and she told us good luck finding them in that price.
Ended up leaving without ordering new glasses all together.
Sad to say probably won't be back and that's very unfortunate because the doctor and everyone else we interacted with was great.

name: Margaret Long
text: All the staff was so friendly. No complaints no regrets.

name: Holly Surrency
text: I'm so excited about my new contacts and glasses and Dr. Daniels was amazing! I've already definitely recommended to my friends!

name: gary loper
text: Need a good eye exam ? This is the place to go . Best eye glasses and best prices around this part of Alabama/ Georgia. One stop does it all.

name: becky mcpherson
text: My 92 year old mother had an eye infection and suffers with memory issues but needed to be seen. They could not have been more compassionate, thoughtful and helpful. The staff is amazing and we were seen by Lisa Daniel OD. She was so gentle and understanding and did what she could to evaluate her condition. I was impressed from the minute we walked in the door. Grateful for the care we received.

name: Carrie Prater
text: Super Friendly  and Helpful Staff 💜

name: Neal Niswender
text:
Overall a bad experience with shady actions. Went for a eye exam and was told I needed to try progressive lens. The lady who assisted me with my glasses said don't worry you have 30 days to try them. I tried them for 3 weeks but was not happy. I tried to take back the eyeglasses but was then told they do not do refunds I could only replace the lens with single vision, this was shady issue #1. Then when I went back to get my eyeglasses after the lens had been changed I asked for a refund for the difference since the single vision lens are half the cost. I was told they do not refund the difference even though they are cheaper, shady issue #2.

Please go somewhere else, save the headache. I should have been patient and waited the 2 months till my normal optometrist could get me in.

name: Jessica Peterson
text: They were very professional, and considerate. We're able to fit me in the next day after I called and gave me my glasses within an hour of buying them!!!

name: Laray Kelly
text: It was a pleasure to be seen by all the people at Auburn Eye Care. They were courteous, patient, and very professional in all areas of their expertise.

name: Domosaur Sid
text:
“we had to order specialty trial lenses for you due to your unusual medical condition which you are aware of.”

Breaking hipaa I see. Was gonna come here, but not gonna risk having my business put out there for the public to see :/

name: Alec Avery
text: This place is terrible and does not care about its customers. Long story short, I was fitted for contacts and was given a sample pair to hold me over until my contacts came in. 2 weeks went by and I called seeing if the contacts had arrived. The lady who answered told me she would check and call me back - never did. I called back a week later to see about the contacts again and THE EXACT SAME THING HAPPENED. I then waited another week (at this point it has been a month that I’ve been using a pair of sample contacts) and called back again to check on the contacts.... she tried to dodge me again and this time I put my foot down and demanded to speak to who was in charge. She put me on the phone with a man named brad who profusely apologized to me and assured me the contacts would be in by the following Tuesday - they we not and did not arrive until Thursday. Brad then calls me and tells me that I need to schedule an appointment to get fitted for these new contacts. This made no sense to me bc I had already been fitted for the contacts?! I then show up to pick up the contacts and they will not give them to me. At this point you have to realize that I am very mad because of how they have treated me. Brad writes me a check to refund my money and does not give me the contacts. Brad clearly has no medical knowledge because he could barley articulate a logical sentence explaining why he would not give me the contacts. Please do not go here

resp.text: We apologize that we were unable to please you, but you do not receive the product and a refund too.

name: Laura M.
text: Excellent!  Auburn Eye Care provides great care, attention to detail and goes above and beyond.  A few years ago,  I purchased glasses from a discount glasses location and found that I kept going back to my old glasses from Auburn Eye due to the superior quality of the lenses.  Recently,  I used an old frame, previously purchased from them and replaced the lenses.  Soon afterward, one of the temple pieces broke.  Auburn Eye worked with me to resolve the issue by my purchasing new glasses at a great discount.  I also prefer to support local businesses and not big chains.  Auburn Eye is more expensive than the discount stores, but after using them for over 15 years, I will not go anywhere else.

Had a nice experience getting my prescription yet a horrible experience after I received my glasses.
I went in March 2017 to get glasses. They broke 3 months later. I had purchased the insurance to cover breakage so I thought no issue, they will cover it. Yes they would repair them with a $100 deductible!!!!
“What deductible?” I said. “You never told me if a deductible or I would have not purchased it!” Then they asked how I took off my glasses and said I should have taken them off by the nose piece! “What??!!” “You never told me this!”
I walked out after asking for a manager, oops there was not one that day all day, go figure.
I spread the word every day when people ask why I use two pairs of glasses of what bad service I had by this store.
Ridiculous bad customer service and snotty attitude when you need help.
Reminds me of a used car salesman.
DO NIT VISIT THIS STORE!

text:
My boys order for glasses was  09-10-15. Here it is the last week in October no glasses. The staff response to my questions was "I am not sure"  My boys was had to pick out glasses that they really didn't want but need. The last that rendered services to us was not interested in helping us at all.
My boyfriend went for glasses they was back within a week or less. However, she rushed him to pick out frames he didn't want. She didn't know the answer to question  nor did she try to find out. text: I HATE HERE! They will never tell you how much they will charge you before you pay for it. Staff never knows about your insurance. I visited there just for buying contact lense, I got some tests, and they charged me $150...Also, they put some drugs in my eyes(I don't know what it is) and I cannot see close things for more than 30 min. They will not take care about you and explain any information to you. Never visit here. Terrible!

name: Scott Harden
text: They have a friendly staff and a good selection of frames.

name: Melissa Walker
text:
A close friend took her son to Schaeffer recently. Due to his deadbeat dad not paying child support, the child is on Medicaid, and Schaeffer is supposedly one of only two places in Huntsville that offers eye glasses under Medicaid. The little boy was actually excited about getting glasses - about being able to see the board in his 2nd grade classroom. He was excited by all the cool frames he saw on display. When it was his turn to be seen, he and his mother were ushered to a small table, tucked away from the waiting area, with 3 red boxes sitting on top. In those boxes were dirty frames, with only a few sized for boys and not even a mirror to see one's reflection while trying on. The mother humbly asked a clerk if there were any other options for her son and was told "what you see is what you get" then dismissed as if her presence were a nuisance. The little boy was forced to pick out a pair of glasses that, although he needs, we're relatively certain he won't wear past the 2nd day he owns them due to the harassment he'll receive from bullies in school. So he won't be able to see the board, and his education and self esteem will suffer. His mother was understandably upset, but what can she do? She already works at least 3 jobs to pay for food and bills. Life can be hard. You do the best you can with what you have.

But did this mother and child have to be treated like dirt? No. Absolutely not. The behavior of Schaeffer's employee was abhorrent, at best.

I, personally, have a great job with good insurance and can afford not only new glasses every two years, but new prescription sunglasses as well. Where do I go for my glasses? The WalMart vision center on University Drive. The doctor and staff there treat everyone equally well, no matter how they're dressed, how much they make, or what their insurance status is. I know other high-income families that prefer to go there as well.

I will personally spread this story as far and wide as I can. Shame on you, Schaeffer, for treating ANYone like trash, especially an innocent little boy!

name: Daniel Marchand
text:
This location is very busy, staff isn't as knowledgeable about insurances and what they cover.

I've had issues with canceling/rescheduling appointments, canceled or called to move it when I received the post card, and a few weeks later I get a reminder call again for the appointment that I had changed.

FYI for contact users they charge $75 for a fitting (with insurance), I made the mistake of coming here last year and got sticker shock at the register on the way out - my fault for not asking.  Walmart charges $30, and contacts are contacts are contacts...

text: The staff was friendly and Dr. Elkins was personable and knowledgeable.  However, they added a lot of extra things to the lenses that ran the price way up.  When I got the glasses, they had the prescription wrong.  I took them back and they were going to redo them.  I told them how the close up prescription needed to be adjusted but they said it would be too much and ordered them like they wanted.  I called when I hadn't heard in a couple weeks and they had forgotten to send them off.    When they came in, it was just the lenses and no frames.  They didn't have the frames in stock so they would have to order them.  I live two hours from the office and didn't want to make yet another trip so they said they would mail them to me.  When I got them today, they should have listened to me as the focal point is still too close.  I've had five interactions with them and have been dissatisfied with all five.  They are very nice, but can't seem to get things done right.

resp.text: Paul, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear we haven't been able to get your glasses right for you yet! text:
I went to this Dr.   About 2 years ago. My glasses were like 500.00 with insurance. I thought that was way to much. Well went back for ck up. 2 years later. I was told I had
Over paid last time by 150.00 . So  I ordered more glasses.  Well I changed my mind. And told them to cancel the order. Mind u it was like 30 min. Later. They told me the could not refund my money for 2 weeks. Well 2 weeks later I got the 150.00 they owned me FOR 2 YEARS WITH OUT INTEREST.  and its been about 6 weeks and still the 170.00 has not ben sent to me. DON'T GO TO THESES PEOPLE THEY WILL TAKE YOU MONEY. AND NOT GIVE IT BACK.  I'VE CALLED THEM EVERY 2 WEEKS AND STILL NO MONEY. I'VE NEVER HAD A DR. KEEP OVER PAYMENT.  FOR 2 YEARS. IF I OVER PAY. THE DR. WILL SEND IT AT THE END OF THE YEAR. WHEN THEY COLSE THE BOOKS FOR THE YEAR. SO U CAN'T TRUST THESE PEOPLE.  THE LADY CONTACTED ME AND TOLD ME THE HAD MONEY AND THEY WOULD SEND IT BACK WHEN THEY GOT AROUND TO IT .WOULD DON'T GIVE A DATE. ... SHE WAS VERY RUDE I TOLD HER I WOULD PUT IT ON THE POST IT . SHE SAID WE DON'T CARE.  DON'T GIVE THEM YOUR MONEY......

When you have a moment - please email me at kaitlyngibson@eyecare-partners.com. Again, I apologize and I look forward to hearing from you.

text: All are amazing, caring, talented professionals! Plainly the best, period!

name: brian doyle
text: My recent purchase of two reading glasses and one pair of sunglasses was a surprising and most pleasant experience.  Ashley compared the two current promotions to find me the very best price.  Then, several days later, I received a call that my glasses had arrived, but Eyecare Associates had rejected them after inspection and had ordered a new fabrication.  Wow!  Just a few days after that, I went to pick up my new remakes.  I was not satisfied with the field of vision they offered, and Ashley showed me the three types of lenses available.   I selected a set with a broader field of vision and, in spite of the $80 increase each of the three sets would entail, placed my order.  The next day, Ashley called to tell me she had discussed my case with the manager, and they had decided to wave all further fees, so these three new pairs would be free!   Double-wow!   I was impressed and, frankly, touched by the empathy, attention, personal concern, and expert service I received from Eyecare Associates.    EA went out of their way and beyond all my expectations to insure a fair and positive experience for me, and I simply cannot recommend them enough!  Definitely be my go-to eye care specialists from now on.

text: I really enjoyed my visit. I felt comfortable and the customer service was amazing. V was very friendly and informative also the Doctor was extremely thorough and took his time examining my eyes. I will definitely recommend EyeCare Associates to friends and Family.

text: Doctor Elkins and staff are welcoming, very helpful, and kind! We had a great overall experience from beginning to end. Thank you so much!

name: Dianne Miller
text:
Due to a series of mistakes, I found myself in Daphne AL with no contacts, eye glasses, and an empty  right eye of the necessary contact.  I have terrible eyesight with my right eye being a -8.50. It is very difficult to find any eye MD who has this contact in stock.  Note this is the Friday before 2018 New Year and have to drive back to ATLANTA GA.  Called my home eye MD, who is part of the EyeCare network. They suggested I try contacting EyeCare Associates in the area.  This recommendation led me here.

Ashley, in Dr. Glusman's office, was so helpful, pleasant, & professional.  They saved my life by having in stock a -8.50 contact!!  If I lived in this area, I would definitely make this EyeCare center my home for all my eye needs.  I am so grateful for their assistance.  Thank you, thank you!

text: frauds.  The eye doctor is great, but they are yet another medical company taking advantage of people that have insurance.  if you pay case the over priced glass frames are 50% off. if you have insurance you have to pay $350 or more for frames then after you insurance allowance you end up paying the same amount as someone with out insurance. its unethical and they should be shut down or penalized for this.  do not go here.

Thanks

text: After 90 minutes of not being seen by a doctor yet, I asked at the front desk about the time. I told her we’d have to leave in 45 minutes to be somewhere else. She shrugged her shoulders and said let me know if you leave. Really? Staff is not friendly or helpful. Routine eye exam took 2 hours - surely there’s a way to schedule better.

text: They are AMAZING!! I was so nervous to have the LASIK procedure done but they walked me through absolutely everything and were constantly reassuring. Best procedure experience ever. I can not recommend them enough!! Dr. McFaden and Dr. Shin are the best!

name: Graham McGalliard
text:
I’ve been to both Prattville and Sturbridge locations for exams with contacts and glasses in the past. I had LASIK April 22 performed by Dr. Swan and the results have been incredible. I could see drastically better leaving the office 10 minutes after. At my post-op appointment the next day I could see almost 20/15 out of one eye. The other eye does have more irritation and dryness and is improving daily.

Dr. McFaden and the rest of the staff have been very helpful and friendly getting my procedure set up and during recovery to help with the irritation and minor swelling.

I look forward to see how my eyes have healed at the 1 week follow-up. I highly recommend LASIK with Montgomery Eye Physicians. It’s been life-changing already.

name: Valerie Turner
text: I had to wait a long tome to see the doctor, over 2 hours.

name: LInda Johnson
text: Very good and friendly.

name: Jenny Griff
text: Took my brother with a disability to office saw Dr. Shin everything started smoothly until he started to examine him. He started yelling to look this way don't blink. I told the doctor he's not deaf and I'm translating no need to yell, well he needs to do want I'm asking. 🤨Really a person with down syndrome can't control the fact that he see's something coming at his eye. He was suppose to take a sample of whatever he had in his eye and the risk was if he moves or blink I could cut his eye. I call our mom and told her the risk and how this doctor acted towards my brother she was not happy nor was I we left but not before I told him that we would find someone that can have the patience and find a different way to do this procedure his response was well the other place you will find a specialist is in Bham and if you don't he will lose his eye. I told him don't worry I have driven to Bham before to take him to doctors and I will make sure he doesn't lose his eye unlike you.

name: Sonja Ethridge
text: Very friendly service and doctors will answer all your questions and give you just about all the information you need,  I especially liked that my doctor gave me sample eye drops to try and that I can get them over the counter or by prescription from my primary care provider.

name: Shemaiah Campbell
text: Most of seemed really nice. But, I came in March 3rd to order a contact lense. Dr. McFaden gave me a contact lense review. One had gotten broken 2 days beforeand. Dr. McFaden said it was ok to go ahead and order my lense now so I can have it on the way soon and if it needed to be changed they will do that on my regular schedule exam on March 13th. I was told by one of the nurses that the order for my contact was put in and there wasn't a payment for today and that they will call me when it came in. Forward to March 13th when it was time to have a regular full exam, I asked about the order, and then that's when I was told I had to make a full payment first before it was ordered. So what they told me the first time was a straight up LIE. My contact could've almost been here by now if they would've just told me that in first place!! Now I have to go with 1 freaking contact in for another 2 weeks because somebody don't know how to properly do their job!! This really pisses me off and Tiffany always have a rude demeanor.  My problem wasn't paying for the contact upfront! I could've done that March 3rd! It's the lie that I was told about the ordering! It's not fun going longer than what I have to with one contact!

name: Karen Harris
text: When I scheduled my new patient appointment almost 2 months ago, I was adamant that I wanted to be seen by an ophthalmologist.  An appointment was made to see Dr. Mitchell and to also see Dr. McFadden for my contact exam.  Fast forward to today, when I arrived for my appointment, I'm informed that it has been cancelled.  No phone call, text, email...NOTHING!  As a matter of fact, I had to call the week before to confirm my appointment  because I had not received any form of confirmation.  Needless to say, I will not return or recommend this practice to anyone.  I did not appreciate having my appointment cancelled without any just reason and then only to arrive and have the lady at the reception desk continuously trying to get me to see another doctor.

resp.text: Karen, we are sorry to hear about your experience today. We are looking into the issue now and will call you shortly to review. Thank you for the feedback.

name: Stephen Pierce
text: This is my second review.  Plan to spend more than one or two hours there.  The last visit took three hours.  The previous visit Dr. Swan was two and a half hours LATE for my apt.  Next time I will allow a thirty minute wait then leave!

text: Dr. Mcfaden is a great doctor! Very thorough. Highly recommend him to anyone. The staff as a whole is awesome as well!

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback, Brandon! We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your experience.

resp.text: Cherokee, thank you for sending us your feedback. We are sorry to hear we didn't exceed expectations during your visit. This information has been sent to our administrative team so we can make the proper adjustments. Your feedback is important to our practice, and we appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your experience.

name: Matthew Brown
text:
When I showed up for my new patient appointment I was told the Dr. had left sick. That's understandable, but no one could give me an explanation as to why I wasn't called and told this before my appointment time.  I drove across Montgomery just for this appointment.  I was told they would call me to reschedule in the morning. No one called.
I called them the next day and then I was put on hold and then hung up on.  It's very clear to me they don't need/want new patients. Moving on

name: Dick Martin
text: I had the occasion to have a glaucoma test by Dr Shin which was with a hand held paortable device. It happened to be 10 points higher than a test administered to me days earlier by Dr . Izer.  He wanted to prescribe medication. When I said I just had the test 4 days ago by another doctor, he got very upset and told me there is no reason for me to come back since I saw the other doctor. Apparently he doesn’t like a patient getting a second opinion. He is insecure or threatened by a second opinion, especially when there is such a disparity in the result.

name: Karl Smith
text: I had a difficult time trying to find this office even with the GPS feature on my cellphone

name: Amy Mapp
text: Excellent.    Friendly and caring staff

name: Carrie Blocker
text:
I was disappointed because we’d used them in the past and been satisfied with service. This transaction was not a good one, and we will not be returning.
Upon entering, we were met with grumpiness as if we were inconveniencing the staff. Coming in simply for a lens update, i anticipated an easy interaction. No one directed us and once we finally spoke with someone, she acted as if we should know the policies. We had to schedule an appointment to come back just to have lenses replaced. So i scheduled for their next open slot (almost a week later).
We were met with the same attitude upon our appointment and went through the whole process of ordering. As i was about to pay, we were informed that the glasses would have to be shipped out and so my daughter would not have glasses for the next 2 weeks. Unacceptable. I canceled the order and we left to seek better options elsewhere… which we found with smiles and a lower price tag.

resp.text: Carrie, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about your experience getting glasses in our office -- that's definitely not what we want for you! I'd like to look into why this happened. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Christina Rose
text: Liz was the most AMAZING,calming, professional person I could've asked for. She did everything possible to make me comfortable and calm my anxiety I having about my eye issues. Dr Jackson did a great job explaining everything In detail and made me feel so much more at ease then when I walked in. Every fear I had about my eyes, he explained in detail why I shouldn't worry about them and that I was going to be ok. I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND. I now have myself and children as patients. ❤️

text: Dr. Jackson has serviced my family and me, for more than 15 years. Dr. Jackson’s very patient and explain in detail of your eyes as it relates to your eye medical stance. I definitely recommend anyone who desires to have a great medical eye examine, Eyecare Associates’ best choice.

name: Emily S
text: Both my husband and I felt like we were just a commissions check to this office. The initial welcome from the receptionist was cold and annoyed. We spent 3 hours apiece here to get contacts (him) and glasses/contacts (me) and walked out spending far more than usual. Being a new patient from out of town I would have expected more of a consultation from the doctor before just throwing me into contacts. I was only able to wear each contact set for 2-3 hours before having to take them out because they were green. When I called the office to express my concern the only thing they said was to use contact solution not tap water. (Who does that anyways?! Tap water?) I’m sorry I’ve worn contacts before and have never had them turn green. So there’s a contact fitting co-pay wasted and not refunded. It’s been a solid 2 weeks since ordering my glasses (should have been 7-10 business days) I called twice to get an update and get transferred to a voicemail with no response (24-48 hours right?). When I went looking for new frames the person helping me knew my insurance budget and pulled frames almost double my budget rather than asking me what I felt comfortable spending. She also picked frames that were extremely outside of my current shape, style,  and comfort zone. All and all I probably will find a different office for us next year simply because the lack of care, communication, and consultation.

resp.text: Emily, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about your experience in our office. It's so frustrating when you don't feel heard! We strive to provide excellent care for every patient, and we obviously fell short for you and your husband. I've spoken to our management team about your concerns and they would like to reach out to you. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm so sorry to hear about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: tom reinhardt
text: You all were extremely helpful especially the sweet women at the front desk as she could tell I was in pain and cared enough to stop what she was doing and get me some numbing eye drops and put them in for me to help sooth the pain it was such a relief and really a blessing knowing that there is still at least one practice that has caring and loving staff or employees that care about their patients and don't treat them as a number on a clip board! And that can mean a lot to a patient like myself! For me I lost my mother when I was 11 And when I came into EyeCare Associates they made me feel right at home like their on son and made me feel like I had two moms behind the front desk. :) Thank y’all for all of your help, care and concern! And I LOOK forward to seeing you all again soon! :)

text: Dr Harris was great! He was patient despite it being a very busy day and I really felt appreciated. I will definitely visit again for eye exams and I have already recommended him to my family.

name: Berniece Pierce
text:
I had my appointment on Wednesday, 10 July 2013. I normally see either Dr. Harris or Dr. Jackson. On this visit I was seen by Doctor Fredrick Jackson and it was a truly amazing experience. Everyone was extremely courteous and friendly. I was really impressed with Dr. Jackson on this occasion. He took his time explaining everything he was doing and why he was doing it. His explanations and genuine concern went a long way in putting my fears to rest. He not only took an interest in my eye health, but he was also very forthcoming with sharing some possible solutions to other areas of my overall health that could potentially affect my eye health. He offered some possible solutions to help with bouts of vertigo I have been experiencing for a couple of years now. He suggested some things that I could try to help to minimize the severity of the migraine headaches that I have been suffering for more than thirty years. No one else had ever made the suggestions to me that he did. I can't wait to put them into practice to see if they will help even the tiniest little bit. Thanks, Dr. Jackson, for one of the most enjoyable appointments I have ever had. And trust me, I will make sure that you are highly recommended to everyone that I know who needs a good optometrist. Keep up the good work.

Had my yearly exam on February 4, 2015 and must say that it was a very interesting experience. Even though the wait time was a few minutes past my appointment time, I clearly understand why. The doctors spend as much time as needed with each patient and I realize that I will get the same type of treatment when it is my turn. Also, Dr. Harris' staff are extremely kind, considerate, and compassionate. I just love Dr. Harris to death (no offense Dr. Jackson, I love you, too). Even though he informed me that I have cataracts, he took the time to explain all of my options and shared his experiences with his father's surgery. I left the office feeling very good and felt that Dr. Harris had provided me with all the information that I needed to make a decision. Once I made the decision, he even scheduled an appointment for me--talk about the personal touch approach. I would highly recommend Primary Eyecare Associates to anyone. As a matter of fact, my entire family uses Primary Eyecare Associates. So, if you are looking for a good eye care center and optometrist, give them a call, THEY ARE THE BEST I have ever used. KEEP DOING WHAT YOU ARE DOING.

text:

I also had Lasik Surgery around 10 years ago with excellent results.  And today I am still seeing 20/20, I have had no regression in my vision.

Dr. Jackson is a very caring doctor, he not only cares about your vision he cares about your overall health.  Your health and medications are very important part of his exam.

Dr. Harris is very caring as well concerning you overall health.  He has a free spirit and your vision and how well you see is extremely important.

I would not go anywhere else for mine or my family's eye care.
When I leave I know they as well as myself have been give the utmost care as possible. And an exam that surpasses all others.

I thank them greatly for their compassion and care I am given.

I also work for these doctors and I personally know and see first hand the care that our patients are given.  Your optical needs are as important as your eye exam.  If its not right they will do everything possible to make things right and see you are satisfied. Your Vision is their main Focus.

아틀란타 안경점에서 내린 처방보다 조금더 정확하고 신뢰를 주는 검사, 이후에 진단과 처방까지 시간에 쫓기지 않고 충분히 설명 해주시는 모습이 인상적이었습니다.   더 번창하시고  잘 되시기를....

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review -- we're so glad you enjoyed your experience!

name: Adrine Wilkinson
text: I love this place! Very sweet people. Recommend for all your eye care needs

name: Stacey Thrasher
text:
My husband and I have used Family Eye Care since we moved to Sylacauga five years ago and always had good service until my last trip. I have never been treated so rudely by a person/business as I was today. I ordered new lens on my last exam and specifically told the man that works in the eye glass department that I did not want the reflective coating because they were just a spare set of glasses to watch TV with. He padded the bill and added the coating anyway. I didn't figure out what happened until they sent a bill, I called and they had no problem removing the charge for the reflective coating. That should have been the end of it regarding that coating.
I went in yesterday to pick up my glasses but had to wait so long that I got into a hurry running late for another appointment and I didn't fully inspect the glasses, my mistake. I put them in the case and went on with my day, last night when I took them out to clean them there was two bad gouges on the lens. I originally thought it was just lint in the office because he did not clean them before he gave them to me. Today I took them back to show them the gouges and was practically called a liar by the man in the eye glass department. He treated me very rudely and got abusive towards me when I told him they were gouged when I picked them up. He basically told me that they were not gouged by them, I DID order the reflective coating and he did clean the glasses for me, which none of was true. The coating shouldn't have even been an issue that was brought into the conversation. I turned around and walked out before things got even uglier.
I really can't understand how Dr. Cantley can allow an employee to treat a long time patient in this manner. If I had scratched/gouged those lens then I would own it and just say my fault and go on with life. At this point it isn't even so much about the glasses as it is being treated so rudely and abusive. That employee just cost Dr. Cantley two long term patients and negative reviews because I will never return there again. He should not be working in any capacity with the public. He had a chip on his shoulder before I even walked into his department. Sadly I really liked Dr. Cantley and had been pleased with her as my eye doctor but I will not be treated as I was today by her staff. I truly hope that $100 pair of lens was worth all the future revenue you would have earned with our business.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are disheartened  to hear about the misunderstanding as we strive to provide excellent medical care, products and service. Strict quality controls are used to inspect lenses at your insurance's lab and then again at our lab before dispense to ensure accuracy and quality of the lenses. We will be happy to send your lenses back to your insurance's lab for repair/replacement. We were happy to give you the anti-reflective coating complimentary since it does significantly improve the quality of vision and you have requested it on your previous glasses. We apologize for the misunderstanding and happy to assist you however we can.

name: Christie Ward
text: Dr. Stacy has always been great with my eye exams. I trust her for all eye questions and problems. Thanks Doc!!

name: Devin Blakely
text: Dr Cantley always takes the best care and is very knowledgeable!! Highly recommend her to everyone!

name: Rick Redmond
text: Dr. Cantley and staff are always friendly and very thorough.  She takes her time to do a complete exam which is very important to me with my history of melanoma and the possibility of it appearing in my eye per my dermatologist.

name: Julie Wesson
text: Dr. Cantley and her staff are wonderful! They make you feel so comfortable during the entire visit! Very affordable contacts and frames! I highly recommend them!

name: Jeff Harris
text: Don’t waste your time dealing with this eye doctor. I ordered contacts and after 6 weeks they were not in. I didn’t learn this until I went into the office and they told me it would be another week. I told them I wanted to cancel my contacts. They refused and they also refused to let me speak to the doctor. They also said that the doctor knew they were treating me in this manor. So very unprofessional! Please think twice before going to this doctor!

name: Betty Jones
text: Dr. Cantley is very helpful and staff is very friendly. I have been going there for years and always love my new glasses.

name: Emily Martin
text: She is the sweetest!!! Love all the ladies! Would recommend anyone to go see her!!

name: Katie Holmes
text: Great thorough exam. Doctor and staff are very friendly and helpful. Large selection of glasses and sunglasses.

name: Catherine Marie
text: The knowledge of this facility is lacking. When a patient tell you they are allergic to something the Dr should listen. They gave me drops once after I told them I was allergic. They insisted on it a second time even after I told them they were not going to do it. Be ware of this facility and staff.

name: Tasha Wiley
text: I've been a patient of Dr. David Parker's for approx 20 years.  The level of care I have received at Madison Eye Care Center is TOP NOTCH.  He's always caring and attentive, and the staff - from front desk to check out - has always been exceptional.  I wanted to write this review today, however, to highlight an experience I had last week while traveling to the beach.  I arrived at my destination only to discover I'd made a terrible mistake and had forgotten my contacts.  When I called the office, I had my Rx in-hand within 4 minutes.  When I contacted the closest eye care facility, I was told they didn't have my brand of contacts on-hand & asked if I could possibly get my doc to authorize a diff brand.  When I called back to Madison Eye Care Center, Delana went above and beyond and offered to call the eye care facility at the beach for me to figure out a solution.  Once she'd done so, she called me back to let me know what to expect since these lenses may feel a bit different that my usuals.  I had contacts in-hand within 20 minutes of calling Madison Eye Care Center & Delana basically saved my vacation!  :) Just cannot recommend this practice enough!!

name: Timothee Howland
text: Never experienced such intentional, consistent, across the board at every station, level of imposed feeling of being special, important, attended to, cared for, cared about, listened to, spoken to, spoken to pleasantly, spoken to genuously - no exceptions, every single of the 4 women who moved me through "the system".  I came out of the machine not feeling like a cog! Again. 3rd time in 2 months.  Repeatable with machine precision. Real people.

name: Olesia Bodnaruk
text: Very good clinic, friendly and welcoming  staff. Want to highly recommend Dr.Michael.St.Peter.He was  helping to my  9 year old son .Dr.St.Peter was very professional, kind,he takes time to explain everything in a small details.My son was very excited and feels comfortable during the all visit at clinic. Very thankful to Dr.St.Peter.

name: Avery Beckham
text: So helpful, informative, and super professional! Thank you, Delaina!!

name: Marcie McAlister
text: My daughter took my autistic granddaughter to this office. Due to unforeseen circumstances that often arise with autistic children. My daughter was 8 minutes late arriving. The doctor refused to see my 3 year old granddaughter. The staff was rude and so inconsiderate. It was very disheartening. It was such a disappointing experience.

resp.text: Madison Eye Care Center is happy to work with patients whenever possible. However, as a courtesy to all our patients, when a patient is 15 minutes or more late to his/her appointment we may request to reschedule to another day. Each patient is important to us and we do not want to rush the time spent with a patient because he or she was late. Madison Eye Care Center wants to provide devoted time to every patient and believe we can only provide the personalized care our patients have come to expect by dedicating their scheduled appointment times to them. We will gladly work with your individual needs to provide the best possible care in a timely manner. For individual assistance, information about scheduling or other specific appointment needs, please contact the office manager of Madison Eye Care Center.

name: Leachea Johnson-Wood
text: Not happy with my "bent" glasses AT ALL and I believe they were getting impatient with me after my 4th reshaping request.  I overheard the lady whispering to the other lady as if they were discussing being frustrated with me.  I gave up.  Paid $1200 for appt., and glasses I couldn't use.  Just went to America's Best and the doctor there said those glasses needed to be thrown in the garbage they were so messed up in the way the frames were bent and the bifocals were so screwed up.  That there was no way possible to have clear vision through those lenses. Won't ever go there again.

name: Cindy Phillips
text: This is a wonderful practice! Everyone is so friendly and the in office wait time is short.  I truly feel like family when I come in for my appointments! I never feel rushed and they make sure to answer all my questions and concerns and always tell me what my insurance will cover and not so no surprise bills which is going above and beyond these days!

name: mandi hunt
text: I highly recommend Madison Eye Care Center. Dr. Newby was kind enough to respond to my needs during her off hours. She was also attentive enough to follow-up later in the day regarding my progress. She treated me like she would treat friends or family. I am very impressed with the service.

name: McKenna Gibson
text: My first visit with Madison Eye Center was so pleasant. The team is very welcoming and professional. I came here to see Dr. St. Peter - he takes the time to explain everything and makes sure my concerns are addressed. Very thankful to have found such a wonderful place for my family’s eye care!

name: Sarah Price
text: The office staff and doctors are always very professional and welcoming! I always feel like they truly care about what I have to say and they treat me like family. They have a ton of options for glasses and my husband really likes his sunglasses from here too.

name: Truett Leach
text:
I've been with them for 3ish years. My mother has been with them much longer. All of the staff are incredibly sweet and nice. Every time I come in it's nothing but laughs and a good time from the staff and extremely informative sessions with the Doc's.

Let these folks deal with your eyeballs. You won't regret it.

name: Jordan P
text: Without a doubt, the best optometrist I've seen. The doctors are very knowledgable and explain everything in an easily understandable way. The rest of the staff is very kind and professional. I would strongly recommend this office to anyone!

name: Dan Ford
text: It is my pleasure to give the staff at Madison Eye Care Center the highest possible recommendation.  I've not had such good vision in decades. Dr. Parker fitted me with the latest technology in corrective lens and I'm totally amazed at how well I can see. With their knowledge, state of the art technology and equipment, I am now blessed with excellent vision that, at age 68, I never expected to have again. Everyone is very friendly. In fact, I've told neighbors that it's as if each visit to their office is like a family reunion.

name: denise payne
text:
Love Dr. David Parker!  He is great!
BUT do not purchase your glasses or sunglasses from this location.  If you get Maui Jim's from Maui Jim, they are returnable.  Not the case, if you purchase from here.  This is not my first negative experience with glasses from this location but I can promise it will be my last as I will not purchase anything from here again.

name: Susie Averitt
text: The care I received from Dr. Parker was top notch. He went above and beyond to ensure that I received the best solution for my circumstances. The technicians and staff are also amazing. I highly recommend Dr. Parker and Madison Eye Care Center.

name: Anna Morgan
text:
Dr. David Parker is Top Notch and 5 star in every way.  They care about their patients and are professional while being personable.
Our entire family does to them for eye care and we are never disappointed with the time, care, and approach they take with each patient.  Their office staff is friendly, knowledgeable, and professional.
I would gladly recommend them to anyone looking for fabulous eye care.

Even when there was great concern with an unusual retina problem in one of my eyes, David was empathetic, honest, and up front with his findings.  He took a lot of time explaining what the condition was, how to proceed from his office to the office of a retina specialist and explained why he chose the specialist he did.

name: Jenny Lovell
text: LOVE Dr. Michelle Parker! Wonderful staff as well! Always very attentive to our needs. Super sweet to both of my boys. She really takes her time in making sure we fully understand everything. Building is very nice and clean! The guy in the eye glass shop is VERY helpfull! They have the best quality frame selection around! Thanks for taking such great care of our eyes!

name: Kathy Spurgeon
text: This is a great place to get all of your eye care needs. Go by and let the great staff take good care of you.

name: Michele Chalmers
text: I can't say enough about Madison Eye Care Center.  Dr. Parker and his staff stayed after hours because I was having issues with my eye and helped figure out what the problem was.  Their staff is always so friendly and good with all three of my children, including one who has special needs.  I will never change to another eye care center.  Thank you so much.

name: Justin Z
text: I've been to several eye care places over the years & these folks keep a clean place & are very friendly. Where they lost me is at the up sales of contact lenses. My wife & I felt like we were at some sort of car sale & we were finagled into buying the "premium" vehicle (but with a rebate). The "premium" lenses we were talked into honestly didn't seem any better than the "standard"  ones we've had for years. Seems an odd way to do business in the eye industry but I guess money talks for some!

name: Ray Hensley
text: There are a lot of eye clinics around the area but none better nor more friendly than Madison Care Center.  I have been going there ever since they first started the business and have never had less than superb care.  Both David and Michelle give the most through, caring and best explained eye exam and eye care that I have ever received.  To me they are the only place I take my eyes.  Staff there will meet you with a smile and do all they possibly can to insure you have everything you need or want.  It is always a pleasure to visit the Parker's as they are unique and grounded in personal care for their patients.  If you have not been there and experienced what life should be like, well give them a shot and I promise you wont be disappointing. Michelle is my personal preference as she has such a wonderful personality and I am not taking away from David as he does too but you judge when you meet them.  .

name: Anna Mitchell
text: Amazing office, wonderful doctors, and excellent selection of glasses and sunglasses.  I have referred family and friends to the office and everyone has been pleased.  The are also wonderful with working with my 4 year old.

name: blake whitlow
text: Dr. Tracy Swartz is a wonderful eye doctor that I was paired with when I came in on an emergency visit on a Friday.  She came back in on two of her off days when the office was closed because of her commitment to her patients.  The care I receive was great above and beyond what I expected.  I would refer anyone in the area to her.

name: Charlie Crowe
text:
I needed an emergency visit on Friday. They accommodated me quickly. Dr. Tracy Swartz quickly diagnosed an eye infection that my GP incorrectly diagnosed/treated. Dr. Swartz came in on Saturday to check-up on me.

Extremely knowledgeable, courteous, and accommodating. We have found a new optometrist.

Also, very impressed with the doctors and the administrative staff's understanding of insurance. Their knowledge saved me a lot of money.

name: Kim Backer
text: Dr. Parker and his team go above and beyond to care for their patients. I wouldn’t go anywhere else for my optical needs.

name: Karen Turnage
text: The doctors and staff and great. Dr. Swartz has to be one of the smartest people I have met. The wait time is usually around 5 minutes. I would highly recommend them. I only docked them a star because the GLASSES WERE TOO EXPENSIVE. I have purchased quality glasses elsewhere (not Walmart nor Target) and paid half the amount I paid here. My recommendation is to see the doctors for an exam. PURCHASE YOUR GLASSES SOME PLACE LESS EXPENSIVE. Shop around before you purchase, especially if you have a high prescription.

name: John Bell II
text: DR. David Parker, is a GREAT OPTOMETRIST. His staff is very helpful and professional. I was impressed with my interaction with Optometry Technician , J.T. and the Office Manager , Delana. They were well versed in their optometry / customer service skills.  J.T. explained every step of the exam to my youngest child and put him at ease over what the eye exam would consist of and how the machinery worked.  Thanks to all of the employees at Madison Eye Care Center, L.L.C. Where they live by their motto, "Our Focus Is On You"

name: Sherry Rush
text: The doctor was terrific.  However, the office staff is lacking and unprofessional.  The office manager laughed at my concern and argued with me over the phone.  I have never been so upset.  The rude comments hurt my feelings.

name: Glen Hiller
text: Not my best "life" moment but i literally stabbed myself in the eye with a manila folder and cut my cornea. I have never been to an eye doctor before so i was just guessing this would be a good place to stop...literally a blind decision...Pun intended. Dr. Parker was about to walk out the door and they worked me in at 5pm on a busy weekday. He was extremely accommodating and both of my follow ups i was in and out with minimal wait time. They keep their schedule true and do not appear to overbook. They also were very knowledgeable on how to work the insurance system so my BCBS would cover my injury.  If your looking for an eye doctor in the Madison area i HIGHLY recommend them. Excellent experience.

name: Nicholas Nicholas
text: Nice , Clean , Professional. The staff hear are very friendly.

name: Masao Williams
text: Outstanding service

name: Kristie B
text: Doctors are okay, office staff is unprofessional and inconsistent. Billing is never the same, when I asked about a specific office visit charge that was different on two different dates, the answer I received was it depended  on who keyed it in and if they were giving a courtesy discount.

name: gail moore
text: The dr. is good but the customer care is terrible. I used this place years ago it was great but there's only one young lady in there that seems to like her job and should work in a public setting.

name: Greg Dennis
text: I will not use them again.  While the doctors and examination staff are very profession, the eyeware staff is completely opposite, poorly trained and extremely unprofessional!

name: Taylor Rudick
text: The office manager was extremely rude! Won’t use them again.

name: Jon “Jonjohn” John
text: Great experience every time

name: Andrew Ivester
text: The Doctors here were okay I guess I mean one almost made me have to get my eye removed DAMN YOU. When I told them I didn't like my glasses they said then throw them away I told them I had paid $150 for them I was very very sad so then I asked for contacts then he told I couldn't do it

name: Charles Durrin
text: Excellent, professional, but expensive.

name: Salvatore Ciambrone Sr.
text: I always have the best service and care.

name: Curtis Dewberry
text: The dirtiest Dr office I’ve been to. Canceled after speaking with the caring staff. They don’t care!  Check it out!

name: Richard Hayles
text: Greatest Eye Doctor. I get best care around.

name: Donna Belter
text: Very friendly and competent staff.  Excellent eye care.  Dr. Blacker by has seen me when I did not have an appointment.  No waiting

name: Karen Summerlin
text: Had a thorough eye exam, all my questions answered, and l I received the nicest customer service ever.  I was very pleased with my final cost after insurance was applied and the selection of frames I had to choose from.  I have already recommended Columbiana Eye Care to my friends and family, of which two have already made appointments and a third will be calling them this week.

name: Harold Ridge
text: I called to schedule an appointment and spoke with the receptionist JOY. Let's just say there was no JOY in that experience. Absolute rudest, unprofessional experience! I don't care how good the doctor is if that's the type of people they employ."

name: Preston Joiner
text: Great service and excellent care They also have a large selection of eye ware and contacts

name: Tom Holmes
text: Very polite, very patient, and great customer service and care. Would definitely recommend.

name: Holly Huffington
text: Rude, incompetent office staff.

name: Craig Bowman
text: I highly recommend Dr. Herzog and his staff

name: Phyllis Jones
text: Poor professionalism! My daughter has rescheduled 3 appts with this Bessemer dental office. On the fourth try, which is today, she failed and No one bothered to reach out and call and/or text yo let her know anything. She missed making money because of bad service. My grandson has two cavities to be extracted. Our patience has been exhausted. We in the process of looking for another dentist office that cares.

resp.text:
Hello Phyllis,

We sincerely apologize for any frustration that may have been caused. Your families dental health is of the most importance to us. A member of our team will be in touch with you shortly to see what we can do to improve for you and others dental experiences at our practice.

Regards,
Sarrell Dental

name: Aakre Mahan
text: My daughter went to get her eyes examined on August 27, 2014.  The optometrist recommended that she needed glasses. So we placed our order.  The receptionist stated that the glasses should be back within two weeks and that they would contact me once they got in. Well................. It is now November 4, 2014 and my daughter has not yet received her eye glasses.  I have called twice to see if they have come into the office and every time I call they tell me that they have not come in yet.  They have not even tried to compensate us at all!!! I would not recommend Sarrel Dental Center to anyone. VERY VERY VERY POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE.  I am taking my child to another eye clinic. Tried to give them a chance with the office being fairly new.  BUT I MADE A HUGE MISTAKE. They are surely getting off to a HORRIBLE start.

name: Vanessa skripko
text: Their database got hacked and ever since they have been just mean. I called in August for a cleaning the first appointment available was Dec. 23 I forgot what time. I keep calling to check the time they won't answer. I asked to be put on a waiting list for the first opening and that obviously didn't happen. Just ugggh get my kids information hacked and now can't treat us professional.

resp.text: Vanessa, this location is permanently closed. Please send an email to feedback@greatdentalplans.com with your contact information and a member of our team will be in touch.  Thank you.

name: Daya Cruz
text: WISH I COULD LEAVE A ZERO, WENT TO GET A CLEANING HERE WHEN I WAS 18 WAS TOLD I HAD 2 CAVITIES THT NEEDED FILLED ASAP, I MADE THE APPT AND DUE TO WORK CONFLICTS I CANCELLED THE APPT. I ENDED UP CHANGING DENTISTS BC OF MY AGE (I DIDNT WANT TO CONTINUE GOING TO A PEDIATRIC DENTIST), WHEN I GOT MY CLEANING DONE I EXPECTED THE DOCTOR TO TELL ME I HAD CAVITIES (SINCE I DID NOT GO BACK TO FILL THEM HERE) HOWEVER THE DOCTOR TOLD ME I HAD NO CAVITIES. I MENTIONED TO THE DOCTOR THAT THIS LOCATION TOLD ME I HAD 2 CAVITIES AND DID NOT GET THEM FILLED. DOCTOR TOLD ME I DID NOT HAVE ANY CAVITIES AND THAT THIS LOCATION (BASED OFF WHAT I TOLD HIM) BASICALLY LIED TO ME TO GET $$ ... AFTER EXPERIENCING THIS I TALKED TO  PEOPLE THAT WENT TO THIS LOCATION BEFORE AND THEY ALSO SAID THEY HAD THE SAME ISSUE, I WOULD DEFINITLY NOT RECCOMMEND THIS DENTIST TO ANYONE. THEY DONT CARE ABOUT YOU THEY CARE ABOUT THE MONEY , ON TOP OF THAT IT IS SO HARD TO CONTACT SOMEONE HERE , TAKES FOREVER TO REACH SOMEONE HAVE TO CALL 5 TIMES BEFORE I CAN GET SOMEONE ON THE PHONE..... DO NOT GO HERE .

resp.text: Daya, If you'd like to talk with a member of our team, please send an email with your contact information to feedback@greatdentalplans.com and we will be in touch. Thank you.

name: Rayuna
text: Great place to get your eyes checked and to get glasses for all ages that are affordable and cute. Great dentists who are nice and helpful, and takes great care if your teeth.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind feedback!

name: Kelly McDaniel
text: My husband had a horrible infection in his eye so he sat in their parking lot and waited until they opened at 8am to be the first there for someone to look at his eye.  He was told they were booked and could not fit him in.  They   referred him to another eye place in Northport.  He said he would never make an appointment with them again.

name: Jamie Turner
text: They are all great with their patients

name: Deb S
text:
I had a great experience with the doctor. She was kind, patient and knowledgeable. She didn't dismiss my concerns about my eyes and offered to set me up with a retina specialist. My wait was not long at all, I was seen within 15 minutes of my appointment time.

The ladies behind the desk need to work on their attitudes...kinda  snotty...the technician who fit my glasses had a cold and shared it with me. She was coughing, sneezing and blowing her nose and did not wash her hands.

I will go back because I like my doctor.

name: LNS
text: Unfortunately had an appointment scheduled, they cancelled it completely last minute. Quickly rescheduled me though, and they were incredibly fast. When they say the appointment is at 10 AM, they mean it. I hardly waited. Doctor was fast to get to me, appointment took twenty minutes.

name: Andrew Leak
text: It took Apollo 8 sixty-one hours to get to moon from the earth in the 60s.... it took eye care associates over TWO weeks to send me a pair of glasses in 2018. You are well better off just walking to China, going to a glass shop, crafting your own lenses yourself, and then walk BACK to America.

name: David Roper
text: This place deserves 0 stars.  Parents beware before sending your students.  My son has very bad eyesight and requires his contacts daily.  After being referred to Dr. Corley, our son made an appointment and received trial contacts.  We ordered his contacts mid January and expected to receive them soon afterward.  This did not happen and no one from this office bothered to call us or check with our son.  He has been wearing trial contacts for four months and this office would have never contacted us.  I called them this morning (5/2/2018) after seeing my son last night.  He asked me when he would be getting his contacts.  I paid for the contacts in full in January.  This has to be the worst customer service I have ever experienced.

name: Kaitlyn Lewis
text: Friendly staff and educated doctors. The wait time was a little longer than I’d have liked but you’re going to wait for a doctor no matter where you go. This is a great, professional  eye doctor and I’ll continue to use Eyecare Associates.

name: Morgan Carter
text: I love this place !  First time ever going was last week, the staff is SUPER friendly. I enjoyed the doctor I saw. I would recommend this place to everyone !!!!

name: Robert Haraway
text: I have been going to Dr. Corley's office for over 5 years and have been very pleased with the professional service I have always received. The staff are friendly and helpful and Dr. Corley has always been very thorough and professional with my exams and has always taken time to answer all of my questions. I had a difficult time adjusting to progressive bifocal glasses at one point and the ladies fitting my glasses ordered new ones for me to try at no additional cost, and the 2nd lens was perfect. I would highly recommend this office to anyone needing a great eye doctor in a caring and friendly office.

name: Melia F.
text: I love Dr Corley but her staff is subpar. They only care about the money, not about Dr Corley's practice. Trying to get an appointment is nearly impossible and eye emergencies do not matter, you're on your own. Don't waste your time.

name: Heather Falls
text: I love Dr. Corley and the staff. I was extremely excited when I found out you guys participated with VSP insurance. I didn't want to have to see anyone else!! Dr. Corley has always been so amazing and has taken care of myself and my family for years. You all do an amazing job. Keep up the good work!! xo- Heather Jones

name: Nikki s
text: Awful. I came back four times and got the wrong prescription each time. I have paid $300 and asked for my money back because I still have not received my prescription. I was told that their services do not include the prescription being correct.

name: Erik Johnson
text: horrible.

name: Mattie Williams
text: Everyone is always friendly and welcoming! Dr Green answers your questions and doesn't evade the issue. Yay!!!

name: Eloise Harris
text: I am 78 and have had cataract surgery.  I was given a very thorough examination.  I had confidence in my doctor, and she gave me suggestions to help with dry eye and allergies.

name: Cassidy Ferguson
text: So glad I switched eye doctors . They were very nice and efficient.

name: jimmy walters
text: Very professional, top of the line equipment, very nice and top of the line staff. I will continue to use in the future and I highly recommend!

name: M J
text: Service was awesome from beginning to end. From the ladies in the front, to the techs and then the doctor!! Made me feel good about having to get glasses!

name: Milton Vick
text: Easy to deal wirh.  Nice friendly staff that is very knowledgeable and helpful.  Very caring too.

name: John David Barnes
text: Dr. Green is very knowledgeable, and it is obvious he stays on top of the latest technology and expertise. He recommended treatment which effectively arrested the progression of my son's nearsightedness.

name: Anthony
text: Dr Green is great.  But their glasses are too expensive in my opinion.  About $650 for progressive bifocals.

name: Aj Nixon
text: Very Nice Workers and take time.

name: Clara Criswell
text: Everyone is always so friendly. Great customer service.

name: Tedra Crowell
text: They are very gentle and patient with children.

name: Charles Reynolds
text: I had a very through eye exam by courteous technicians and a good experience. Dr. Green was very helpful with a concern that I had.

name: Russell Gaddy
text: Courteous and efficient staff. Dr. Green is knowledgeable and takes time to explain everything related to your eyesight.

name: stephanie havard
text: Wonderful, courteous people. Would highly recommend anyone to go see them for your eye care needs.

name: Craig Smith
text: Nice knowledgeable people and a great selection of frames...wish I had been going to them for years.

name: M D
text: Very Professional, explains everything in detail! Great service.

name: Brandon Arrigo

name: Brian Livingston
text:
Probably should be a 4.5 rating but didn't see that option...
A week after placing my order, I was informed the vendor that provides the polarized lenses is in the process of being changed and Lenscrafters is unable at the time to fulfill my order. However, Lenscrafters stepped up and did the right thing, maybe even more. They are providing me with a new set of frames and lenses with everything in the lenses I wanted except for the polarization without cost; and still will fulfill my original order once the new vendor is acquired. Unfortunately, that could take as much as 3 months...hopefully not. Now that's what I call stepping up to the plate!
Special shout out to the staff there...Melissa, Vicky, Mike and even the trainee (sorry, didn't get her name) were fantastic! Melissa did an excellent job explaining the issue and her honesty about it means I can trust in them for all my prescription lenses needs.
Now, let's just hope everything follows through as explained, which is up to Lenscrafters! Thanks for coming through for your customers Lenscrsfters!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. Our team is some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Chase Tillery
text: Absolutely love my glasses. The staff was super helpful in educating me on the different types of progressive lenses. 10/10 recommended

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

text: I went to LensCrafters to get my new prescription filled. I received excellent service. The salesperson was courteous, friendly, attentive to my needs, and helpful in making the right choices for my new eyeglasses.

text: Awesome service every time I visit Dr. Cook and All sales representative involved. I would recommend this LensCrafters any and every time

name: John Walter
text: I went there today and Melissa helped shape my glasses to fit better. She was so kind and professional. Thank you!

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for your review. We are excited to hear Melissa was able to help make your experience in LensCrafters a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Lee Tibbetts
text:
Bait and switch. Their system was down and couldn’t discuss price with insurance but they really pushed the polycarbonate lens, because they can make them in-house. Talked about plastic and was told they would have to be ordered. Also discussed the need for blue light filter, at which time there was no mention that the filter wasn’t available for plastic.

Get a call a few days later when system is back up and given a price and told blue light isn’t available in plastic lenses. According to the LensCrafters website and online ordering it IS available in plastic. I’ve always been suspicious of their charges and now I know to stay away.

Instead of showing us prices for what we asked just kept asking what our budget was like a used car salesperson.

Another example is when they put my son in Ray Ban branded lenses (most expensive) when we only asked for regular polycarbonate a few years ago.

If you want transparency and fair pricing just order from the LensCrafters website and take out the dishonest sales people.

resp.text: Hello Lee, thank you so much for sharing your experience. At LensCrafters our goal is to set the standard in quality in eye care and eyewear by ensuring every patient and customer has the best experience in every location every time. We apologize that our associates did not exceed your expectations during your visit.  Please go to https://www.luxotticacustomercare.com/lenscrafters to provide your information so we can contact you and work to resolve the issue.

name: Brad Thompson
text:
This was by far the best experience I’ve had at LensCrafters! Dr. Cook was fantastic and answered all my questions. He was very professional，detail oriented and friendly.

Melissa helped me find the right pair of glasses perfect for me. She was very quick and effective and immediately started crafting my new lenses. Extremely helpful in every way. She even brought out my new glasses to me as I was waiting in my car in less than 10 minutes!!!

The frontdesk was very friendly, warm and welcoming. They made sure to see that I was well taken care of and a happy satisfied customer.

Overall this entire team went above and beyond and I will continue to rave about this LensCrafters. Thank you all for making my experience go from night to day!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

text: Dr cook is awesome! I think the receptionist for dr cook is awful. Major attitude every time I call. I really don’t want to hear huffing and puffing over the phone if I have a question - it’s so unprofessional. If you hate talking to people that much, find another job.

text: You guys need to close this location. Very bad customer service. Believe me.
