name: Susan Duthie
text: Dr. FERRELL, is wonderful, and a very thorough, experienced, intelligent eye doctor. The staff are very kind, knowledgeable, Patient, and helpful. I have gone here for years, and it is always clean, professionally decorated, and up-to-date, too, in furnishings, and eye care equipment and technology. I highly recommend Dr. FERRELL, and "Bailey Cove Eye Care".

name: Keith Dill
text: Really great eye care. I have been going here for many years. Dr. Ferrell is very thorough and friendly, and the staff has always been competent and efficient. Highly recommended.

name: Denise Mann Schmidt
text: I am not a regular patient here and I walked in with extreme eye pain. They took me in and took care of me as if they knew me showing true care and compassion. I will be back and I will sing their praise.

name: Sherry R
text: Very professional and courteous staff. Doctor and staff take the time to answer and explain all questions. Highly recommend.

name: Patricia Andrews
text: From the moment you walk thru the door till you leave is a wonderful experience.  Caring and patient staff and a very nice selection of frames. Dr Chenault is my optometrist and she is amazing. She takes her time and doesn't rush you through the exam. Highly recommend.

name: Russ Lowrey
text: Dr. Ferrell and his staff were kind enough to see me as a new patient, on short notice to expertly remove a foreign body from my eye. He did a great job and cured my problem... I highly recommend him and his office.

name: Talley Laflamme
text: Everyone is so nice here. Been going here at least 10 years.

name: Jimmy Guarin
text: Dr Ferrell and his staff are outstanding. I started going to Dr Ferrell several years ago because of eye pressure issues. With his care, my pressures are under control. Dr Ferrell is constantly upgrading his diagnostic equipment to stay on the cutting edge of eye care. His entire staff is pleasant and extremely efficient. Big shout out to their contact lens specialist, Heather, for getting me into the best contact lenses I had in over 40 years. If you are in need of top quality eye care, I strongly recommend  Bailey Cove Eye Care. Jimmy G

name: Mark W.
text: Wish I had been going here all along. Everyone is so nice, extremely helpful and very professional. The most thorough eye care I've had. Just a great experience all around.

name: Sue Little
text: Amazing staff. Friendly and helpful. Dr. Ferrell is very friendly, a great listener, and a great doctor. The glasses selection is very nice. I highly recommend!!!

name: Tina Cranor

name: Ben Click
text: Thorough examination done by highly qualified staff. Friendly, helpful and professional.

name: Adele Lyford
text: I loved the professional qualities of my technician (Ashley?). The new doctor (Dr. C) is extremely nice. I didn't like the price of my glasses ($600!), but I needed to replace my progressive lens glasses, and I guess the options I needed are pricey. I didn't like the children running wild through the hallways.

name: Leslie Miller

They quickly get you into the exam and efficiently move you through the steps of the examination. I highly recommend this practice for your eye care needs.

name: Lisa Bruton

name: Zuset Worland
text: Amazing staff, friendly and professional. My baby feel very comfortable with his new doctor. The doctor was very nice on each way trying to complete all his eye  exams for a two years old — Nothing at all easy !

name: jeff thomas
text: Great service, took me in on a moments notice.

name: Jennifer Cagle

The eye wear staff were incredibly helpful and I liked all their choices for my new frames! Definitely recommend this practice!!

I would recommend these people to anyone & everyone looking for the best eye care in this area; & genuinely wish all health care professionals operated at this level of service.

text: I had been using a different eye care provider for the past several years and due to the COVID-19 situation and timing of needing an eye exam, I searched out a new provider and found Bailey Cove Eye Care.  I am so glad I did.  You really feel valued when you come in and they are very friendly and professional.  There’s no wasted time in examining you and determining what will work best for you.  It’s like if Chick-Fil-A was my eye doctor.  I will definitely be using Bailey Cove Eye Care in the future and sincerely appreciate the care I received.

This is a very customer oriented company and I'm sure anyone would be as delighted a me to visit!! Highly recommend!!

I appreciate them!

text: I had a very pleasant eye appointment at this office.  The staff are friendly, helpful and professional and made me feel as if I was a long time client even though it was my first visit here!  I will definitely be coming back for all of my vision needs.

name: Susan Lewis

name: Bill Pope

name: Mitzi García-Lovio
text: I enjoyed my initial visit here, and look forward to making Bailey Cove Eye Care my primary go to for eye care.  They were thorough, professional and extremely friendly.  Thank you!

name: Susan Ledbetter
text: Always responsive and caring. Dr. Ferrell has made my eyes happy for years. Wouldn't go elsewhere.

name: Sarah Ethridge
text:
I have had the best experience with Bailey Cove Eye Care! I took my 5
year old daughter there in July for her first full eye exam with Dr. Chenault after a flagged vision screening at her school. Everyone has been great there but I specifically want to mention Dr. Chenault and her patience and thoroughness with my daughter and also Faith who has been extremely kind, helpful, and patient. Faith ordered several different frames for my daughter when we found that all of the in-stock frames were too big for her small face. She also contacted the lens lab when we had a prescription change just a few months after the original and was able to get the new lenses at no charge to us. We have been very pleased with our experience at Bailey Cove Eye Care!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Sarah! It's always a pleasure serving wonderful families like yours!

name: MeMe McComb
text: Wonderful and friendly staff.  Service awesome

name: Elizabeth Ross
text: My first visit at this office was great. The second time around, not so much! At my first visit I was told retina scans only needed to be done every 5 years. When I went in for my second visit I was told they needed to be taken again “so something could be looked at.” Red flag #1 because nothing was mentioned about the “something” during the first visit. During my contact fitting I mentioned and even showed my insurance and what it stated, questioning what I paid the previous year because it said my contacts would be covered IN FULL if they were Davis vision contacts, THREE people discussed it and determined that the contacts I was getting were in fact Davis vision contacts but I was only allotted a $150 credit? Red flag #2! I should have demanded them to re-read my insurance because I knew something wasn’t right but I thought “I’m at the eye doctor, if anyone knows about eye insurance it should be them, right?” On my way home I called my insurance and explained everything, they said that my contacts should have been ordered through them and would have been covered 100% and that I also shouldn’t have paid the charge to have my “chart updated.” They even called Bailey Cove and explained everything for me. Insurance said I’d be getting a call about my refund for the chart update fee the following day, which I did, but I missed the call. When I called back the person who called was busy with a patient but I was told I could give my CC number to them and they would give it directly to her to refund my money. Red flag #3!!! A few days later I had multiple charges on my credit card, one being Netflix! I called to ask who had access to my credit card number and expressed my concern, considering that I hadn’t used the card in 3+ months prior to the eye doctor, I was left to feel like it was my fault that my number had been stolen and that it wasn’t anyone at their office because the shredded it. I left it at that and just said I was done with that office. Or so I thought, I received a text the other day stating my contacts needed to be picked up. I called to say that I had already received the contacts I ordered and wondered what was going on, they said my account had a $150 balance and I had contacts up front (which were NOT ordered by me). It was at the end of the day and I was told I would be called back with more information so I figured it would be the next day before I heard back. 2 days later and still nothing. This office is completely clueless!!

name: Ash F
text: I needed a great set of glasses and Kathy in the optical really did a wonderful job finding just the right frame, lens, and coatings so that I can see well with little glare.  It was a little more expensive than a commercial place but the quality and personal attention was so much better.  I would recommend this place to anyone.

name: Bill Sumners
text: Great eye care , they actually care about your eye health..great personnel too..

name: Privee Sure
text: Total waste of my time and money. I will NEVER go here again.  My opinion is that they are incompetent in many areas and extremely overpriced.

name: Amanda Key
text: Wonderful doctor and staff! This was my first experience, and they are great! They are so patient, and brought me back several times to ensure I got the best fit for my eyes. I will be bringing my daughter in for her first exam in the near future. So glad I made the switch to Bailey Cove Eye Care!

name: Karen Perreault
text: I was very impressed with the care and kindness I received. Will continue to go there

name: Greg Grabarek
text:
Never Told about extra charge for Retina scan.I was measured and fitted by some one not experienced. I was never offered to have my lens's polished and ground. I remembered the next morning and called back to find out they tried to contact me about an additional charge not on the original invoice. When i picked up my glasses the lens were tinted which i declined when asked. They are useless when your driving. I called the insurance company to investigate. I did get a refund of $35.00. When I picked the glasses up, I was fitted by the same employee who walked me to a corner and checked my fit while standing. I'm 6'3". I did some adjusting on my own. I checked on sunglasses which i was told wouldn't be covered by insurance. I was quoted over $600 for sun glasses. I went somewhere else. I was told insurance will cover up to 20 percent on any number of pairs of glasses i wanted. My cost was half their quoted price.
I understand about someone in training. I question their timing of her in front of customers.

resp.text:
Mr. Grabarek: Thank you for bringing your concerns to us. We do stand behind our products and services. We will have our Optical Manager contact you regarding your experience and see how we can satisfy any unmet needs you may have.
We would like to address a few things here, which you mention above:
-Although we did have a relatively new employee working with you, we did have a more experienced optician assisting with the process, who looked over her work during your fitting and looked over everything after as well. It was our understanding that you did request transition lenses, which creates a slight tint to the lenses even when they are not triggered by UV radiation into the sunglass-like appearance. We would be more than happy to remake those lenses at no charge to you to remove the transitions.
-Regarding the retinal photos- On the new patient paperwork, which you signed, we do notify you of our intention to take retinal photographs:
"We take routine retinal photographs of all new patients to help with disease detection and management, as well as to help establish baseline retinal and optic nerve health and appearance.  These pictures are not covered by many insurance plans but we feel that they help significantly in the care of our patients."
We do try and also provide verbal notice to our patients as well: this was the cause of your $35 refund. Please be aware that you have the right to decline this service, although it is recommended.
-Regarding the sunglasses: We do follow VSP's 20% coverage for any second pairs of glasses or sunglasses you wish to purchase. We even go a step further by having an additional 20% (total of 40% discount) removed from you total if the purchase is done within 30 days of the first pair. However, you were looking at our Maui Jim and Costa sunglasses, specifically. These two lines do not allow us to utilize any insurance discounts for their merchandise, per our contract with them, and they set the pricing 100%: frames, lenses, and all.
We hope the combination of the above explanations and the additional contact of our optical manager will help you. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us via a phone call or drop by our office if you would like further assistance.

name: Wayne Douglas
text: Always great caring visits. Dr Ferrell,and entire staff are wonderful

name: traci ray
text: Bailey Cove Eye Care is a highly professional, caring place that I'd recommend to anyone. They are friendly, quick, and give great service. Dr James Ferrell spends a lot of time with you to make sure that you understand what's going on. They seem to really care about the patients.

name: TurboV6Firebird
text: i got there before my apt time and they had me in and out by my appointment time. clean facility, friendly staff. they also sell some nice sunglasses. if I ever have eye problems again, I will definitely go there again.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Bailey Cove Eye Care, and for your lovely review! We are glad you had a good experience with us. Have a nice day!

name: samantha schrimsher
text: I absolutely love the staff and doctor! This was my 4 year olds first time having a eye check up and he was so comfortable! They are really helpful with frames and lenses as well! I would definitely recommend using them!!

name: Aisha
text: I have been going here for over five years now. The staff is very helpful and the providers do a great job.

name: Peyton Walker
text: Wish I could leave less than one star. My husband went in for an appointment as a new patient (I have been a patient for years). He turned in his insurance info at the beginning and no one said “you are not covered under either of these plans.” Once he finished his appointment, they charged him $171 and filed the claim under an insurance coverage called “Visio” (I am not aware of having any such insurance). I called after he left to ask where they Visio insurance info came from and was very polite in my inquiry. An intern answered the phone and thought she put it on mute, but did not. When she passed my question along, the staff response was “ugh, we are so understaffed today, I don’t have time to deal with that”. I promptly hung up the phone and will never go back to this place of business. My question was not ridiculous, rude, and I believe paying $171 is worth the time it takes to ask a question or two. So rude.

resp.text: Peyton, we are very sorry to hear about this experience. An office manager will reach out to you today to discuss this situation with you, and see if we can resolve the issues you have brought to light for us. Please accept our most sincere apologies.

name: Brianna Thornberry
text: Dr. Chenault and the staff at Bailey cove Eye care have always been sooo good to me! I called on Friday with vision loss and they got me in immediately I was only there for 20 min before being sent straight to a specialist same day! I’m so thankful for the way they have always helped me!

name: Toby LeDesma
text: Outstanding, the VA sent me here for glasses and I promise you everyone was super courteous and pleasant. After wearing glasses for 45 years this is by far one the best experiences by far. No crazy add ons just straightforward what you need.

name: Brittany Hill
text: Absolutely wonderful! Today was my first visit with Bailey Cove Eye Care. I was extremely nervous and a little concerned. I have never had vision problems and now that I do, I want to make sure I am taking the correct actions and trusting the right people. Immediately I noticed how friendly the staff are. They don't rush you at all. They are so polite and I did not have to wait long. Since I am a new patient, they had a lot of tests to perform. The staff explained each test accurately so I knew what to expect. I saw Dr. Chenault. She was awesome! She explained everything she was telling me and allowed me to ask questions. They are very thorough and make sure you get the right prescription for your eyes. When it came to picking out my frames, I have no clue what I was doing. The staff helped me pick a frame that I would not have picked for myself, but I love it. I highly recommend Dr. Chenault and her staff. I can't wait for my glasses to come in!

name: Jason Zemaitis
text: We gave our insurance information upon scheduling a first visit appt for our son. They had to reschedule us do to the doctor taking a day off, so we waited over three weeks to be seen. They waited until I was standing at the desk with papers in hand and my son missing school to say we would have to pay out of pocket because they are not in network with our vision insurance! Terrible communication and unnecessary waste of time.

name: Bryce Anderson
text: Nice enough folks but I couldn't get them to listen to my needs.  I went back twice to get the Rx right and it still isnt right.  I'll actually have to pay out of pocket to go to another Dr.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear you are having trouble with your prescription - we are happy to work until the prescription is right. There are two doctors at our practice, and could have a different doctor see you if you would prefer. Please call our office and chat with us about the issues you are having: 256-880-3200

name: Greg Brock
text: Went in search of prescription sunglasses for riding my motorcycle. They had exactly what I was looking for. They were preferred providers for my insurance and Kathi gave me excellent service. I highly recommend them.

name: Ralph Cantrell
text:
Bailey Cove Eye Care is a 5 star business for sure. My wife, children and I have been going to Dr Ferrell for many years for all of our eye care needs. He is very competent, thorough and personable. Dr Mary Beth Chenault also practices there. I have seen her also and wouldn't hesitate to use her again should Dr Ferrell be unavailable for some reason. They are both great eye doctors and together are a team you can trust completely.

As a matter of fact, the entire staff has treated us like family. They have always communicated very well and have even handled all of our insurance matters without a hiccup. There is a down-home feel to the place and it is a one-stop shop for everything from the exam to providing the contacts and/or glasses. Once I sat on my new glasses and destroyed them and they just gave me another pair.

Thanks, Bailey Cove Eye Care!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Ralph! It's great patients like you and your family that make it easy for us to be so friendly. Have a great day!

name: Cris Taniguchi
text: Friendly and professional stuff

name: bobby riley
text: Friendly and helpful staff, who love their craft.

name: Laurie Holbert
text: Called the office and left a message to schedule my first appointment, never received a call back.

resp.text: Hello Laurie, our apologies! We did have one message that we couldn't quite get all of the information from.  If you could give us your phone number, we would be happy to call and schedule with you.

name: Louisa G
text: I was willing to overlook that they are very slow and somewhat overpriced until they refused to repair or replace a lens that their office staff damaged.I hope to save someone else the hassle and cost of going here.

name: Him

name: Lawrence Jurgens
text: My family has received great care by Dr. Vaughn for many seasons and from her staff as well. They are excellent.

resp.text: Thank you! We are happy to have you as our patient!

name: Matthew Holder
text:
Best combination of professionalism and personableness I have seen at an eye care center.  Every staff member I interacted with was congenial, competent, and willing to answer all of my questions.

The doctor gave me one of the most (if not the most) thorough exams I have ever had, and was warm, friendly, and flexible enough to address all my concerns and meet my needs.

In addition to the above, the facility was physically and olfactorily clean and pleasant.

resp.text: Thank you! We are pleased to hear that you had a great experience with us and glad to have you as our patient.

name: C Lewis
text: Dr Vaughn is great at what she do, very professional, knowledgeable and friendly. Very nice office environment (modern and well kept) and her staff is warm and caring that treat their patients like family!  Highly recommend.

name: Robert Stewart
text: My first prescription. Life improved. Thank you!!

resp.text: We are glad we helped improved your vision!

name: The Traveling Family
text: Awesome just freaking awsome. If you haven't been here to have your eyes looked at you are missing out on something great. This doctor is Awesome!

name: Maxine Starks
text: Service was great! Staff was friendly. Plan to continue to use.

name: SIERRA DENISE BOOKER
text: I love them! They will go all out to make sure you have the best care!

name: Kenneshia Walker
text: Everyone there are Always nice, even on the phone

name: Yvonne Herron
text: New address 1628 29th Ct S, Homewood, AL 35209

name: Charlie Mack
text: Awesome ,excellent service with a smile

name: Albertina Page
text:
This visit was very good. Front desk staff not the best in personalities. Paperwork ask to consent to information you haven’t received. Like the wagon before the horse. Nothing is explained until after you’ve had your vitals taken.  Then you’re escorted to the Dental exam area.

This Dentist was a Dentist Doctor. Very caring and knows her profession. I really liked her consulting with another Dentist for confirmation on a life living outcome.

Previous visit was terrible. Front desk staff a little bit more informative but not friendly. Fake if you’re having a bad day but greet with courtesy.  Then my iPhone was stolen. They denied seeing me with the phone. But the find my phone app located the phone in their office Sarrell until 9pm that night.

The next day after they opened only one staff (Latino) member took me back and showed she was trying to help.The others shrugged their noses as I know you were here but it is if no relevance to me.

The dentist male had been rude and told me I could go to another Dental Office anytime . As if I didn’t have knowledge of that.  I’m a retired Nurse of 35 years . Not only Med Surg but Surgery also and Medical offices.

Not asking anything but children can be traumatized by Doctors of all specialty. I had 3 children there and when I told them we had to go back it was a nightmare.

Finally I promised if that same Doctor was there we would leave if no one else would see them.
Overall this Dentist was #5 the best.

resp.text: Albertina, Thank you for your feedback. f you'd like to talk more about this, please send an email with your contact information to feedback@greatdentalplans.com.

name: Holly Knighten
text: I absolutely love Sarrell Dental. My daughter has had quite a few teeth pulled, top and bottom spacers put in and eye testing done. Each time we've been they have been very respectful to us. They take the time to make sure my daughter is comfortable and isn't feeling any pain. Wait time in the lobby has never been longer than 10-15 minutes and time in the back has never been longer than about 25-30 minutes. They are very considerate of my daughter when she goes and have always talked her through any process of what they have to do. We will always be a loyal Sarrell customer.

resp.text: Holly, thank you for taking the time to leave us this review! We really appreciate the kind feedback. Its great to hear that you and your daughter continue to enjoy your experience with us!

name: Charena Noland
text: The staff is kind and caring. My child has had several procedures and they made sure he was calm and comfortable they were very patient with him and answered any questions I had.

name: Jahmillia Owens
text: My daughter had a very bad experience with her previous dentist she was terrified to go to a Dentist!! We went here and the staff and the Dentist was so great they made her so comfortable and explained the procedure step by step!! Needless to say she is NO longer afraid of the dentist!! Great Place

name: Stevie Acker
text: This is the best dentist office that you can go to Miss B is just absolutely fantastic the staff is absolutely fantastic my kids will not go to another dentist I am highly recommended this

text: Second time scheduling appointments for my kids, we get there and the door is locked and no answer when I called. Second time having to take off work and check the kids out of school. Neither time did I receive a call or any notification of whatever the situation may be or to reschedule. I am absolutely furious😡

resp.text:
Ebony,
We apologize that you had this experience and we understand your frustration with this situation. We'd like to talk with you more about what happened. Please send and email to feedback@greatdentalplans.com with your contact information and a member of our team will be in touch. Thank you!

text: This place is terrible! The staff is very rude and they do not help you at all! I get that you have to wait at a dentists office but this place makes you wait 6 hours! I would recommend any other place but this one! Actually I would recommend not getting your teeth fixed at all than going to this place!! Send your kid to a decent dentist office!

text: I love this place 100% they all are very friendly and do a great job with the kids

resp.text: Jennifer, thank you for taking the time to leave us such a kind review!

name: Jorxxdrip
text: I've had 2 bad experiences with sarell dental but this last one was awful. My boys have been going for 6 years too. This dentist was a male and he at first was very friendly and encouraging. He numbed my babies gums and the gave him a shot to numb him. I  knew he would cry bc he did before. But the dentist said to him, why are you still crying, I'm not even touching it anymore. Are you gonna cry or man up. Then the dentist started trying to loosen my babies tooth bc it had to be pulled. This part was ok, he was calm and the assistant was encouraging. Then he changed tools and began to pry and my baby screamed from the top of his lungs because he felt the pain. The dentist fusses at him saying it's numb you don't feel anytginh!!😲 I am 40 and I recently had to have a 2 teeth pulled and I still felt it after my numb shot. I asked my baby afterwards did he feel the pain and be said yes. I feel so bad for not protecting him and telling the dentist to stop. My baby looked at me like he wanted to ask why I didn't help him. The staff is amazing but don't know about dentist.

resp.text: Nikki, we value your loyalty to our clinic and apologize for your recent disappointment. We are looking into this and would be happy to talk with you more. Please reach out to us at patientadvocate@greatdentalplans.com with the best way to contact you so we can be in touch. Thank you for your feedback.

name: Shaq Davis
text: I love the staff here!

name: teresa moore
text: They will not schedule appt on a timely manner they call and want you to come that day or wait another month or two and wait time is long when you can get appt

resp.text: Teresa, we would first like to apologize for this experience. While it is not our choice to make patients wait long periods of time for an appointment, that is often an issue beyond our control. It is our policy to alert patients of any last minute cancelations and/or openings in our schedule in effort to remedy this issue and provide timely appointments. We prioritize patients experiencing pain, and work them in for same day appointments when possible. We are looking into this situation and would like to know more. Please reach out to us by sending an email to patientadvocate@greatdentalplans.com, so we can discuss in more detail. We appreciate your feedback.

name: Fenix Owens
text: We Love Dr. B !! She is amazing !!!

name: Tristian “Willis” Grove
text: Best customer service.

name: Jessica
text: Do y’all check children’s eye my son is 3 and a eye place somewhere in Tuscaloosa wants to send him to Birmingham cause he got one eye that is lazy and the other eye is gonna right and don’t have time to go to Birmingham need a place to take him to in Tuscaloosa instead

resp.text: Jessica, we do provide eye care in Tuscaloosa. Please give us a call and we will be happy to set up an appointment with our optometrist for your son!

name: charlene allen
text: Employees are extremely nice and helpful! Dr. Campbell-awesome, easy to talk to and listened to all my concerns! The young guy that helped me pick out my frames had excellent taste and was fun to shop with! My glasses were ready super fast! Will definately recommend to my friends!

name: Jessica
text: I’ve been coming here for years and it’s always been great. Today’s visit though was one of the best I’ve ever experience! The staff was super friendly, and I’ve never had an exam done in such a timely manner before! Keep being amazing!

name: Carson Blankenship
text: I have been a patient here for years & have had nothing but wonderful and satisfactory experiences. I just ordered contacts over the phone because I live In a new city, and Ms. Terrish went ABOVE AND BEYOND to help me. She was funny, professional, & kind. I cannot give this employee or this business enough praise! Thank you so much!

name: Brittnee Serda
text: I brought my daughter in this morning for a eye app. It was her 2nd one and Marcus the guy who checked us in and walked us to the room made sure to make my daughter feel comfortable and calm her nerves. I really appreciate the service. Thank you so much for being friendly and sweet. ❤️ Will definitely go back.

name: FUU CHAN
text:
They checked my eyesight very carefully and examined me. Also, when I chose eyeglasses, I had a lot of choices and it was a good opportunity. It is highly recommended to adjust the glasses here.

You need to make a reservation by phone.

name: alfred keely
text: When we made the appointment for the eye exam, we were told that we didn't have to get our glasses from them. I have used the eye doctor there in the past, and was happy with the quality of the exam. I went there today for my appointment,  and the doctor side was excellent. Then I was escorted to the eyeglass side. When I told them I wasn't getting glasses today, and asked for my PD, they refused to give me that information. Then she said something really brilliant. That that measurement is only for their lab, and it varies from one lab to another. REALLY!  The distance from center to center of my pupils is the same wherever it gets measured. My wife is seriously ill, and a  $500.00 pair of glasses isn't possible. She was rude. I'll never go back.

name: Jaelene Rivera
text: Been there for almost 3 or 4 years and still worth to come here. Fantastic customer service and Friendly staff. I love to come here and I love my glasses so much!

name: Linda Martinez
text: Ashley was the most helpful and kind associate ever.  Quick service with a smile!  Highly recommend

name: Carey Frasier
text: Love this place.... so so helpful. lots of style and smile..

name: Stacy Wilborn
text:
I have purchased regular glasses, prescription sunglasses, safety glasses, and my four year old step son's glasses from Marx Optical. Every time I have come to Marx Optical, I have had a perfect experience! They have always been so helpful in answering all of my questions. Kathy has been there on every visit of mine. She is always so good to us, and completely on top of her game. I've noticed her assisting others, multitasking and always prompt, and with a great attitude. I have had Sabrina assist me, she is so helpful and not only brightened my day, but seemed to do the same with everyone else she encountered. And when I brought my step son to get his glasses, I had the assistant of Lindsey and she was so patient and great with him. He has a more complicated prescription and she showed us more options for frames that won't break as easily (considering he's four and full of energy)

I highly recommend Marx Optical! They're quick and will treat you right!

name: Ryan Day
text: I was in Decatur for a weekend in January for a family funeral, coming from out of town, and I stupidly forgot both my glasses and extra daily contacts.  Marx Optical was kind enough to provide me with two days' worth of trial daily contacts at no charge to help me out.  I would highly recommend.  Very nice people.

name: Ulonda Barker
text: My experience with this business have been a terrible one,  after purchasing lens for my glasses on 9/19/2019. On 8/11/2020 used curbside service for glasses last repaired for only tighting frame and prior service for exact same routine service from date of purchase. I returned on 8/21/2020 to curbside service based on one leg cracked, due to frame was tighten to tight to end up with a cracked len. In discussing issue with Service Tech,  I was told to replace len would cost me $125 and their would be nothing else Marx Optical could do. I consider my service that was rendered is a rip off based on less than a year from 9/19/2019 intial purchase and finding  my len cracked in my glass case as I put glasses onto my face for breakfast and service rendered for glasses tighted on 8/11/2020. Personally doing business with inconsiderate respect for it's customers.  Is very disgraceful.

name: Mark Thomason
text: Dr. B does an amazing job of dialing in my prescription. I have tried several other places over the years (we moved) but now I travel back to Decatur to see Dr. B every year. The glasses I got from other places were a waste of money. I ended up coming back to Marx and had them install new lens in my old frames. I will never trust anyone with my eyesight other than Dr. B again.

name: John Kearse
text: I LOVED MY EXPERIENCE WITH THE GREAT WOMEN AT MARX OPTICAL. FROM THE RECEPTIONISTS, TO MY LOVELY DOCTOR, DOWN TO THE ASSISTANTS AND REPRESENTATIVES HANDLING THE FITTINGS. I FELT LIKE FAMILY, NOT ANOTHER CUSTOMER AND WOULD RECOMMEND ANYONE GOING THERE TO GET GREAT STYLISH GLASSES AND TO FEEL LIKE HOME WITH TONS OF SMILES & LOVE AS WELL!!! I ALSO LOVED MY FITTING WITH MS. KRISTINA H. SHE WAS WONDERFUL!!!

name: Tonja Crisler
text: Recently had an appointment and even though they were in the middle of construction I don't have 1 complaint! It was totally the opposite, they were extremely nice and helpful. The staff went over and beyond for me  I give them 5 full stars. 😊

name: Will Wright
text: I have bought glasses from Kathy before, but it is always a pleasure to deal with her at the front desk. I had Sandy wait on me this time and she was very nice,  pleasant and professional to work with. Gail came over and assisted and it was all a pleasure. I’m always appreciative of the service I have got, and this year was no different.

name: Vann Morrow
text: Have always gotten courteous , professional service every time I have been here . Even today with the curbside service for just a frame repair , in the rain, everyone was absolutely great !

name: monwitt
text: Pam and Sabrina did a great job helping me pick out my frames. I felt like family right when they started working with me. I would definitely recommend my friends and family to go see these awesome professionals. Wonderful customer service is greatly appreciated!!!

name: Jeannabeanna Stephens
text: Dr. Brock was wonderful! All the people there are super nice and service is quick. Prices are very reasonable. I will be using them from now on.

name: christopher odell
text: Awsome place prices up there but the people did a great and look good to

name: Pamela W Radford
text: The last three times that I have had to get glasses a wonderful young woman named, Sabrina, has helped me and she is a fantastic person!!!!!  Not only was Sabrina so gosh dang funny she was extremely helpful in helping me choose the right glasses for me.  I vote for Sabrina to get a raise 😁.  Now I am truly promoting Sabrina here but make no mistake.....every person at Marx Optical has been a pleasure to deal with.  I have been going to Marx Optical for the past 7/8 years and I have never had a bad experience. The people are truly great!  Thank you, Pamela W Radford

name: April Bendall Woods
text: LaRhonda is the sweetest, nicest and most helpful employee there. She always goes above and beyond to help and she’s very knowledgeable about their services and glasses/contacts. Marx Optical is lucky to have such a great employee.

name: Local 360
text: Wow! Great service! I came in 30 minutes from closing with a broken arm on my VA issued glasses. The staff took them to the back & they were able to repair the glasses and didn't charge me! How great is that for on the spot service! I can see again!

name: Theduis Booth
text:
I had a great experience today in Marx optical, in Decatur. Every one was so nice, and polite.
I must give a special thanks to Ja, she literally took her to help me pick out frames. She never rushed me. Thank you Ja so much for sticking with me.

name: Mackenzie Thrasher
text: This first time glasses wearer is HAPPY! Sabrina and Pam were so helpful and awesome to work with! A love working with a good honest sales team that doesn’t push for the most expensive merchandise! My visit was effortless!

name: Brandon McNutt
text: I visited here for a routine visit. I was helped by one Miss Sabrina who was absolutely fabulous! She took care of me from start to finish and made sure I felt like family the whole time! She was easy to talk to and made me feel comfortable! I would highly recommend this place and I am so thankful for having such a wonderful person like Sabrina that helped me through it all! Not to mention that Dr. Harris was extremely professional and helpful during his evaluation! With the help of Miss Kelly I was able to get an awwsome brand new pair of glasses. I would recommend this place for all your eye Care needs!!

name: Brooke cummings
text: Sabrina was extremely helpful. She was truthful and honest and patient when I tried on every pair and was even nicer when I came to each age because the first pair I bought I didn't love. She's the best! As long as she is there I will always come back.

name: Cyndi Ludwick
text: If you want EXCELLENT customer service, see Sabrina!! She helped me with my glasses today and she is by far the sweetest associate I have EVER met!!! She was honest on what looked good..(and didn’t) on me and was also conscious of my pocketbook!!! I think Marx Optical needs to give her a raise!!!

name: Jo-Amrah Dillingham
text: Lindsey Albright was amazing to work with today. Professional, friendly. No doubt she knew what she was doing. I really appreciated the way she was able to fix my glasses which had been frustrating me for some time. Top quality service. I will return!

name: Faith Rose
text: My experience was amazing. The whole team treated me like family. The really sweet one that helped me her name was Mrs. Sabrina she was so helpful and she really found me a pair of glasses the fit my face very well and that were very nice.😊😊😊😊

name: Rhonda Stoner
text: I cannot say enough fabulous things about this place! The exam staff is efficient and kind. The optical department rocks! All of them! Sabrina helped us today. She is a love! Leidy was in training and she is going to be top-notch as well! It was great to see Miss Linda who has been around for a while and is always a sweetheart. I did not mention everyone by name, but they the staff is wonderful.

name: Ashlea Osborn
text: Kristina H was OUTSTANDING !! She helped us save a whole bunch of money and made our decision better. We was more satisfied with her help then we was when we was looking and we getting help from another lady. She helped us save almost three hundred dollars that we really did not have to spend . We was so stressed about finding some and paying for it but she helped a whole lot. She definitely needs to be recognized !!!!! She explained everything and told us all of our opinions!!

name: Truck Driver
text: 2nd visit in 2 years. I walked in, was given a paper to fill out,.wven though I told them nothing had changed.  Once I finished with completing the paperwork I was taken into a to and again went through the process of putting the info into the computer.  What good is being redundant with this. Also, prior to visit, I was bombarded with text messages on if I planned to make the appointment on time. Place is pathetic!

resp.text:
We are sincerely disappointed your experience with us was not great. Rest assured, your experience and feedback is appreciated in our pursuit of continuously improving the ability to serve.

You are correct, we do currently include up to two reminders prior to visitation, depending on how far in advance you have scheduled. However, this is certainly a feature you can opt-out from as we respect the differing opinions our patients may have with regards to reminders.

Regarding the paperwork and entry into the computer, this is definitely a point at which we are actively looking to streamline, importantly, without sacrificing vital information our Doctors require to provide a high standard of care.

We certainly realize this will not correct your experience, but we genuinely hope you understand our intention is to take your feedback and work harder for all future experiences.

Thank you,
MARX OPTICAL

name: Teiana Walker
text: I had a great experience at Marx Optical from the eye exam to picking out my frames Gail and Joshua were absolutely amazing making sure I looked my best in my glasses. And Kelly was exceptional with the fitting of my glasses. Best place in town to get your eyes checked out. I will also share this on my Facebook because I am a satisfied customer of Marx Optical!!!

name: Vashta Nerada
text: I have never had the pleasure of being helped so efficiently before today’s visit. Terrish was being trained by Sabrina today and they were wonderful, knowledgeable, and so friendly. They made this visit a 5-star event.

name: David Watson
text: Sabrina made my experience at Marx absolutely wonderful.  I was ready to order my glasses on-line because they were much cheaper than the price she originally quoted.  Sabrina told me to hold on a second and let her discuss my reluctance with her superiors.  She came back with a price considerably lower than the online price. I will be requesting Sabrina next year, and hopefully many years to come

name: Ala Bama
text: I visited Marx Optical in Decatur and overheard an employee out front refer to customers as “Love” and she was constantly popping her gum. This drove me crazy listening to it while I waited. I can’t imagine being her coworker and having to listen to the gum popping all day and as a customer, don’t call me “Love.” So unprofessional!!!

name: Tristan Smith
text: Sabrina greeted us with a big ole’ smile right when we walked in. The atmosphere was great and everyone was very welcoming. Got to checkout and it went very smoothly and with Sabrina seeing us off! Great staff!

name: Nathaniel Snow
text: My company sent me to Marx Optical to get my glasses. When I walked I asked the receptionist do my company cover my glasses expense. The other receptionist name Sabrina said what. Like had me in really doubt that my company didn’t do that, but she was only kidding around with me. Then she was sent to help me pick out my glasses. She was really helpful with me to pick out the glasses I would be really satisfied with.  Thanks Sabrina

name: Elfa Arocho
text: We love Sabrina Gibson! She is one of the sweetest most helpful person among your staff! Thanks Marx Optical for a friendly, helpful staff, and competitive prices!

text: I was a walk-in they got me right in for a eye exam and glasses.  I was shocked as to how well the workers worked together and how much they did to have everything ready for the doctor to do the exam. I went to the other side to get a pair of glasses. I had the pleasure of meeting Sabrina she was super nice and very helpful. Sabrina made the experience fun.

name: Janet Wilkinson
text:
10-30-18-Kristina was a very helpful person & she was very easy to work with in giving her expertise knowledge on getting my lens for my glasses. Love working with people who are knowledgeable & pleasant to work. Linda was able to adjust my glasses so they fit. Her knowledge & willingness to work with my older frames was excellent!
Thank you both.

name: Faye Spivey
text:
I usually deal with Marsha when I visit Marx.
She is always so kind and helpful! Her personality is contagious! She is just super!! She knows what I like when it come to frames for my face shape and always picks the ones she knows I will like.
The staff here does a great job!!

name: April Thompson
text: My Husband is a patient of Marx Optical and I accompanied him at his visit. I was so impressed with the staff as well as the warm, inviting and professional setting, I decided to setup one for myself. My appointment was with the kind, humble and calm speaking Dr. Graham. From the moment I entered the office, I never once felt like just a "Patient" The caring environment and effortlessly prompt service made me feel as if I were being taken care of by FAMILY. And oh my goodness the charismatic and professional 3 ladies by the names of Sabrina, Leidy  and (one other sweet lady who said such uplifting and kind words to me whose name I apologetically forgot 😔❤) are 3 of many reason I'd strongly suggest you go visit the Marx Optical family! I promise.. You won't be disappointed. 😀😀😀

name: Kearstin Wright
text: Sabrina Gibson was amazing! She asked what kind I liked and ran with it. When I found the glasses I liked she went the extra mile to order them in a different color so they would be perfect!

name: Rebecca Bray
text: Sabrina is your woman y'all. Amazing job with helping me find what suited my face. The doctor was excellent as well!

name: rolando mcclain
text: By far the best experience I’ve ever had getting an eye exam. Sabrina Gibson did an awesome job assisting us today. We were in and out in a very timely manner. We will definitely be back.

text: Had a wonderful experience today!  Sabrina helped me find the perfect pair of glasses and she was amazing.  Very knowledgeable and willing to assist me in finding the glasses that will best suit my unique needs.  Thank you!

text: way way overpriced....

name: Cameron Oliver

text: My first time at Marx Optical was awesome thanks to Dr. B, Sabrina, and Sandy! I enjoyed the customer service very friendly and compassionate :)

text: I was helped by a lady named Marsha and she was absolutely amazing. We had a rough day involving a trip to the emergency room and once we got to Marx it was like a breath of fresh air to be helped by someone who genuinely cared. She was super patient and never once made us feel like a problem. She was amazing! I would recommend Marx Optical to anyone! And don’t forget to ask for Marsha I promise you won’t regret it!

name: Kathryn Brannon
text: Love Marx Optical!! Everyone was so nice even when my insurance was a huge mess. Love going here to find new glasses! Kristina Hyatt was the best! Love her & my new glasses.

name: Alexis Almazan
text: Sabrina was of excellent help, took her time to explain the whole process, fast and attentive service! Really enjoyed my experience! Everyone was very friendly and helping.

name: Merita Sharp
text: Saturday, 2/22/19, was my first visit to Marx Optical in Decatur.  I did not have an appointment but was immediately met by Kathy who instantly put me at ease and provided outstanding service.  Kathy's knowledge and professionalism will make me a long term customer.

name: Jaime Corcoran
text: Great experience!! Helpful and friendly staff. Sabrina was excellent!! She explained everything in terms we could understand and took her time with us. I would recommend Marx optical, and Sabrina to everyone!!!

name: Teri Wilhelm
text: Today Ms. Kristina helped me out and was amazing.  She made it a very simple process for me. The ladies here are wonderful. I have not ever had a bad experience and have gotten several pair of glasses here over the years.

name: Cindy Brantley
text: I have to give a huge shout out for Marsha!!  She was so very kind, helpful and certainly to much fun!!   She's the best and Marx Optical is truly a better place with her a part of their team!!!!!!

name: Shaquille Moore
text: I really enjoyed my experience there. I scheduled my appointment a week early and the lady who assisted me Sabrina made sure I had all my information in the system ahead of time so I didn’t have to worry when I arrived the following week. Terrish another associate also was very helpful with finding me the perfect pair of glasses. The staff members are all amazing. I’m an observant person and I notice how everything ran smoothly even with them going through a renovation. I would recommend anyone to visit the Decatur location on Beltline road if they’re in need of an eye exam or simply getting your glasses readjusted. My service was swift and I also received my prescription glasses the same day in less than an hour after my exam which was amazing!  I’m looking forward to my next checkup in a year to see my progress and also to visit the friendly staff.

name: Roger Simpson
text: Sabrina took very good care of me. Made sure I got the contacts I needed and took care of updating my glasses. All with a smiling face and a professional attitude!

text: Marx Optical, is a great friendly eye institute. I was welcomed by Nicki with a warm good morning.  I was pleased, they were very prompt with time.  Everyone  was very professional. Sabrina and Terrish  made sure  I was please with my glasses and my visit at Marx Optical.

name: Bobbie Burleigh
text: Sabrina did an awesome job helping me choose new glasses. She was very patient and informative I highly recommend.

I picked him out a new pair by using his old prescription. He was so thankful when we delivered them to him in the Shepherd Center in Atlanta. Thank you for your time and for the caring you showed during our situation.

text: I've used this company for 17 years. The staff and my eye doctor, Dr. B, have become more like family. They always ask how I am and check on my family. I decided to visit my eye doctor and they got me an appointment quickly, explained why I wasn't getting well and had me back out the door with prescriptions. (I'll add that my family doctor wasn't at fault) The only thing that has changed over the years is that they've grown. My wait is a little longer due to this but it's not extreme. For great service, I choose to stay.

name: Summer Lee
text: sabrina took care of me today, could not have gotten a better one! sweetest lady!

name: Jonathan D. Wynn
text:
Have been using them for several years now.  Staff and Dr. Harris are always nice and professional.  I don't have vision insurance, but price on visit is always reasonable.  Wait time is a little long but I never make an appointment either.  I'm always a "walk-in".  The eyeware part is a bit higher on retail prices for contacts so I choose to buy my contacts online.  They are always nice and helpful in providing my written Rx to purchase my contacts elsewhere.  Overall, I would recommend Dr. Harris @ Marx Optical to anyone looking for a good optometrist.......

Update : I have officially quit seeing them after  10+ years.  After sitting waiting for almost 3hours with an eye injury,  I felt as though greater concern should have been given to at least administer a triage type exam to assess the situation,  but none was given.  In much pain,  I decided to leave after nearly 3 hours of waiting, since no concern was given.  I don't know if  my doctor knew that an eye injury was waiting,  but if not, his office staff have been poorly trained to deal with medical necessity Vs.  Standard eye exams.  I have seeked out an ophthalmologist and will begin seeing Dr Cain from now on instead of any optometrist office.

name: Amber Barlow
text: I was given an exam for both glasses and contacts. I ordered glasses online and no one gave me hassle offering to buy glasses through them. I did purchase contacts and had to go to 2 contact fitting exams. They did the best at making sure my contacts fit me for 20/20 vision. Very patient and polite doctors and staff. Definitely recommend to anyone needing an eye exam!

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 STAR review Mrs. Barlow!  We are glad you enjoyed your experience at River Region Vision Source!

text: Professional...customer service...AWESOME!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 STAR review!!! We are glad you had an AWESOME experience at River Region Vison Source!

name: Ronnie
text:
I do NOT recommend this place.  They do not care about the customer. I was there last year and got an exam and purchased glasses. When the glasses came they did not even have time to fit them on me.  They handed them and told me to wait. Meanwhile the person who did the adjusting of the glasses worked on the mail.  After 7 minutes of waiting I left while she still worked on that days mail. And to this day they still are loose on my face.
And now just a couple days ago I get a computer call telling me about my upcoming appointment. I want to talk to a person not a computer when dealing with my eye exams.  I will travel miles to avoid this place who has lost focus on the customers.

resp.text: We apologize that you had a bad experience last year.  We strive to offer the best patient experience and what you described is not the norm.  We are sorry that our appointment reminder system is not to your liking.  We use an automated system along with personal reminders in tandem.  Our Mission is to deliver a patient experience that is beyond expectations… provide personalized eyecare… and offer high quality products.

name: B G
text: After wearing contacts for over 30+ years, and being treated by Eye Dr's in 5 states, Dr. Holman and his professional staff are by far the most helpful, friendly, & caring Team I have had the pleasure of being taken care of by.  When I have needed to return for eye issues they have quickly worked me in to their busy appointment schedules & have done everything necessary to find the best lenses for my vision and eye health.  Thank you for all y'all do!... including the nurse & office staff that make me smile.

name: Sr Citizen
text: I have nothing but praise for Millbrook Eye Care.  The doctor and his staff came across as very competent and friendly.  Having a case of dry eye complications, I called and was given an appointment on short notice.  Doctor Holman wasted no time in using state-of-the-art equipment to examine and provide palliative treatment for my eyes, and he gave sensible guidance on how I should care for my situation at home.

name: Chip Hicks
text: I have been a patient of Dr. Holman for several years and have had nothing but great care from he and his staff.

resp.text: Thanks Chip!  We love to hear that!  Dr. Holman wants everyone to have the best care possible👍

name: S Campbell
text: I showed up on a Friday morning at 8am with no appointment and these nice people got me in and out in less than an hour! Highly recommend this place and I will definitely be back!

resp.text: Thank you for the nice 5⭐️ review!!  We do our best to be efficient.

name: Heather Witherington
text: Love the friendly and helpful staff. They helped me pick a pair of glasses and I get nonstop compliments on them!

resp.text: 🤩 Thank you for the 5 ⭐️ Review!  We are so glad you had a great experience at our office and that you LOVE your glasses!

name: jakia thomas
text: River Region Dental care is an updated Optometry Office, with chic modern décor. The office staff from start to finish were very nice and professional. I especially enjoyed the employee who works the eyewear counter. She is very patient, and well informed on benefits for lenses and frames. The only downfall to my visit was the 2 hour and 15 minute wait time for the vision check. The wait time did not include browsing for new frames and I had to ask the front desk for updates versus the staff updating me as I waited. I would give it a second chance though based solely off of their staff and the front desk receptionist ( checkouts front desk rep) who offered a sincere apology for my wait.

resp.text: Thank you for reviewing our office - River Region Vision Source!  We hope to turn your 3 Star visit into a 5 Star visit next time!⭐️  We strive to minimize wait times in our office.  It is typical that a patient will be in our office approximately 1hr for their eye exam.  Please accept our apology for an abnormal wait time.😬

name: Stephanie Perdue
text:
I assumed I would never be able to see like others and that it would never be any better unless I have an eye transplant or a miracle . BUT....
I am so thankful for Dr. B and his never ending research and technology!  I can't remember the last time I have seen 20/20 and through his persistence and patience over the last years he found out what my eye condition is and has found the perfect solution for ME!!! Just the other day I picked up my contact lenses and glasses and when I left I started crying because I didn't realize how much I couldn't see before! The clouds were super amazing that day to say the least!!!!
Also, kudos to the staff for being patient through this process too!!
I am for ever grateful!!!!

name: Frank Prescott
text: Dr Bryan Holman at Millbrook Eye Care did my daughters first eye exam.  Dr. Holman explained everything to me during the exam, which I appreciated given my daughter is only 2.  While I was there we also discussed a new technology called Ortho K to help keep myself and possibly my daughter one day from having to wear glasses.  I would highly recommend Dr. Holman and the staff at Millbrook Eye Care!

text: Dr. Holman is very thorough in his exam.  I had a problem for years and he corrected it with a new prescription and I can see for the first time in many years!  I can't explain how thrilled I am with Dr. Holman and his entire staff.  Highly recommend!!!!

text: Appointment was on time, no wait. Been here two times and will be back next checkup. I recommend this place to everyone.

We also discussed new technology called Ortho K, so I might not have to wear contacts or glasses again! I would definitely recommend Millbrook Eye Care!

text: All of the doctors and staff at Millbrook EyeCare are AMAZING!! I would recommend them to everyone no matter what kind of eye problems you are having. Even if it's not your eyes causing your visual problems they will find out and take every step needed to get you in with the right people to get your problem assessed and taken care of right away.

name: James Henderson
text: All staff at Millbrook EyeCare or great like the new iHealth Exam highly recommended it worth the extra cost lot better than having eyes dilated show's more in depth.

text: I've been going to Millbrook Eyecare for about 3 years. I always get a thorough exam and the staff is friendly and professional.

name: jennifer brown
text: Had an eye exam and then waited 3 months for contacts, which were on "backorder". Each time I'd call up there, no one seemed to know the status of my contacts and never called me back when they said they would find out-on multiple occasions. I never received the contacts from them. I ended up ordering them from 1-800-contacts and received them the next week. Awful experience!!

name: Kendra Silmon
text: Great and friendly staff.

name: Lord Strangewood
text: Go go

name: Kathy Westbrook
text: I have made 3 visits to his office and will not return.  Dr. Anz might be wonderful but I have decided that he does not work for me. I am an educated person, but I was treated that way. His only direct comment to me was "move your purse."

resp.text: Ms. Westbrook, thank you for taking time to review our practice. I'm extremely disappointed we failed to continue to meet your expectations and regret hearing your interaction with Dr. Anz during last appointment was not to our standard and caused you to feel this way. We truly care about our patients and want to learn from your experience so we as a TEAM, including Dr. Anz, can make improvements. Would you please send me an email with a good contact number so I can call you to discuss your experience in more detail and offer you a personal apology? If you'd like to talk Dr. Anz as well I know he will be disappointed as well to hear this and want to know how he can improve so we can accomplish a few things. My email is josh@medicalartseye.com or you can message me through our Facebook or Google business page. My direct office number is 334-321-9705 but I'm still deployed to EAMC helping with our Covid-19 response so email will be the quickest way for us to connect. We look forward to talking with you & greatly appreciate you helping us improve our delivery of care! -Josh (Manager)

name: Kenzi G
text:
I was referred to this clinic from an urgent care, and an appointment was made for me. I had a severe viral infection in my eyes, and as you can imagine, I was in pain and eager for relief. When I arrived for my scheduled appointment, I was told by the front desk staff that there was no appointment for me on file. I showed them my referral sheet with the doctor's name and appointment time. They continued to refuse me and tell me I had no appointment. The woman checking patients in was very kind and tried her best to help me in a difficult situation. The rest of their office staff was the epitome of unprofessional. Rude, refusing service to a person with an appointment. Yelling, rolling eyes, and snatching papers. My five year old knows better than to act that way. When I called the urgent care and confirmed that I did have an appointment, the Medical Arts Eye Clinic staff tried to cover their mistake by saying they'd been given the wrong name for the appointment, even though my medical records were sent in my name....
No apology offered. No kindness shown to a patient in severe pain. I will never go to this office again. I will find any other eye care provider in the county before I would let these rude people treat me ever again.

resp.text: Thank you for providing feedback on your experience.  I apologize we did not meet your expectations.  If you would be willing to discuss the details further with me I will give you a call today.  -Josh (Manager)

name: Jere Scott Bradshaw
text: Wonderful experience.  Dr. Anz is a skilled doctor with a compassionate manner.  The team was efficient and professional.  I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Mr. Bradshaw.  It's our pleasure to provide you with excellent service.  We appreciate your feedback and the opportunity to serve you.

name: Russel Avery
text: I can still see and function normally because of these people's professionalism and expertise.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your kind words and great review! We appreciate the opportunity to serve you. -Josh (Manager)

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review, we look forward to serving you in the future.

text: I am a Veteran that moved to Dadeville. I have Insurance and need help. They WOULD NOT HELP ME! They told me to go back to the VA that is 2 hours away! I have a simple dry eye problem and they WOULD NOT HELP ME!!! Horrible people!!!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving your review.  I am very sorry you had a bad experience.  We pride ourselves on providing high quality, compassionate, healthcare.  I will be happy to try to assist you however I can.  Please give me a call at your earliest convenience directly at 334-321-9705.   -Josh (Manager)

name: Karen Curran
text: Best place to get eye exam and glasses.  The staff made my visit enjoyable!

text:
They need to have a a bigger and better selection of glasses
I was told to go to denny vision but I went to my home town place wasn't really happy with the glasses that I got but I didn't have alot of choices.
The eye doctor is a very sweet and concerned lady. I really like her.
Thank you so much Tammy Wallace

name: Harry Jarvis
text: Everyone at EyeCare is extremely knowledgeable and very efficient. Dr Tammy explains everything.

name: Sweet T's Nerdiness
text: Absolutely amazing experience! Every member of the staff was kind and welcoming. Any questions I asked during my appointment was answered with a wealth of knowledge and passion for what they do. I was told what to expect and why they were doing each step of my eye exam, that alone creates a great atmosphere. In all I would highly recommend OD Tammy Wallace and her staff! Thank you

name: Lynn Gilley
text: The nurse and doctor were great. Super polite and informative. But.... I went in there after being told twice that I would only have to pay my $20 copay up front. Upon checking in, i was told it would be $144. When checking out, it had changed again to $203! I'm on a fixed income....so much for paying my power bill this month.... Had I known this, I would have cancelled. Who needs electricity and heat, right?

resp.text: Lynn, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry about this billing issue -- this is definitely not the experience we want our patients to have. I'd like to look into what happened -- could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Haley Pyle
text: Wonderful experience! Everyone there was so nice, and Dr. Wallace did a great job of explaining everything to me. 10 out of 10 recommend and do not think I will ever go anywhere else as long as they are in Ozark.

name: Shandria Johnson
text: Absolutely AMAZING! I ripped my last contact this morning and they squeezed me in when everyone else was booked out for at least a month. Every single staff is extremely friendly and comforting. I was given all the knowledge I needed up front to make decisions. They repeated anything that I didn’t understand. They made sure I was happy and given all of my options. I’m new to the area but I highly recommend them! If their service was this amazing during a pandemic I can’t only imagine how great it is normally. Thank you ladies!

name: Linda Tiedeman
text: Great employees. The exam is very thorough and you feel they truly care about your eyesight.

name: Brian Shinholster
text: I’ve been totally impressed with the professionalism That was displayed Throughout  My visit. They were courteous as well as knowledgeable about there product, I will definitely give them two thumbs up or 10 out of 10!

name: Darrell Langford
text: This was my first visit, and I was thoroughly impressed.  The staff was very courteous and professional. Left the facility feeling I had received the best care possible.

name: Willie Faniel
text: Once I did my eye exam, Dr. Wallace explained everything to me in detail, she really understood what I was going through. That really put my mind at ease. Very professional & understanding.  Thanks guys 👊

name: Lorianne Hairston
text: It was great at this Eyecare Dr. APPOINTMENT NO LONG WAIT AND EVERY ONE WAS NICE AND GREAT AND TOOK THEIR TIME TO EXPLAIN WHEN I HAD A QUESTION YES MY KIND OF PLACE NO LONG WAIT.

name: Angie Perreault
text: Love Dr. Wallace... she is kind and extremely thorough. I always have a pleasant experience when I visit and leave with a good peace of mind. The staff are very friendly as well... highly recommend!

name: Lexi Covel
text:
I was told back in early January that my glasses would arrive at the Enterprise location, and that they would call me whenever they arrive (they said it would take only a couple of weeks).
This is late March. I’m very disappointed and I’ll never waste my time with FEC EVER again.

resp.text: Lexi, I'm Cassie. I'm sorry about the delays with your glasses. I'd like to look into what's happening with them. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Barbara Woodall
text: I would recommend Dr Tammy to all my family and friends. She is an extremely through and great patient bedside manner. The staff is Awesome

name: Patsy Corriveau
text: I always have a welcoming experience when I go to see Dr. Wallace. Her staff are friendly and caring along with her. They make you feel comfortable and ensure your safety is being kept within the guidelines. I would recommend Dr. Tammy and her friendly, professional staff to anyone who needs an Eye appointment..

name: Marty Parson
text: Thought it was little pricey , even with vsp insurance.  But over all Tammy is awesome.  She's the main reason I go there.  I'll pay extra for good service.  Assistants were awesome also.

name: Preston Maund
text: Overall very good experience. My tech was Mikaela and she was very proficient and professional. Dr. Wallace is awesome! And thanks to Jessica, I was able to find a great pair of glasses that I was very pleased with.

name: Myra Morrill
text: Excellent care and made me very welcome for my first time there.

name: Vonda Fite
text: Dr Wallace and her entire staff are very friendly, polite and professional. They will make sure everything is accurate and precise whether your being fitted for lenses or glasses.

name: Michael Marchman
text: First time visit.  Was very impressed with the experience.  Dr. Wallace was very pleasant and explained the exam thoroughly.  The assistants, each provided a separate service,  were pleasant and detailed in their work.   The office was very neat and orderly with what appeared to be the most up to date equipment.  There were also oversized chairs for those of us in an oversize class.  Very nice selections of frames. The entire staff presented professional appearances.  They were very personable and treated you as a long time client. Based on my first visit, I would highly recommend Dr. Wallace and her staff.

resp.text: Michael, we are so glad you decided to give our office a try! Thank you so much for your thorough review of our office and our team. We really appreciate your review!

name: Phenishial Glenn
text: Great job 👍 keep up the good work STAFF!

name: Karen Rae Gardner
text: Even as crazy everything is with the pandemic right now the staff was absolutely awesome. They were kind, caring, and professional. They also have an great selection of frames. If you need new glasses or contacts this is the place to be!

resp.text: We are so glad to hear this Karen - we know getting out can be a little bit overwhelming at this time so we want to make sure we keep you safe without comprising your eye care and experience.

name: Victor Ingram
text:
Overpriced for an exam definitely wouldn't recommend them if I was going blind and my seeing eye dog would go blind as well would rather take my chances with the blind seeing eye dog.
$180 for a contact lens exam and they do not even accept all the insurance that is provided not to mention I'm a federal employee and they don't accept the insurance that I pay for definitely will not be visiting again time wasted and not willing to pay $180 just for a contact lens exam

name: Carolyn Mahone
text: Very friendly atmosphere. Staff and Doctor Wallace are great. I would highly recommend.

name: Vicki Shehane
text: Very professional and efficient. Thoroughly explained before and after exam procedures. Have been looking for a new eye doctor and will be joining their patient list. Would highly recommend them.

name: Tracy Walsh
text: Fast and efficient service today at Family Eye Center. I was able to get back to my job in under an hour. Awesome!!

name: Montana Long
text: I am very pleased with my experience at Family Eye and Laser! The staff was amazing. They were very informative and helpful. Erin Jones made me feel right at home. She helped explain things I've never understood about my eyes. Jessica Garrett was very helpful with finding the glasses that I actually love. I would recommend this eye center over any other place.

resp.text: Ashley, Thanks for the incredible review and for giving our team a nice shout out! We appreciate your review!

name: martha beach
text: Everyone was very friendly and helpful and got me back before my appointment

name: Brian Young
text:
I rather enjoyed my visit today, and how often can you say that about going to a clinic? From the first person to the last, they were so kind, professional, and knowledgeable.
Stand outs were Kimberly, Jessica, and of course Lisa.
And my goodness, do they all look beautiful too!

resp.text: Brian, thank you so much for your kind words about our team and the ladies loved your complement! ; )

name: Jeep Bruce Listening
text: Been a customer since Feb 2017 ...excellent service and been back 4 times now, most outstanding customer service. THE Doc was so calm and explained things that even a 5 year old could understand. I came here because l saw the same when l brought my Grandson here 5 years ago....cannot find better optometry clinic for kids or adults!!!

name: Susan Mathis
text: Awesome experience will go back yearly. Great prices. Friendly staff.they go extra mile for senior citizens. Dr.Tammy is a blessing.Highly recommend Dr.Tammy.

name: Lisa Willis
text: Would never go to this eye clinic ever again!!!😡😡 These people ripped me off big time!!! I paid 120, even after they did my insurance! I usually don’t pay that for exam.  The only reason why I went here was because I was in need to get my eyes checked and after quarantine, everything was booked! the doc I usually go to is dr MacArthur’s office! At least I paid 45 after insurance along with contacts and the fittings comes with everything . The 110 did not included contacts! Just exam 40 and they overcharged me for fitting, 70 dollars!!! Idc what they said and yes it was like throw money down the drain. I had to order my contacts somewhere else. And they also go my vision wrong. Last year I was a -4.50 on one eye and the other is a -5.00. There’s no way it got reduced from those to -4.25 and -4.00!!! name: Terry Creel
text: I had an infection on my eyelid and just moved to yhe area and was in alot of pain.the eye lid it self was inflamed really bad.so i located a eye center only a couple miles from me.one of my sisters had recommend a Dr.Tammy Wallace.so she had made an appt for me ironically the following day.i was somewhat skeptical of seeing someone i had no ideal of what there professionals would be like.i was there maybe 15 mins and a young lady came and greeted me took me to a room and seemed very concerned of the problem.soon after her exam Dr.Wallace came in and time with me checked out the problem and said she thought she could basically resolve my problem.had me to go home and do these few things and to come back in a week and if that wasnt the problem she would seek extra testing.she gave me a prescription of antibioctics.within a couple days the swelling had gone down.on the next visit she was pleased of the progress.that Dr knew exactly what it was before i had lft her office.Dr.Wallace is truly a godsent for me.very knowledgeable and a personality that could light up four city blocks.my thanks to her superior service and bedside manor.only wish there were more Drs like her around.

So your blood pressure is an important piece of information for your medical doctor AND your eye doctor.
