text: This concerns my husband, he started going to Dr. John Mason, when he started having problems with his right eye, to find out later when he was sent to Dr. Mason, he had a Retina vein ocullison in his eye, also better know as a stroke in his eye!  They have done several treatments to his eye especially this last September he had to have surgery when his eye started bleeding behind the eye, they repaired it through this surgery, he did lose partial sight in his eye when the stroke occurred but they have helped him so much to have a balance in his eye to and his other eye to secure that his sight will remain good! He goes for regular check ups about every four months! I would highly recommend these doctors to anyone that has eye issues beyond your regular eye doctor that you see yearly! I imagine you probably need a referral since they are specialist! Be sure and check with your insurance provider!

name: Julie Lance
text: When to Eye Foundation ER today, on website states open 24/7.  My husband got piece of wood in his eye.  We waited an hour and told no physician was there.  I asked why would they not be physical/ resident to cover ER, they said he was somewhere else and a Resident would be here 20 minutes.  How can run an emergency ER with no physician.  We left untreated.

name: Grammy Mejia
text: Awesome place. Had 2 cataract surgeries and Dr. Swanner and staff and surgery were incredibly kind and professional.  The best I have ever been treated!!!

name: Me My
text: Very arrogant and rude doctors and nurses, complete disregard to patient's well-being. It's impossible to find anybody, nobody is answering or returning phone calls, very difficult to have an answer to the simplest basic question. Better to use other hospitals.

name: Beth Spitzley
text: Had an amazing experience from the second we walked into the door to the very end as they helped her into the car. The staff was amazingly sweet and very helpful. Definitely the most positive and amazing doctor appointment I have ever experienced since moving back to Alabama.

name: Elysia Bailey
text: I have had to bring my mother-in-law to the eye center a fee times. They always make me feel welcome as well. The rooms are very comfortable. Their food is great. I am surprised by the food every time.

name: Rachel Vega
text: ER intake ladys were awesome. They help me get my 7 year old son with cornea abrasion seen asap.

name: Barbara Wilson
text: Dr was great, explained everything. Staff polite.  Time spent in ER, 11 hrs. Needs improving. Only 1 person in waiting room when I arrived.

name: Will Slappey
text: The other day my 16 month old son needed to be seen here. The nurses gave him a stuffed monkey and were so sweet. The doctor that saw William was thorough and communicated well. This was our third experience here in the last three years, and all of our visits have gone well.

name: Mary Ladner
text:
I just left the emergency room and going in I was skeptical, mainly because I had read the other reviews.  I am so glad I didn't feed into the negativity and decided to judge for myself. Dawn was my nurse and so pleasant and patient with me.  I also was seen by Dr Juan? spelling may be incorrect but also very nice. I learned what my mother had already taught me, never assume you know based on the opinions of others, judge for yourself. Great advice momma R.I.P and thank you. I am still listening :)

Also the Dr. can really rock a handlebar mustache!

name: George Guilford
text:
First impressions are everything in repeat business! I am very disappointed in my "very short" visit with Dr. Rosenstiel and staff. (Well I didn't even meet Dr. Rosenstiel???!) Being that I live in Montgomery, I have to request a day off for ALL my eye appointment visits.  I am not new to UAB Callahan Eye Hospital as I've had multiple surgeries within the last three years there. As a matter of fact I just had an appointment there two weeks ago with the incredible Dr. Priscilla Fowler and staff.   I've been diagnosed with Kerataconus and Dr. Priscilla Fowler is my primary eye doctor.  Dr. Fowler and staff are some of the nicest people I've met in the eye care industry. Earlier this year and this past month I received the Cross-Linking  procedure.  I spent over $6000 within the last three years at Callahan eye.  Dr. Fowler and staff treat me with respect on EVERY visit,  yet on December 10 with Dr. Rosenstiel and staff I felt the lesser of.  This visit was scheduled to replace my old sclera lenses with new.  You would think before my arrival they would've did their research on my condition.  Upon my arrival in the room, Dr. Rosenstiel's nurse asked if I ever had sclera lenses?? (I'VE HAD SCLERA CONTACTS FOR THE LAST 6 YEARS??) From there, he goes straight into and I quote, "before we even see you, you have to pay X amount of dollars!?. Furthermore, he adds, "The Lenses will be an additional $XXXX.XX amount of dollars to get them?   Now at this point I was feeling as though they did not want to help me as Dr. Fowler and staff did you for the last couple of years.?  Now do mind you I've already spent thousands of dollars to get my eyes corrected.  The money is not an option, but I felt inferior to his demands.  I also wondered have they even looked in my charts from previous visits.? "Have they even checked my insurance" I thought to myself?  At that point I asked him a series of questions in terms of verifying my insurances and deductibles. To no avail he says nothing will be covered. Now as I mentioned money would not be a concern as I've spent a lot of money to fix my Eye disease. ( As well as the removal of an tumor in my eyelid two years prior ).  More questions came to mind in this parlay with Dr. Rosenstiel's nurse.  At this point I felt that the nurse is trying to rush me so he leaves then comes back with a business card and prices on it. He then states, " if you have any questions please call Melissa" on the business card. I agreed and proceeded to leave. Upon leaving, I felt very embarrassed to even be there. I rushed out and got in my car. I kept thinking to myself "have they even check my insurance". So I called my wife, and she confirmed we do have Eye insurance.  I decided I needed to call them back to confirm and verify with them that I have insurance, the same insurance I've used last three years. Two calls later and one left message, I still have not heard from Melissa, Dr. Rosenstiel , or the male nurse that was talking to me. I never even got to meet Dr. Rosenstiel??? I will still come up to visit Dr. Fowler but I will do my business elsewhere in finding new Sclera lenses!
Very disappointing!!

name: John McDole
text: Whether visiting the Emergency Room or scheduled surgery this is the place to be for anything eye related. Over the years we have never had a problem or bad experience or even an unpleasant encounter. Everyone is very professional. The doctors offices being within the complex make it convenient and the parking deck connects to the complex.

name: April Mejia
text: Staff was extremely nice and professional. Amazing doctors and nurses.

name: Christy Pierce
text: Awesome atmosphere. Friendly and professional staff. Highly recommend.

name: Ethan Vaughn
text:
I took the day off from work to drive 2.5 hours to take my son here. Apparently the optometrist had to take the day off the day before so she was seeing yesterday's patients as well as todays. Which is fine.
What is not fine is the complete lack of foresight or common courtesy to call today's patients to inform them they may have to wait longer we have been waiting for 2 hours and are looking at atleast another hour wait before our son is seen. This office is a perfect storm of incompetence and disregard for their patients.

name: Kevin G
text: Had a major eye injury last week. The nurses and dr quickly relieved my pain and identified the problem quickly. Today I have most of my vision back due to them.

name: Shawna Gomez
text:
Only because I can not put zero as an option! I spoke with a man ,who barely allowed me to even talk, and he kept telling me there's no way my daughter's appointment is there, I still have the letter as proof. My daughter is not even 2 and needs eye surgery badly. Her appointment is scheduled for 4/2/18 but as I said he told me there is no way she has one there.

I have 2 kids they are my world. This issue needs to be resolved. If my daughter doesn't get her surgery because the man I spoke to is incompetent, I'm not going to be a very happy mom and if any of you are parents you'd understand.

name: Chris Mahan
text: It is very concentrated on helping people live better, and the medical staff is excellent.

name: Miss Un-PC
text:
My mom and I were rear ended severely a while back by a young boy more interested in his cell phone than his driving.
At first, I didn't notice anything wrong. Later that night, my right eye had a shadow-like film over it. I didn't think anything about it at first. Later that week, I notice my vision was decreasing. I was half blind in my right eye. I went to my eye doctor. After a check-up, he said my retina was partially detached. And, had I waited a week or so longer, I would've have gone permanently blind in that eye. I got an appointment at the Callahan Eye Foundation.
The doctors, nurses and receptionist were very nice. The surgeon did a fantastic job reattaching my retina. The only thing that was a bit frustrating was that gas bubble. But, it kept pressure on my retina. Now, my vision in the right eye was like it was before the accident.
If you have a problem with your eyes that a regular eye doctor can't treat, then I highly recommend the Callahan Eye Foundation.

name: Jay J
text: I wish I could give a minus star. I stopped by here with a rash on my skin near my eye after hours. I was afraid that it might swell up and cause me further issue. They sent me to the ER. I asked could I see someone not in the ER so I would not have to pay so much, but they said no. So I saw a doc in the ER. He looked at my eye and said it was a common rash and said he would give me some antibiotics. He stepped out with the door open and talked to the nurse. I caught them laughing and looking back at me because I came in for a skin rash near my eye.  I believe I was in there for almost 2 hours and I did not see another patient. The lady at the front desk was rude, the staff was rude and even with insurance I still had to pay over $300 .

name: Josie Williams
text: Very knowledgeable about everything i ask never left me wondering i never had any doubt about what was going to happen. Very professional teams

Do not take your child here.  You can get the exact same care at children's hospital.  1)they use the same doctors 2) children's hospital has a lot more respect your time.  I've been to both....The eye clinic time was RIDICULOUS,  2) children's accepts more insurance providers like medishare.

I spent a lot more money a LOT more time, and less customer service.

They couldn't even call in our prescription after being there for 5 hours!!!!!!

Waited one hour for the nurse to come back with our prescription.  No call for that.

Very disappointed.

Instead off calling in an attending doctor they sent her home work gel drops and told her to make appt with cornea doc the next week. She went in on weekend. So I went all the way down there and took off work for nothing! How does the biggest eye hospital in Birmingham, not accept federal insurance? Sounds fishy to me! Then they wanted me to pay $15 to park! Absolutely not!

name: Bert Bloomston
text:
I was extremely pleased with the  personal care and attention provided me when I arrived at CEH. I arrived a few minutes prior to the appointed time and waited just a short time prior to be taken to a bed where I was prepped for my cataract surgery. I honestly did not have the feeling that I was in a medical facility, but a facility designed  for the extreme care and concern for a person. All of us, I believe, have anxiety prior to a surgical procedure, however the staff made me feel comfortable and relaxed. I took special note that Mr. Sprayberry was on the floor chatting with the patients and the staff. That is certainly a rarity in today's world of medicine and certainly could not be found in many or any facility today. Also, I learned that there was patient advocate on the floor.
Congratulations to all and to Dr. Sara Mullins for the outstanding treatment and personal attention. Your hospital is way above just first class.
Thank you again and I told many of my friends about your outstanding service and personal care.

name: Jennifer “CraftyJenn” Baxter
text:
I don't recommend this place at all. I found some nice frames there that fit me perfectly and was so excited to get my first pair of glasses so I could see better. I got my lens order put in and was told it could take 10-14 days to get them back since they don't make glasses there. I was fine with that. When day 12 came along, I called to check on them to have an idea of when I'd get them. The girl looked in the computer and said that the lens place hadn't gotten them yet, but they should soon and the 14 days wasn't up. I called back on day 14 to check on them and was told they were probably in the box for that day and if not, they'd be there the next day and that they'd call me the next day by noon if they couldn't find them. I called back an hour before closing the next day only to be told that my glasses were most likely in a box that got lost. So I waited for 2 weeks for glasses that went missing. I then I had to search  for an identical frame from another store.
If you don't want to chance your glasses being lost, go somewhere else. I did get a full refund, but the headache with this place wasn't worth it. Oh and they don't communicate with each other so noone knows what anyone else has told you.

name: Rayn Lafollette
text: I had a great experience at America’s best. Everyone at the front desk was polite and quick to assist me. Getting my eye exam the doctor was very informative and helpful as this was my first time needing eye glasses. After I was not rushed when being extremely picky about picking glasses. When I finally picked out glasses It was very helpful to know all of my buying options and all the add ons that were available to me. I would 10/10 recommend America’s best in trussville.

name: Christie Steeley
text: Our experience with this location in Trussville, AL was SPECTACULAR!!!!! FABULOUS customer service!!! The manager, Robin was so kind and helpful! And Madison and Jamie were INCREDIBLE with my daughter. My daughter struggles with much mental illness and exceptions. And these ladies were very patient and kind with her. They put her at ease so easily. I was anxious about the experience with my daughter.... But it turned out to be a pleasant afternoon! I just can't praise them enough!! Very clean store! Very well run! Very organized! Very timely! THANK YOU ladies for such a blessed experience!

name: Jesslin Williams
text: I will never go here again for glasses. The person who was helping me checked my insurance and calculated my frames, I paid a portion out of pocket that day. Fast forward two weeks or so, I receive a bill from America's Best for the exact amount I paid that day. I found it to be shady and I was not happy with the service I received when I went to pick my frames up after being called to do so. The lady acted like I was not suppose to be there then proceeded to give me the wrong frames.

resp.text: I’m very sorry that happened. Let me know if you need assistance getting this resolved.  You can email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited, your name and your phone number so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

I am very pleased with the fit and quality of my new glasses. I would definitely suggest this  America's Best location to friends, family and even strangers.                            A solid ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ rating.

The exam didn't take long but I told doctor Beaty I was having a specific issue with my contacts not sitting correctly in my eyes and he made sure to take me back again after my fitting to make sure they were right! I am very happy with my prescription and my experience here! I will be back for sure!

resp.text: Happy to hear you had such a positive experience with us.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review, thank you for being our customer!

name: Jamie Kennedy
text: I work at this location, so I know how hard our team works to be as efficient and helpful as possible. We care about our patients' experiences!

name: Elena McDaniel
text: I took my son for an exam. I have worn glasses pretty much all my life and this was the fastest eye exam I have ever experienced and that is not a compliment. This appointment didn’t even take 15 minutes!  What could the doctor have possibly checked in that short amount of time? My son’s eyes were NOT dilated and to top it off, his Rx is wrong!!! The script written is for farsightedness and my son is nearsighted. I will not be back and will be in contact with the corporate office.

resp.text: I’m very sorry that happened. I’d be happy to have someone from corporate management reach out to you about this. If you’re interested, you can email me at americasbest@nationalvision.com.  It’s very important to include the location you visited, your name and your phone number so we can help as quickly as possible. Thank you, Nancy

text: Excellent service.  Both pair came out perfect!!!

name: Alex Avram
text: I recently got glasses from the Trussville location and it was an absolutely amazing experience. It was my first time getting glasses so I was a little nervous and not really sure what to do or what to expect. I was greeted by friendly employees and each person who took care of me was super nice. I had fun chatting with everyone there. One of the girls helped me pick out frames and assured me that I looked good. I couldn't wait for my glasses to come in so I could start wearing them. They came back a week later but unfortunately I noticed that one of my lenses was blurry. So I called the store the next day to let them know and the person I talked to was so kind and friendly on the phone and told me to bring them by so they could have a look at them. When I got there, one of the girls told me she accidentally typed in my Rx wrong. The manager came out and talked to me and she also was VERY NICE!! They got my glasses re-ordered and they were back within I think about 6 days! Super fast!! I am so so IMPRESSED with the level of customer service I was shown. I also work in retail and have since 2013. So I've seen all kinds of craziness! Haha! But these people are a class act. They treated me with respect, kindness and put a smile on my face despite the accident. I wasn't worried about it. I was just glad they got it corrected and I couldn't be happier. I HIGHLY recommend this location if you need glasses! I am going to tell all my friends and family about them! They definitely have my loyalty!

They have a great selection of frames already, but I have a huge head and have a hard time finding frames that fit comfortably and look good, so they were more than happy to order a bunch of additional demos for me to try, which was such a great convenience! text:
My husband and I traveled from Charleston, SC to see Dr Green.  We heard of his reputation as a very thorough and knowledgeable doctor. We were not disappointed. We had the most thorough exam we have ever had. After having cancer of my lower eyelid and almost loosing my eye, I take my eye care very seriously. Also, I have experienced flashing lights in my peripheral vision.  Dr Green's office uses cutting edge equipment.  Therefore, he was able to use a CT scan of my eye to show and explain in great detail what happened, when I had these episodes.
The staff at VisualEyes are efficient and friendly. The atmosphere in the office is one of caring. The office is comfortable, clean, and beautiful. The selection of eyeware is the best I have ever seen.  There are so many beautiful frames you will be challenged to just pick one frame.  Great care is given by the staff to assist you in finding the perfect pair of glasses. There knowledge of the perfect shape and color for your individual face is unprecedented.

text: The manager was so polite,very sweet and patient with my daughter like he was her own! He made sure the fit her face perfect. Better than anywhere I’ve been!

name: Lacey Payne
text:
This place is truly amazing and the people are phenomenal!
I was with my (pregnant) sister today who was having some severe agitation in her eye, along with multiple ruptured blood vessels. We were both a little nervous and unsure if she should see a doctor about her eye or if it was something to heal on its own. Thanks to some frightening google results, we decided to call a doctor. I remembered my pastor mentioning this optometrist and giving great reviews, so we called ahead and they got her in immediately!
The doctor was so so nice and had a great personality. I could not have asked for better treatment for my sister during such a stressful time!
A huge thank you to the staff for being so gracious and kind!

text: Awesome experience! My eye exam was quick and thorough. I got my glasses the same day and the guys up front are extremely kind.

name: Maurice Valentini
text:
Dear Dylan Hulsey,
I am sorry you feel the way you do regarding Alabama Family Optometry 1 Hour Optical. I am a little perplexed at your negative review, regarding our high prices, rude doctor, and limited selection.
I have searched our data base and don't see you as a previous patient, or someone having ordered product from us in the past.
I have reviewed previous posts from you regarding many other business', and it seems you have a long history of leaving negative reviews.
All I ask from you is you actually come  in to our clinic and experience it in real life for yourself.
We have over 1000 frames on display and many different brands, and our prices are actually lower than competing national chains. At AFO1H we have honest, transparent pricing on 1 and 2 pair eyeglass packages. The pricing is fair and easy to understand. No up-selling or pressure to buy like at the national optical retailers.

As for the doctor being rude, please give me the pleasure of actually meeting you in person, before forming your opinions.

Regards,
Dr. V.
Owner/President AFO1H

name: Amber Fleming
text: I went as a new patient today. This office definitely has it together. The front desk staff were friendly, the office was clean, and the doctor and his assistants were fantastic! I never felt rushed. Highly recommend! Thank you Dr. Griffin & staff for a great 1st visit!

name: Amy B
text: Absolutely LOVED this facility and it's staff. My husband and I took our 4 oldest children in to get eye exams and new glasses. The staff treated us so nicely!  I filled out all the paperwork prior to our appointment and loved having that option when it comes to all of our kiddos being present. My husband went back with all of our children to see Dr Albert while I waited in the lobby with our baby. Upon completion of the exams, they were kind enough to offer recaps on all of my children so that I was up to speed. All four children had to pick out frames and the staff was SO patient and informative with any questions we had. A huge change from the last optometrist office we had in town. Our last office rushed myself and my children and since we have amazing coverage,  pointed us in the direction of frames that were the most expensive instead of helping us look for more kid friendly and durable options. Total game changer with Dothan Optometric Clinic. We were so pleased, my husband and I have already set up our appointments for ourselves and will take all of our children to them from here on out for all their vision needs. I am always nervous trying new doctors and changing locations for care, but this is one that I'm so glad we took that leap. I only wish we had chose these doctors sooner! Thank you Dothan Optometric Clinic for treating our family so kindly! We will definitely be seeing y'all again in our future.

text: I highly recommend Dr Griffin to anyone who is wanting a fast eye exam. This Doctor and his staff are incredible!

name: Jim Tadlock
text:
We see Doctor Griffin and feel well cared for by him and his team. We highly recommend them.

They are punctual, we've never had to wait more than five minutes; they don’t push their glasses or contacts, you can take your prescription anywhere you like to get it filled...but I have found their prices are not much different from others, even the online services.

While I like saving money as much as the rest of the country, there is something to be said for patronizing our local service providers so they can stay in business and be there when we need them.

It's not cheap setting up a medical facility and I'm not suggesting we don’t mind our expenses but if we don’t take care of them, they won't be there to take care of us.

With that in mind, we try to support our local providers.

name: Val Morris
text: First visit here, was very pleased with everything, especially Dr. Albert. She was very knowledgeable answered all my questions and took all the time I needed. I highly recommend this office.

text: I just went in for my annual eye exam for work, but Dr. Griffin and his excellent team went above and beyond. The technology they have there is amazing. They took photos of inside my eye and ran a scan to compare my optic nerves. Charged me for just the exam, but did so much more. I wish I lived down here just to keep him as my regular optometrist. If you want an affordable visit with new age technology and a Doctor who is very passionate about the health of your eyes, go here.

Wow what a headache. The thing is the prescription given my vision seeing from  a distance is worse. I called 2 times to see  if I could come back in. No call back, no email nothing. That’s bad customer service all the way around. I still don’t have my glasses prescription.  Not happy..

name: Linda Coultas
text: The eye exam went well. Dr. Gilliland is very kind. I got in and out fairly quickly. My concern was I have never had vision problems before and had explained that I had only worn reading glasses. I was told that I would need to wear glasses full time and that my right eye was worse than my left. I was also told I didn't need to drive at night. The I was directed to step out into the lobby to pick out my frames. I asked the lady assisting me what exactly was written on my chart and she tried to explain that I had 20/40 vision and what other issues were going on. I wish the doctor had taken the time to explain exactly what my vision problems were. I should have asked questions, but I guess I thought I would see the doctor again after I picked out my frames, but it didn't work out that way.

It was a great reassurance for those of us who value science, our health and the health of other members of society.

My only qualm is that the Target corporation doesn't require masks for customers in a small space as their optical store. This is of no fault of the doctor or her staff. It was disconcerting to see two elderly customers not wearing masks or respecting social distancing.

The reason I used Target Optical is because they had a quick turnaround time for appointments. Unfortunately, I will not be booking with them again because I do not care for Dr. Gililand. The office gets three stars due to the professionalism of the ladies in the front office area and the quickness of making an appointment.

Great professional service

text: She did both exams (contact and glasses) without my permission and I had to pay for both. I just wanted the glasses exam

name: Blair Lee
text: Gave me the totally wrong prescription, went to a real doctor this morning because my eye strain was so bad it caused almost total vision loss, none of the numbers on my real corrective prescription were even CLOSE

name: James Morgan
text: pleasant as usual

name: Nemia Catipunan
text: Excellent service!!!

name: Drew Cottrell
text: Devon is one of the most knowledgeable optical managers I've dealt with at Target, she's great at saving me the embarrassment of picking the wrong frames and takes just enough time to make sure I'm walking out the door happy. As long as you have Devon, I will be a loyal customer!

resp.text: We love to hear about experiences like yours, Drew! You can always depend on us for excellent service. We appreciate your feedback and shout out to Devon. See you next time!

name: Marcy Gerhart
text: Several bad aspects of visit   1-When I arrived I was immediately told that I did not bring anyone with me  to drive so I could not have my eyes dilated. I was NOT told to bring anyone when making the appointment. Also in all my years I have had my eyes dilated and given sunglasses to wear WHILE DRIVING! I heard another woman being told the same thing. Why don't they want to dialate eyes???? Secondly, my distance vision is no better than before my visit. Finally, Target Optical is a franchise, not part of the Target entity, so getting satisfaction is not possible through Target.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience, Marcy. We're disappointed to hear we did not meet your expectations. We'd like to help you find the right frames. Please reach out to us at bit.ly/TO_Support. We hope you give us another chance in the future.

name: Eric Belcher
text: Thy are WONDERFUL! Due to insurance change, I couldn't use my regular eye dr so I gave them a shot. Dr Powell was awesome and Devin is hands down the best "front of office" person I  have had the pleasure of dealing with. She helped me choose the right frames for me and was patient while I was indecisive.

resp.text: We love to hear about experiences like yours, Eric! We're glad to hear Dr. Powell and Devin took care of you. If you need any more help, you know where to find us.

name: Katie Jean Wagner
text: They are so awesome! Super clean and efficient.. They have the best selection of frames!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Katie! We strive to provide our guests with excellent service and the best selection of glasses. We're glad to hear you had a great experience! See you next time.

name: Janice Riviere
text: I had a great experience with Target Optical at the Grove (exit 10). Loved Dr. Powell and the ladies helping me choose glasses. They took my VSP insurance and I got a great deal!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Janice! Our entire team is dedicated to providing the best customer service. We love to hear about the great connections they make with our guests.

name: Patrick Galloway
text: Totally unplanned visit to check out their selection of sunglasses that can have a prescription and found a pair of ray bans that fit perfect.  Price was great.  Service from shop staff was very kind and friendly at the time of sale and in a week when the glasses came in from Ray Ban.  Much faster than anticipated on delivery time.   Already had prescription from a recent eye doctor visit that I have used for years.   Will certainly look to order frames and lenses from target optical again!

name: Kristen Ray
text: Devin was absolutely AMAZING! I did not have an appointment & I brought my 1y/o with me. She was extremely patient with us & super friendly. I went through about 15 frames(she never complained & explained safety COVID steps to take when trying on). I was slowly getting frustrated & my baby was getting restless. I explained what I wanted & she sat me down & popped up with 2 frames. I FELL IN LOVE INSTANTLY!!!!!! When I went to pick them up she was more than willingly to work with my glasses until they fit me perfectly. She made suggestions on alternate cleaning cloths...I just— I loved the experience. Keep it up Devin! We need bomb people like you 💖💖

name: declan d
text: Service is fine only if you go in person. There is no way of contacting them by phone as THEY WILL NOT ANSWER. This is a problem if you have a job and can't wait around all day for them to return your call. This also makes it impossible for you to make an appointment. Very frustrating.

name: Laura Watson
text: Fast, fun, and friendly service!

name: Kayla Stinnett
text: I LOVE Red Mountain Eye Care! They took a last minute appointment last month for an eye infection I had. The receptionist was so friendly and the doctor was knowledgeable, personable, and friendly. That eye infection had been bugging me for WEEKS but they're course of treatment cleared it up in a few days. I even went back for my eye exam a few weeks later and brought my boyfriend for his as well. We've both never had a better experience!

name: Teresa Chandler
text:
My eye checkup is always delightful. Dr. Gagnon is the best. He understands budgets and is always working with you on what you can afford. He also is realistic about contacts, and will ask you to honestly tell him how much wear you get out of a contact. He genuinely cares about his patients. He's also entertaining and funny. The staff is similarly helpful and knowledgeable. All around A+.

Some specifics for those looking to know safety guidelines: During the COVID-19 pandemic, the office has enacted precautions to keep everyone safe. Patients are spaced out and required to wash their hands immediately upon entering, masks on at all times except during relevant parts of the exam, and family members are to wait outside. Any glasses customers handle are sterilized after use.

name: Casey C.
text: I love Red Mountain Eye Care.  Friendly staff and great service.  Dr. Gagnon takes his time with you, happily & honestly answers all questions no matter how simple or complicated and will work with you until you get the perfect contacts.  I've been his patient for 3-4 years & never see myself going anywhere else for my contacts and glasses.

name: Cindy Hafley
text: Kierston was so helpful and friendly! She really knows her way around the shop. It's rare to find such good customer service these days. Impressed!!!

name: Jonathan Vincent
text: Absolutely fantastic.  Very helpful and squeezed me in during an emergency!

name: William Coffman
text: Dr. Gagnon and the staff are great.   I've never felt rushed in 20 years as a patient.   He was not afraid to recommend surgery even though he would make more selling me glasses for decades to come.   Speaking of, they have a great selection of frames.    5 stars!

name: tesla nichole
text: I recently had my first appointment with Dr. Gagnon and I was very pleased. Dr. Gagnon was very personable and friendly. He didn't rush me and made sure to explain everything for me. He answered all my questions and gave me more information about my eyes than I had ever previously been given. His staff was very friendly. I didn't wait long before my appointment and my glasses were ready in four days!

name: Frank H Guttery
text: The staff is great and Dr. Gagnon is very knowledgeable!!!

name: David Luty

text: I got my glasses today, and WOW! My prescription is spot on! I hadn't realized it had changed. The staff and the doctor are friendly, and she is very thorough. My appointment was a breeze, and they were great at working me in when I was in a pinch. I am just so impressed! My glasses are crystal clear!!! Thank you!!!

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review Jillian! We work hard to meet expectations like yours and we’re happy to hear we hit the mark for you. Come back and see us soon!

name: Nancy Steadmon
text: Great place to have your eyes check. Dr Whitaker is great, sees my whole family. Always takes time with you and checks for so many things. Staff is nice.  My go to eye doctor.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us! We count ourselves lucky for customers like you. We look forward to working with you again in the future!

name: Susan Lavender
text: Second year to see Dr. Whitaker.  She is very detailed...friendly and takes time to answer questions.  Her staff is wonderful...from the front desk to the final step of picking out eye glasses!  Great bunch of women!  Your new building is gorgeous!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review! I’m glad you were able to see us in our brand new building on the East side of Athens. Dr. Whitaker and our staff are always happy to provide exceptional eye care, vision care, and customer service to our wonderful patients. We look forward to seeing you, your family, and your friends soon!

name: Olivia Norwood
text: My experience here was very welcoming and comfortable with Dr. Whitaker and her employees. She has a great selection of glasses and contact options.

resp.text: We are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us a 5-Star review.

name: Sierra Crane
text: Always love coming to see Dr. Whitaker and her staff! Great service and they always take great care of me.

name: Earl Simmons
text: A little rocky at first until we figured out the insurance issue, the staff there was very helpful and professional. Highly recommended !

resp.text: We are grateful that you took the time out to leave us a review. Your feedback helps us to improve service for everyone

name: Timothy Scott
text: Top-notch, excellent service! Dr. Whittaker is knowledgeable, thorough, and diligent in her examinations. I've always received terrific care from her! She is supported by a responsive team of professionals, too. For example, I called the office with a question about how my vision was responding to a new medication. Although the doctor was not in the office that day, the receptionist called me back within an hour with a recommendation from Doctor Whittaker...you won't receive this kind of patient care anywhere else!

name: Luther Juckett
text: Courteous, professional, very knowledgeable staff. Dr Whitaker is thorough and will take the time to answer any questions or concerns you may have.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this 5-star review. We really appreciate you being a customer and helping to share the word about us. We’re here for you anytime.

name: Pam Stauch
text: OMG!  I’ve been a patient for longer than I care to admit.  Dr Whitaker and her staff never cease to amaze me, whether it’s a routine check up or an emergency, they come through with caring professionalism.  This staff is professional, personable and caring.

resp.text: Thank you for the fabulous review! Dr. Whitaker and her staff always look forward to seeing you for your eye care and vision care needs. People like you make our work satisfying and enjoyable.  Dr. Whitaker and her staff have loved caring for you over the years and we look forward to many more!

resp.text: Thank you so much for this 5-star review. We really appreciate you being a customer and helping to share the word about us. We’re here for you anytime.

text: My husband and I love coming to see Dr. Whitaker, and her amazing staff. A few months back I had a terrible eye issue over the weekend so I called the office. The answering service got in touch with Dr. Whitaker and she came in on her off day to take care of me and my needs. I will recommend Dr. Whitaker to anyone, any day!

text: Dr. Whitaker is fantastic! She is very caring, takes her time to ensure I am getting a thorough eye exam, and always answers any questions I may have. I highly recommend going to see Dr. Whitaker and her staff.

name: Ann Kent
text: Great optometrist and staff, friendly, kind, caring and professional. I would recommend this doctor to everyone. She always does a thorough exam and takes time to answer my questions. I love the selection of eyeglass frames and the professional service I received.

text:
I highly recommends Athens Eye Care Center. My whole family gets seen by Dr. Whitaker, because she is so thorough, thoughtful, and truly does care that her patients leave being able to see 20/20 or better. The staff is just as delightful as Dr. Whitaker. The optical section has an amazing selection of Brand name frames, and the opticians make sure to help you find something you feel and look fantastic in!!

We love AECC!!

text: Dr. Whitaker and her staff are a pleasure to be around.  They are extremely knowledgeable in what they do and always take the time to answer my questions.  I recommend them to anyone looking for a family eye doctor!

text: As a new patient we were not sure what to expect and we were pleasingly surprised. It was well worth the 60-90 minute drive both ways for us to feel good about the type of exam and the service we received at both the front desk and for the exam. Thank you very much.

text: I had the best experience ever. The staff was wonderful. They are knowledgeable, helpful and sincerely care about the customer.  My optometrist was awesome, I can't wait until my next visit. I have found my forever eye care center.

I didn't feel like I was "just a number"I have decided that I will come here from now on..

name: David Hammonds

text: Meeting the staff and Dr Chaney at LensCrafters was wonderful. They took the time to not only serve me as a patient but talk to me as well..I felt very comfortable with Dr Chaney and she HEARD me..I got my eyes dilated for the first time in over 27 years...I have decided this will be the place I go every year for my Eye wear/ Exam..

text: Dr. Tyner and staff was excellent as always-very efficient process and will be again

name: Cedric Crenshaw
text: The professionalism was high grade, but I was more impressed with the way I felt at home and not made to feel like a stranger, esp during this terrible time of pandemic. Customer service is more important these days than anything, but you're more likely to lose something these days because of Covid. But nothing was missing at all here, even with everyone wearing a mask. I felt like could just come up there and hang out from time to time. It was a beautiful experience from everyone there.

name: Tasha Sanders - Richardson
text: Everything was timely, professional and pleasant.

name: Joshua
text: I feel like every few years I have to change eye doctors due to my insurance, but Dr. Tyner and his team is by far my favorite that I have had! His team was very friendly and extremely helpful even after there was a bit of a hang up with my insurance as my insurance card somehow didn't match the account number that the insurance had on file. But the lady at the front desk was able to figure it out and even printed me a new sheet with my correct information for my insurance!! Dr. Tyner was very patient and answered all of my questions and curiosities. I hope to be able to stay with them for as long as possible!

My experience with Dr Goodman was A++!
He is very knowledgeable and found a medical condition in my eyes that my medical doctor or no one else has found. He is completely confident  and educated at treating it. The staff is well trained, knowledgeable, courteous and helpful. They did more testing than any optometrist I have ever been too. I also commend them
for being very sanitary. I definitely appreciate that.

name: ANNETTE WATKINS
text: MY EYE EXAM EXPERIENCE WAS EXCELLANT AS USUAL . THE STAFF WAS COURTEOUS AND PROFESSIONAL. DURING THIS TIME THEY ARE MAKING SURE EVERYONE STAYS SAFE. I PRAY THAT THEY CONTINUE TO THRIVE DURING THIS DIFFICULT TIME. THANNNNNNNK YOU.

text: Professional and attentive doctor and staff. Best eye exam ever received. Would definitely recommend Dr Charles Goodman. This was my first visit and the wait time was no problem.

name: YamaKesha Thompson
text: The staff are Awesome, but the wait time is just through the roof. We always sit in the back 30+ minutes or more waiting on the Dr., when all he does is sit in the office. The timing here got to get better.

text: Awesome service very nice people

name: v lee
text: Great service! Very pleased.  Will return next year!

name: S. Ruff
text: Great customer service! Awesome staff! I wish I had them since I was 12. Thank you for your help!

name: Jolene Woodall
text: Can I get my 3 wasted hours back?! My appointment was at 11:30. Got there about 11:05. Filled out paperwork and handed back about 11:30. Was finally called about 12:35 to do preliminary work up which took about 20 minutes. Was shown back to waiting area. Maybe 10 minutes later put in an exam room. Finally walked out at 1:40 and still had not seen the doc for my exam. Also 2 other people were taken ahead of me and left before me. I had another appointment at 1:00 which i moved to 2:00 thus the reason i left at 1:40. When i mentioned the wait time the tech just babbled about nothing. Then when leaving and mentioning my 3 hour wait time....well no one really cared. I will not return and will not recommend Dr. Goodman and will make it a point to share with everyone I know.

name: Don Coleman
text: Appointment was at 2:30 and complete exam was done in 1 hour...very pleasant and courteous staff....Dr Goodman made you feel that you were important, did not hurry. answered all questions...very personable and would highly recommend him.

name: James Galyon
text: Update 3/6/2019. Doctor's office contacted me to try and bring me back in the fold. Stated several things had changed because of my experience . We made some concessions and I hope to use the doctor again next time. Update 2/2/19 as much as I hate to lower expectations...I should have.  Tried to order contacts last year couldn't get a call back much less an answer on Facebook. Came back last week eye exam (Awesome as always) had to order trials...phone call the following Wednesday saying the trials were in. Drive 50 miles to get them no one knows where they went. Suffice to say, that will do it. I will be doctor shopping closer to home. I have bad vision for years, but never such an awesome place to get it corrected(still stuck with glasses and contacts but you get the idea). Never have I seen a more caring and attentive staff. Explain all your options as you go. Wondered where they got their training and then I meet Dr. Goodman, then I understood. The caring attitude starts at the top and filters down. From start to finish I always knew what was going on, the options available for me, and the outcome to expect from each choice. By the end of the visit, I felt as I had been going there for years. Which I will and I will encourage EVERYONE to do the same.

name: Christina Buntyn
text: Love the staff, there amazing! They are really good about working you in. And I trust them with my eyes, that says it all.

name: Sharinell Lauderdale
text: Great rapport with patients.

text: Amazing Doctor!.

text: The staff here is amazing!!

text: My daughter’s appointment kept getting changed from the doctor she has always seen and she finally was forced to see a different doctor. When she went in, Dr. Letson completely disregarded everything she said and changed everything about the prescription that had been working. Very disappointed and will not be going back.

text: I went in to have my eye checked becuase of irritation. The doctor saw me quickly and did a thorough examination.  She explained what the problem was and the best course of action. Overall great experience.

text: Dr. Letson took her time working with me on the concerns about my vision. Very thorough exam and I left feeling great. I would highly recommend anyone to see her for their eye care!

text: We love Dr. Cox. She is the best! She always takes such good care of our family.

text: My eye exam visit went fine, pretty routine, no issues.  However, one of the reasons why I go to Dr. Cox is the convenience of Lens Crafters being right there and that I get my glasses in an hour.  This last time I was informed that Lens Crafters no longer provides that service and I have to wait 2 weeks for my lenses to come in.  I wish I would've known that beforehand.

text: The Optometrist wanted me to purchase office glasses, that were only useful for computer and reading use. I explained 3 times that I needed glasses for night time driving with no effect. My eyes were dilated for apparently no reason. The Optometrist never looked at my eyes after the drops were put in. I was asked to pay and I departed. This was an unprofessional visit in almost all aspects. Needless to say I didn't get new glasses.

name: Erika Blaydes
text: So when I called and asked how much is the exam for contacts, she said $93. I said Great! Schedule me in as soon as possible. The staff and optometrist was friendly! I was asked if I wanted the more in depth testing for back of the eye, which is $39. I asked what all it test for and the doctor was very informative. I accepted. So then I thought in my head..$93 plus $39 equals $132. We went thru with exam and discussed my contact brand, they gave me a trial size to try before they ordered. Perfect! But when I went to pay it was $250!  I asked why it was that amount, she said it was the contact fitting. So I paid anyway. I kept thinking about how the Dr. said the trial contacts was included in the exam so I called and asked for the manager. She apologized that I was mis informed, the exam is $115 then the  CONTACT exam is anywhere between $95 and $165, or something like that. So the contact exam is not all the same! You're charged for 2 exams! I would've stayed with my Walmart appt. So you're gonna pay at least $210 for an exam and Contact exam. She did credit half of $95 towards my contact order and said she will tell her receptionist to be more in depth and informative about contact exams.

resp.text: We appreciate you reaching out.  Sheena called you back I believe.  I know training has been conducted with our new staff members.  Thank you for helping us be better for our patients!

name: alice howland
text: Best service hands down! Others might complain about pricing but the service you receive covers it tenfold! I purchased my eyeglasses 1 1/2 ago. I was having issues with the frames a few months ago and they replaced them free of charge no hassle.  Fast forward to now, my replacements starting doing the same thing. They apologized and wanted  to make it right, even though it was the manufacturers fault. Minutes later  I was told to come in and swap them out for any pair I wanted and they would cover the lenses. Now that is quality service! That frame that I might of saved $40 on somewhere else just now saved me 2 new pairs of glasses! Davis Eye Care rocks. Great selection and great service. You will not be disappointed!

resp.text: Thank you Alice for the fabulous review!  Our staff knows how important it is for your visit and continued care to be the best you can find any where.  Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you!

name: Eliza
text: I called a day before appointment to see what my coverage was with my new insurance. I called right as they opened and was on hold for about five minutes while someone made sure they gave me the correct information. I was told that my exam would be covered. I go to my appointment to check out and they tell me I owe 75 dollars because my insurance only paid 40 dollars. All they could say was, “I’m sorry”. Very unhappy with the way they handled the situation. I made an unecessary appt because I knew my eyesight didn’t change much but I was told my insurance would cover the exam so I went. Very unhappy with this staff and the information they gave me. Two of the employees did not handle the situation appropriately. Davis Eye Care charges 115 dollars for an exam when you could go to another office for 64 dollars with better professionalism. My family and I will not be back.

resp.text: I apologize for this mishap in the office.  We have used this as an example of how to deliver better service to our patients.  We also have trained staff on presentation of benefits to the patient.

text: People are very courteous. Tests were explained very satisfactory. Dr was pleasant and explained and showed films of eyes. I would recommend this eye care center to everyone looking for pleasant atmosphere and friendly people.

text: Everyone was so polite and helpful! The new patient process was easy. Dr. Warner is amazing at what she does! This is my new eye care home from now on.

name: GREG RISNER
text:
Fantastic, knowledgeable doctor. Dr. Moore gave me a high-tech, thorough exam. Simply the best in Florence! I have had Keratoconis, a rare cornea disease since 1992 and have used Dr. Moore since. He is a lifesaver for me-- much more than an optometrist.

Wonderful, courteous, and patient staff, as well.

Gregory Paul Risner

name: Rickie Cole
text:
My visit to Renaissance Eye Care was initiated through the new VA referral system that the VA now has.
Renaissance was very professional from the moment I checked in and throughout my referral appointment.
Dr. Moore added to the professionalism when he completed my eye examination through explanation of photos taken of the back of my eye. He also gave me the feeling of complete confidence in his ability to professionally serve others as I was served on my eye examination visit.
Thanks to the Veterans Administration for selecting  Renaissance Eye Care as a referral outlet to better serve Veterans throughout the area.
You all are certainly a keeper...

name: Jennifer
text: Dr. Moore is awesome! I’m always full of questions and he’s more than happy to answer them! The staff is helpful and the business is very clean! 10/10!

name: Megan Ergle
text: I really liked going here! The doctor was very thorough in the examination and involved me in the process of getting my new prescription. (They also don’t do the thing that blows air into your eye which is really nice.) The only complaint that I have is that there didn’t seem to be much selection at all for frames under $150, or at least the nurse didn’t show me them besides the selection on the table. It made me feel confined to just one space or I had to pick frames that were way out of my price range. Besides that, I had a great experience!

name: Isabella
text: Great staff, optometrists, and selection of glasses. Very patient and will work with you to find the glasses that fit your face the best. The front staff also did a good job at navigating the messy waters of my weird insurance company. I am so pleased with this place and tell all my friends and family to go here! You won’t be disappointed.

name: Norma Thompson
text: I would recommend Renaissance Eye Care. Dr. Moore is very thorough and answer any questions you might have. All the staff are very friendly and helpful. A great place to go.

name: Dale Cohen
text: Renaissance Eye Care is a professional, yet friendly environment for eye care.  The staff is knowledgeable and able to explain technical concepts in a way the average person can understand.  Dr. Moore does a great job of moving the examination along efficiently while taking the time to add a personal touch to his care.  I highly recommend Renaissance for their amazing staff, but their selection of eye wear is also a plus.

name: Patricia Thomas
text: My 1st time visiting Renaissance Eye Care but I was very pleased with the service I received. I also like that I was able to look at and try on frames BEFORE the exam. I could actually see how they looked since my eyes had not yet been dilated.

name: Kat Watson
text: The most professional eye care place I've ever been to. The staff are very good and Dr. Moore does an awesome job with my eyecare. Highly recommend.

text: I love Renaissance Eye Center. I have been in glasses and contacts for 30 years. This eye care center is amazing, caring, friendly, and they truly care about their patients. I highly recommend everyone try them out! Phenomenal staff, doctors, and services!

They sent me home with a trial pair to see if that was going to work for me. I have been putting it off for quite some time but I am glad I chose them.

My Take

Choosing Renaissance was the right thing..

text: Dr. Moore is fantastic. He is very kind and detailed with his examination. I’ve never had any problems with scheduling or customer service. The receptionists are always very nice and helpful. Very good pricing on frames and lenses. I would definitely recommend this practice for all your eye needs.

name: Carl White
text: From the eye exam to picking out frames. I totally recommend them.

name: LaTasha Nichols
text: Love Renaissance! Me and my 3 children use them and they have always treated us well! I finally got a detailed explanation of what is "wrong" with my eyes why i cant see very well at all. Not just a "oh ur eyes are bad heres some glasses see you next time attitude" he actually took the time to explain why it was like this and why it was important for me to wear my glasses as much as possible!

name: Dan
text: My Wife and I have been customers of of Dr Warner and Renaissance for approximately 15 year and have alway has very good care and service. I work out of town and they have always on top of our needs. The 3 stars are for this last visit and is many because of the front staff does not seam to know what’s going on. I had new lenses ordered and never received a call, my wife calls and is told they have the lenses and to come on it and they will install them, I go down and I’m told the person is on break...ok I’ll come back as I have another thing to do. I get a call telling me they can’t put my new lenses in my frames because that person is not working today..... I’m leave town Saturday for work. What the heck, I will only be home once a month and it will be a weekend so there is no way Renaissance will be able to install my new lenses . Major fail on communication, why was I told to come in, why was I not called/text and told my lenses were ready as you have always done. Very disappointed and probably we won’t be coming back after all these years. I can’t have failures like this with me working out of town.

name: Telimea Sanders
text: My daughter started off going to the Bel Air Mall location the staff was wonderful. We changed locations due to us moving and for convenience.  The worst decision I ever made. The Schillinger Rd. Semmes location.  The Doctor is Awesome and the front desk staff is horrible unprofessional.  I would call in to make appointments and would be left on hold entirely too long .I would try calling back and speak with someone and the girl would have a attitude.  I left word to speak to a clinical manager never received a call back.. I called for weeks about my daughter's retainer and I have yet to get a response or the retainer that was paid for in advance..every time I call im left on hold. They really need to change office staff or send them back through customer service training and discuss professionalism with them.

name: Thomas Gardner
text: My wife and I had our annual eye exam today and Sarah was just wonderful. And as always Dr. Perry was a pleasure to have as an eye doctor been going to her for years will not go see anyone else!!! Thank you Sarah and Dr. Perry for the great office visit today.

text: The staff made me feel real welcome and most importantly, comfortable with my visit. I would recommend Mobile Bay to any of my friends and family (and I already have)!

text: I've been trying to get an appointment to install a tooth on my implant for two weeks now. Every time I call to schedule they tell me they will call me back and i have yet to hear from someone.  No one seems to know the proper steps or protocol to schedule me an appointment. Staff needs better knowledge of what's going on. I've been a patient with Mobile Bay Dental for over 15 years. I'm left with no choice but to find another Dentist office. Smh!!!!

text: They are awesome.Always have a great experience when I come here. Christy is the best.

text: The hygenist Kristy is awesome. She didn't lower me to the floor but let me sit at a comfortable setting. She is very caring & attentive to my needs. I highly recommend her.

The staff are very friendly and always willing to make the client feels comfortable and cared for. Our hygienist, Kristy, is absolutely AMAZING. She is very thorough, knowledgeable, and precise.

name: India Hope
text: This was my first visit and Kristy took care of me. Very fast and very attentive. Made me feel more than comfortable just with her warm smile!

Kristy she was great it was the best dentist visit ever!!
So professional and polite experience.  I will be back for more visits!!!!

name: JANICE KIDD
text: Hey I had a great 👍visit with the dentist and hygienist Kristy she is a wonderful and pleasant person to have a a hygienist Thank you so much.

text: What’s the purpose in having an appointment?? They send out a message saying be here on time and no later but yet we’ve been here for 45 minutes and people that came in after us have already been seen and left. I’ve never in my life been looked at as our time means nothing. Get with the program!! STOP over scheduling if you can’t see patients on time.

name: PJ Willis-Jackson
text: The best dental experience ever ! My hygienist Kristy is awesome! No long wait time, cater my every need and concerns.Friendly staff and calm atmosphere. Top notch Dentist who explain procedures thoroughly

name: Tiffany F
text: I give my overall experience 5 stars from the ladies at the front desk to the ladies in the back but, Christy the hygienist does an excellent job. She shows a passion for what she does. She goes above and beyond to make sure her patients are comfortable.

name: Eula McClain
text: Had a very pleasant visit with Krisity the hygienist  she had an awesome personality and did a great job, also front staff was very nice as well!

name: BriAnna Gardner
text: If I could give this place a ZERO, I really would! I had 2 extractions done for my wisdom teeth on last week and I’m so happy that I was late or it would have been 4! I couldn’t imagine having 4 teeth pulled because this place sent me home with NO ANTIBIOTICS. Only pain pills! I noticed that the pain was beginning to be a bit unbearable so I called and ask if it was normal and if I could come in. The RECEPTIONIST proceeds to tell me that everything was normal. She’s not a dentist so I called back to schedule an appointment to come in. My appointment was at 4:00. I didn’t even make it to the back until 4:40 after asking if I was forgot about! A heavier set girl in at the front desk said very dry “well they had to squeeze you in” as if I was a burden or something!   She left for the rest of the day. The other RECEPTIONIST I asked ignored me when I told her I’d been there for 40 min and never even got up to see what was going on Smh! The entire time I’m sitting in the waiting area the vision department was clapping and dancing to music (imagine how that feels to hear loud clapping after having your teeth pulled) VERY unprofessional! I finally was in the back at this point. The assistant that helped me was very nice and patient! I hate the fact that I didn’t get her name but I loved her attitude and how she was willingly trying to help me! I was sent home with antibiotics! The same antibiotics they said they didn’t give after a extraction smh and steroids for my swelling. He also gave me more tabs for pain as if I’m a junky or something or if that was going to make me happy. I’m not going back at all. Thanks but no thanks. On another note! text: I love that I’m able to come right after work. Everyone here is so nice and hospitable. I had a great experience!  Christy was amazing and so patience! She was able to explain to me all of my questions and concerns! Can’t wait for my next cleaning!! :)

name: Myeshia Smith
text: Dr Hankinson the owner and doctor at mobile bay dental in Semmes is very rude and so not kid friendly today was his second time being rude to my daughter once before he was rude to her at the bel air location my daughter was crying a little because she was scared to get teeth pulled and he told me he was not fixing to deal with that he didn’t even give my daughter a chance to calm down before he jumped up off his stool snatched his gloves off and walked out the room with no explanation he was extremely rude to us for the second time I will never take my daughter back to mobile bay ever again he has no patience for kids he told me once a bel air mall when my daughter cried he recommended the Semmes location because they were more kid friendly and now we go there this morning and his not kid friendly self was there I was extremely upset at how he treated us both times but today to find out he was the owner really took the cake for me

name: Monet Monet
text: The best dentist office I’ve ever been to!!! My 1 year old daughter felt so comfortable letting them assist her. No literally, you’ll fall IN LOVE with the staff! text: My children have been going to this dentist since they opened years ago... never had a problem, always very friendly, kind and helpful staff. Today on the other hand, I took all 3 of our kids in for their 6 mth checkup and cleaning. The hygienist was WONDERFUL.. the dentist/owner on the other hand was rude, arrogant, and crass. When he told me my oldest had a very deep cavity, I asked how it had gotten so deep in 6 mths, he chuckled and said oh we probably missed it the last time! Also when asking about dental issues that may arise with my daughter who has an autoimmune disease, I was met with incorrect, unsolicited medical advise infront of a room full of people that was very demeaning and humiliating! Needless to say I will be taking our business elsewhere.

text: Front desk was very welcoming! Dental hygienist were GREAT, especially Danielle!! we came in, they did their jobs and we got out at a good time. Highly recommend! Never a bad experience.

text: I’ve been waiting  for four months now for the vision Dr. to except the Medicaid they except Medicaid but not now. If you except Medicaid in the pass you should not stop because of a pandemic. Not right

resp.text: Our Belair Mall location is accepting all patients at this time. Please feel free to give us a call at 251-301-6555.

Wasn’t gonna come back anyways 🤣✌🏼 Weak place frfr .

text: This place is great! When I first walked in it was a little hectic, they have a play area for kids which is amazing, but the also have a adult only waiting room which was very nice. most unprofessional business I've ever dealt with.

do yourself a favor and go elsewhere.

text: Dr. Gast and his assistant are AMAZING! I have had several dental issues, and he ALWAYS takes his time and does a remarkable job. He is extremely professional, and cares about his patients. His assistant does also. I wish I could give them both more stars, but he will forever be my dentist. His office staff is ALWAYS friendly. I highly recommend Dr. Gast and his staff.

name: Victoria Meeks
text: I love Dr Perry, and staff !!

name: bex bama
text:
I went to this dentist a few months ago to have a crown glued back in. It only took approximately 2 minutes, total. However, I was in the office well over 3 hours. When I left, the lobby lights were off, no staff was available to check me out. The crown hasn’t come out since but a patient’s time should be considered. The fact that crown is still holding is the only reason they get 1 star.
Now, I brought my mother in today for an extraction. Although she was called back just 7 minutes past her appointment time, I fear I will be waiting for them to finish the job till the lobby is closed yet again.
I, personally, will not continue seeing the dentists at Mobile Bay Dental because I do value my time. Apparently, the staff at this particular dentist does not.

text: My eight year old had a horrific experience a couple of years ago when having dental work done. The young lady, Jessica, who helped him was very friendly and understanding. After administering nitrous oxide, my son calmed down and the procedure was completed very quickly and painlessly. I am extremely grateful for the patience, understanding and level of professionalism I experienced during our visit and would recommend this dental practice to all of my friends and family.

name: Kimberly Chappell
text: Well, I will never go back there, because they charge you taxes on your total  bill instead of charging you taxes on what you pay!!!! I ended up paying $100 extra then I would have if I went somewhere else!!! They need to  inform you more and explain it better!!! Because I would have took my prescriptions somewhere else. I have been getting glasses for 5 years and I have ever paid taxes on the total!!! I always paid on what my portion was!!! Please read all the reviews before choosing this vision care!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for your feedback and for the opportunity to allow us to explain the way that we charge our patients for Sales Tax on ophthalmic materials. Our policies are strictly adherent to the guidelines set forth by the Alabama Department of Revenue. We can only control the activities of our offices, and cannot comment on what policies may be in place at other practices you previously visited. At Mobile Bay Vision, we are committed to providing you with excellent care, and we understand how frustrating paying taxes can be. Unfortunately, we do not have any influence on what state law dictates. We can only follow the laws set forth by our lawmakers.

name: Jessica Folse
text: I love the entire building!! The front desk girls are the best! I came in with 3 of my kids and one of them was my 2 year old son, first time at the dentist, who was nearing the end of potty training and after they finished with him, making his first experience an easy one, and while I was in the back myself, they watched him play on the playground. WELL, he had an accident and peed all the way down the slide and they did not even hesitate! They shut the playground down climbed in that slide and cleaned up the entire thing while I was still in the back! They never once made me feel like it was my fault and they actually blamed it on themselves for giving him water. They are always so sweet and accommodating for me with my 5 kids. As long as this place is open I'll never go anywhere else! And Callie Taylor, Dr. Q and Dr. Gast are the best!

name: Bianca White
text: I don't even know where to start. I feel like the staff was very unprofessional. People were constantly in and out of the room, asking questions, getting supplies having personal conversations over my mouth. Which would have been better had they not been having problems fitting the crown but I felt as though they should have been more focused on that than on greys anatomy. We were there for 3 hours for a fill in and a crown. When it was time to check out there was only one person at the desk and a line of people waiting. When asked if there was assistance available the front desk clerk just told us to call back and schedule an appointment if necessary. Which isn't what we needed but we ended up leaving anyway. Definitely won't be going back.

name: Aaliyah Taylor
text: The staff in the vision center here is amazing! Ms. Leah and Brandy were so helpful and kind. I will definitely be back!

name: Water Staff
text: Great staff! The hygienist, Danielle did an excellent job and was very helpful with questions that I had.

name: Brantley Cook
text:
Wonderful dentistry. Assistants were very helpful and provided a pleasant experience. Calm atmosphere. Great service. I can't wait to come back, actually. 9.5/10

P.S.-Ask for Alicia and Gina! They tended to me and were absolutely wonderful!

name: Ultreya Park
text: Dr. Terry and her assistant were great, as was the woman in the glasses area. They were very patient and explained things very thoroughly and were very understanding with a little bit of fear on the part of my family member. A woman in the glasses area brought out about a dozen other choices that they did not have room to display. I was put on hold for 13 minutes, however when I called to confirm our appt., at which point they almost hung up on me before I could actually get all of the information. And then it turned out that they also did not confirm the location, and so when we arrived at the place that I made the appointment for, they told me that the appointment was for the other location. Fortunately, they were not busy and were able to go ahead with the exam at location where we were. All of that could have been resolved though, with simply slowing down during the phone call, and being more thorough. Or use text to confirm! Great once you get there.

name: Laura Coletta
text: The doctors and hygienists are pretty awesome but the girls at the front desk, not that much.

name: Kimberly Williams
text: Great service and Kristy was my hygienist and she is awesome!  Would highly recommend this place!

name: Minh Tran
text: The purpose of my visit was for an extraction. Everyone was very polite and friendly and before I knew it everything was finished. Would highly recommend this location and the wonderful staff.

name: Caylei Hicks
text: This has been my girls dentist since 2012 and we will never go anywhere else! They are always so kind, professional, fast, and friendly! They always make my girls feel at home and comfortable with any procedure being done!!

name: shane533
text:
Everyone was great and made going to the dentist fun.

Christie was the best.

name: Mason Andrew
text: I had a really good experience. The doctor took her time with my exam and Danielle helped me with my glasses. I would recommend everyone to see Dr Perry.

name: Shemeka Harper
text: I gave 1 stars because it's been a pleasure working with them . The problem is with payments in between the 2 offices and time wasted since they cant get their financial team together . I have 2 daughters with braces and the same issue . They're payment are current and when it's time for the braces to come off and the bill is paid in full , the mall location sends you to the semmes location and upon arrival there is suddenly a 400 dollar bill that pops out of nowhere . Just today we went for my youngest to have her hard where removed and was told we have a 380 dollar bill due from 2017 .... really ???? Mind you the bill had to be paid in full before the appointment could be scheduled for the hardware removal so how is this even possible ... absolute RIP off of 400 per person when it's time for removal. This is not once but twice for us. This time I'm going to the Better Buisness Bureau

name: Leigh Foster
text: I love this place. The playground is great for kids. I had an eye exam and loved Dr Perry. Danielle was awesome helping me with glasses.

text: My 3 yr. old and I had an eye appointment yesterday and my son was screaming and crying for 1 reason... HE HAD TO LEAVE! Dr. Perry is fabulous and amazing with her work and absolutely wonderful with children. My so adored her and so do I! All 3 of my children had an appointment with the Dentist today and I had the same result! Their play area and movie room is fanomimal  and it couldn't have been a better experience even with the front desk. I will be coming back. & another plus they take Medicaid for children! If I could I would give them 100 stars but I'm only allowed 5.

name: Amber Dean
text: The best staff and atmosphere of a dental office I have ever been apart of! Great with adults and children! Amazing pricing which always a huge plus! They have an awesome company discount pricing if you don't have insurance! I highly recommend this dental office!

text: Professional friendly and affordable. Hate the dentist love this place.

text: The dentist office is beautiful and child friendly. All the staff were so welcoming and nice. Everyone there had such great attitudes. I really enjoyed my first visit and would  recommend this dentist office to everyone.

text: I love this place! Dr. Perry is such a god doctor. She takes her time with patients and explains everything so that you understand.

text: Absolutely the best service ever from Dr. Perry and the staff.  They were so patient and worked with us to ensure we received the best deal with multiple vision insurance plans.  Highly recommend!

text: Had 4 wisdom teeth removed on a Friday (3 pulled and one cut out) and I was back to work on Monday. Dr. Gast did an Awesome job and the staff was great and very helpful.

name: Allison Hall
text: The staff was amazing in particular Patricia S. She was so helpful and made me feel very comfortable. I was able to make a same day appointment which is hard to find. I will definitely be coming back.

text: They are amazing!  I was so embarrassed to go to the dentist because I haven't been in 7 years, and they made me feel so at home.  They even let me fill out paperwork for my husband that has an appointment tomorrow.  I will even be bringing me 2 and 4 year old back next week.

text: They were helpful, nice & financially reasonable.😁

text: My daughter loves it here, she got her braces on in January and everyone has been so nice. They are affordable and they work with you. I would recommend them!

name: April May
text: The vision center is difficult to work with.  Everyone is extremely nice, but their follow through is horrible.  I have had several instances, where I have paid for services and then never called when the product came in and the procedure was never performed.  I also had to bring my glasses back as the lens were cracked and when I got them back, they were not the same as the first ones.  I had paid extra for the top of the line with all of the add ons and when I got the "fixed ones" back, these were not added to the lenses.  Very disappointed also that if you call close to 5pm, they never answer the phone.

text: Absolutely best dentist office i have ever been to.  An awesome play area for kids..friendly staff..great all around!

text: Great place!! Awesome staff!! Even tho there was a miscommunication with the appointment times, they fixed it. The vision staff stayed an extra hour so they could see my 3 children. They found what prescription glasses my son really needed because his previous eye doctor gave him the wrong prescription glasses. Best place in mobile to take your children, very accommodating and they really do care about their  patients and parents.

name: Jessika Weeks
text: Friendly staff, highly recommend, beautiful office. Danielle was the best !!!

text: My kids love it here. They have a wonderful play area with slide and a movie room. Very clean! Dentist's and Assistants/nurses very attentive!

name: beach mess
text: New building with new equipment. Was impressed with all of the staff I came in contact with. Friendly, yet professional. Went for a teeth cleaning & check up. First time EVER that I can remember that I had NO pain from the teeth cleaning. I have some sensitive areas and no matter how careful the hygienist are, I end up digging my nails in the chair arm.....The children if they so choose, can enter the building by following the small foot steps leading to the child size door (awesome idea!). Upon entry they will find a separated waiting room from the adults that includes an inside play area and gaming stations. Can't believe I am saying this, but I am already looking forward to my next appointment and would have used the small door if I could fit thru it!

name: Zachary Haskamp
text: Good place, wish they were open on weekends.

name: ·-·E n d o g e n y·-·
