text: From the time we walked in the front door until we left we were greeted with.friendly smiles and cheerful attitudes.   Thank you so much for taking such wonderful care of me.

name: Nathan
text: Fast easy appointment set up for new patients, called on Wednesday had a appointment at 8 am Friday!  Day of appointment,  very fast and easy. All staff members were great! Highly recommend!

name: lee anne bostick
text: Dr. Martin is fabulous as is her staff. Very little wait and always professional. I highly recommend.

name: Ashley McClure
text: Very nice people, They get you in and out and they have a great bed side manner.

name: Anna Johnson
text: Could have not had a better experience working with Dr. Mitchell and his team in Huntsville. Communication, professionalism, and patience the staff portrayed really made the Lasik experience flawless! Highly recommend.

name: sue masters
text: They were great with my mom Mary Wharton. She was very happy with everyone from the time we walked in until we left. She said she wished her other appointments for her eye went just as nice.

name: Robert Parks
text: Received a thorough eye exam and an excellent professional assessment of current medical status of my eyesight and best advice for continuing in good health.

name: Michelle
text:
This place is FANTASTIC. My doctor is Dr. Salter. He recently saved me from blindness. Because of multiple health issues and drug allergies, I had to have eye surgery wide awake, with only local anesthetic. He was so GENTLE and compassionate... We got through both surgeries free of any complications.

His staff are some of the warmest loveliest people. I've dealt with all of them at one point or another - med refills, scheduling, on call on weekends - they're so fantastic.

Being chronically ill means you see LOTS of doctors. I've had some serious lemons. It makes me appreciate good care, which I assure you that you will get at Maynor and Mitchell.

Thank you again Doc -
M.B.

name: Lauren Adams
text: After years of wearing contacts I finally got up the courage to get LASIK surgery. Dr. Ramsey did my surgery last year and I couldn’t be happier with the results! Everyone who works in their office is super nice and made the surgery and the whole process so easy. I can’t recommend them enough. My only regret is that I didn’t have it done sooner.

name: Robert Fennie
text: My visit was very professional. The staff was very professional. I would recommend you to anyone.

name: Michael Cackowski
text: The business Maynor&Mitchell  does what it is suppose to do in regards to my condition, which to me rates a 3-Star.  I gave it an extra star because the Dr listened to what I wanted done during my visit.  I do not know all the possible services offered, so based on my experience they do their job!

name: Lee Fudge
text: Great staff explains the whole process. Doctors are extremely patient and answer and explain in detail. Results are wonderful!

name: Nancy Matlock
text: I recently had cataracts removed from both eyes. They have the nicest and friendly people working there. I felt like a real person not a number. They called on the Monday after my surgery to see how I was doing and if I had any questions. Dr. Mitchell was very nice and friendly. I felt comfortable with doing the surgery. I would recommend them for cataract removal.

name: William Moore
text: The facility was nice with ample parking and the interior was calm, quiet and somehow not too bright. From the first young lady who greeted me to the final one who wrapped up my appointment information, everyone had the perfect blend of personality and professionalism. I left with complete confidence!

name: Teresa Martin
text: My husband and I have been patients for over 12 years.  We have always had the best of care from the Doctors down to the receptionists.

name: Robert Satterwhite
text: Great place. All the people that work there are great. Professional attitude but fun. Doctors do a great job also. Been going there for several years and will keep going back.

name: Kathy Bryant
text: My experience with Maynor & Mitchell was wonderful. The nurses and technicians went above their duty to help me.  I was a little nervous and there was noting to be nervous about.  While I was in the waiting room, a lady from my church came out telling me how wonderful they were. She was right.  Thank you for helping me see better!

name: Kathy Saladino
text: Dr. Mitchell is fantastic!! Would definitely recommend him to anyone having eye problems.

name: Laura Teets
text: Dr. Mitchell did my lasik about 3 years ago and now I am seeing Dr. Martin for my annual eye care. I absolutely adore Dr. Mitchell's staff (especially Libby!) This has to be the busiest eye doctor's office I've ever seen...a testament to their quality if you ask me!

name: andrew ausin
text: My wife worked there and was unable to provide childcare due to the coronavirus. (Daycares were shut down) and she was given the option of no pay or to come in and work. So when you think about using this place, think about how they treat their employees who spend 40 hours a week there. Since she couldn’t provide a 2 weeks notice they also kept her earned time off pay as well.

name: Sharon Young
text:
Every time I come in the staff and Dr Martin is very pleasant and treat you with respect.  Great place to get your eyes checked.

Thank You.
Sharon Young

name: Jodi Rutenberg
text: Awesome care from caring staff and doctors!

name: Sarah Bonkoski
text: A year ago I had lasik surgery done by Dr. Ramsey so I wouldn't have to wear my glasses at my wedding. It was a wedding shower gift from my mom. (I'm allergic to contacts) and it has been the best thing I haves ever done (besides marrying my best friend)

name: Bill Whitmer
text: Dr. Martin and Dr. Ramsey are very knowledgeable and helpful. The staff is very friendly.

name: Magen Gilmore
text: Highly recommend! Dr. Salter made sure I was well informed and comfortable with my treatment plan. All of the staff were super nice too.

name: Doris Grisham
text: Best eye center for cataract surgery. Doctor Mitchell was great and explained everything in detail. I could not have gone to a better eye center.

name: Patrick D. McManus
text: Staff is caring, professional, courteous, and thorough. Dr. Maynor, as always, encouraging.

name: Brenda Lee Graham Eubanks
text: I was seen in a very timely manner at my last appointment. The staff all were very courteous and helpful. Dr. Martin is a wonderful ophthalmologist.

name: June Mckinney
text: Everyone is very nice very helpful and makes you feel at ease. The Establishment is very clean neat and you can feel comfortable and both the exam and surgery rooms. Dr. Mitchell is extremely personable and I feel very comfortable with anything he says or when he does any type of surgery on my eye s.

name: Lee Cooper
text: My wife & I went to Maynor & Mitchell yesterday for eye exams. My normal eye Dr charges only a $20 copay. I thought I would try this place to help me get back to wearing contacts, trying a different brand. My eye Dr told me that wouldn’t matter but it was worth a try. M&M up charged us and we had to pay $410 when we checked out. They should have informed me of all the extra charges when we got there so we could have left. Contacts are NOT at all that important. I should not have paid it. That was ridiculous. I will not return. I will not recommend them. Get your prices upfront if you go there!

name: Doris Holaway
text: Very pleasant staff and great doctor that seems to know his stuff. I would recommend Dr Ramsey

name: Tina Kilgo
text: Dr. Ramsey and his staff took the fear and worry out of this delicate procedure.  They were friendly, professional, and efficient. Amazing results!  Thank you all for the wonderful care you gave to My Sweetie.

name: Sandra Dover
text:
I was very pleased with the whole experience.  Was disappointed
when I learned that the vision I hoped would be available through insurance will be a unexpected expense.  I intend to have it anyway.

name: Leivy
text: Dr. Ramsey went ABOVE AND BEYOND for my father. I am beyond grateful for him and his staff!  My husband was also seen at this clinic a couple of years ago by another doctor and also received exceptional service. Highly recommended this clinic!

name: Judy Brewer
text: Great Drs and staff

name: Douglas Garcia
text: No complaint on service but kind of expensive for the time spent

name: Guy McKay
text:
Surgery 3-4 years ago, will never go back.  Cannot recommend.
Bad Cataracts, Really wanted Lasik.  They wanted the money.
They shouldn't have performed due to Fuchs' Dystropy.  Staff was rude.  I won't say they lied but stretched the truth about low interest financing. They also had a discount agreement with Dynetics which they didn't mention or even honor; oh you came in on the wrong side of the business. Yes, wish I hadn't come in. Almost $5000 later, I've never had the results they stated.  Now I may never get full use of one eye.  Still needed glasses. They only should have done cataract removal and lens replacement.  Buyer Beware.

name: Frances Akridge
text: I was referred here 12 years ago by the researchers at the Wilmer Eye Clinic in Birmingham. I have a great team of physicians in this practice.

name: Michael Johnson
text: I was Talked into paying thousands extra for Lasik and implants on top of my cataract surgery, have now lost 25% of my vision after 2 corrections. Then told they can't correct the problem detected by a later test. Be VERY careful of their promises.!!!!!!

name: Allison Moeller
text: I've only gone once and won't be back.  The appointment was pretty normal, but I had to wait 45 minutes and the place is huge - it's like a cattle call.    What clinched it though is the billing.  I don't have vision insurance, just BC/BS and got an eye checkup and glaucoma screening back in June 2017.  Paid my copay at the door, then... nothing.  Finally got a bill for $80 in February or March, then another for $49 JUNE 2018.  That is a pretty ridiculous timeframe, and it has not been my experience with past providers.

name: Virginia Elliott
text: Dr. Mitchell is the cream of the crop. He truly cares never being satisfied with anything less than perfect. The staff are friendly and helpful. Waiting time can vary but I don't mind waiting for a doctor who will give you the absolute best treatment.

name: Joey Rogers
text: I have gone to Maynor & Mitchell for a while.  I never know who my doctor is going to be there when I go.  I have had 4 so far.   If you have something like an eye infection, don't bother calling.  It will take a week to get in.  I complained about this one time and the Doctor told me to call and he would just prescribe medicine on the phone.  Tried that, they wouldn't do it, week to get in.   On just a normal checkup appointment, prepare for long waits.  They are not very good with scheduling.

name: Melissa McCullogh
text: Great place

name: Wayne Jones
text: Always a wonderful experience !!!!!

name: Caitlin Fann
text:
I left a review awhile ago about how awful this place was but I removed it because they said they would fix it.
I have called the place several times to fix my bill ( I get mailed a statement).
When I made the appointment I had my insurance on the phone to make sure what they cover and told the lady I only want to do what my insurance would cover ( I was ordering contacts). I kept getting bills saying I owed money and even though when I had my appointment I was told I would owe anything. I’ve called several time and my mom has also called trying to fix it. The last time I called a lady said that they will call me back within the next week.. I never received a phone call.
Eventually my mom stepped in and they actually hung up on her. We talked to my old insurance company and they said they never even received a claim.
This place has highly disappointed me.
It looks very pleasant on the outside and inside,  but the people that work there are the opposite.

name: Ron Davis
text: I have been a patient of Florence Eye Center for years and I have always received great service. I trust my optometrist (Kathryn) and Lyndsey did a wonderful job recently taking care of getting my new glasses. I have several family members that use this business as well. I fully recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you Ron!

name: Shaun Dalton
text:
I bought eye glasses  here 4 years ago,  as well as my  children's glasses, I've also purchased my contacts here as well.
I noticed the coating coming off one of my lenses a few months ago. Brought it in today and he told me that it is the anti glare coating that is coming off. I asked him if this is normal after just 4 years,  he said not really but it does happen?? I've got glasses I've had 10 years and nothing like this has happened. He could have offered to order me some new lenses and give me a 10.00 discount and I would have felt better about my issues.

He said there is nothing he can do since it's been 4 years. 4 years?  400.00 glasses?
Save your money and go somewhere else.
This shouldn't be happening...

name: tony triolo
text: I went to purchase single vision glasses. The sales girl said I should try the progressive lenses and that if I did not like them, I had 30 days to bring them back and they would replace them. The progressive glasses were $90 more expensive. I did not like the progressive lenses and returned them. They said that they would replace them but not credit me the $90. This was never explained to me at the time or I would have purchased the single vision glasses. Bad business.

name: Vicki
text: Thanks to Billy allowing me to address my concerns/ issues and his professionalism  I was able to have resolution and look forward to a better experience in the future. Thanks again!

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that you are having trouble reaching us.  Please feel free to call our office and ask Lindsay. We will certainly make every attempt to help you. 256.766.3139.

name: Kristi Whitlock
text: I had my first visit today with Raleigh and Dr. Thigpen. Both ladies were amazing. So patient with me as I was nervous for my visit and as I tried on almost every pair of frames they have in stock. It was a great experience. They made me feel very comfortable and confident in my final selections. I couldn’t have hoped for more and I cannot wait to pick up my glasses!

resp.text: Thank you Kristi!!!

name: Lynn Wray Dillard (Alabama Creeks)
text: Wide selection of glasses. Very fancy decor and a coffee bar that would make Juan Valdez proud. My daughter forgot her contacts back at college and these nice folks gave her a few pairs to hold her she got back to school.

resp.text: Ha! Thank you so much Lynn!

name: Michelle Hayes
text: Excellent service!!! Dr. Thigpen is awesome as is all the staff! Amelya was also great and so friendly!!! This was my first eye exam and eyeglass purchase!! Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thank you Michelle!

name: Tina Simmons
text: Still waiting for reordered glasses. I waited for the first order for three weeks. I finally called to check, and they said they had the glasses, but had failed to get my phone number. 🙄 So they had just been sitting there. As it turns out, they ordered the wrong kind of lenses, so they reordered over a week ago. Haven’t heard a word. I will call them tomorrow. Maybe they’ve had them there again, although I did double check that they had my number. They have a nice showroom, but if they are going to be overpriced, then they should at least be fast and professional.

name: Alydia Murphy
text: I have been going to the Florence eye center for some time now they are amazing. They’ve got a wide variety of glasses along with glasses accessories and more. Ms.Amanda is a sweet lady she will make you feel at home. She tries to make the patients feels comfortable and wanted. Not saying that everyone here doesn’t do the same probably just as well. But if you want true service check this place out.

resp.text: We appreciate your confidence and trust in us, Alydia!

name: Jennifer Markham
text: I am so thankful for the Florence Eye Center! They are very professional but more than that they are extremely kind.... Thanks to you all!

resp.text: Thank you, Jennifer! Please let us know if we can be of any additional assistance to you.

name: Wendell Moore
text:
It’s a nice place but it’s overpriced for the service you get. I have good vision insurance but they charge you separate for everything it seems. Other places I’ve been to the copay is $10-$25. Here it was $60. Then I priced glasses and was quoted $250 with insurance, came back with cash and somehow they miscalculated and it jumped to almost $400. Then I ordered contacts when my insurance reset and they said I didn’t owe anything, a while later I got a call saying I was being turned over to collections if I didn’t pay money owed. Somehow owed $80 so I paid it. Then I got an eye infection and they kept prescribing $120 drops and it never helped.  Went yo another doctor and was prescribed $10 drops and it cleared it up. Wouldn’t recommend
And no I didn’t use my real name and email

name: Kylie Murks
text: Florence Eye Center is where me and my family will ALWAYS go for our vision needs! Taryn is a tremendous help! She was with us during the exam and picking out glasses AND even ordered our contacts. She can do it all! They also did an exam on my son before he was a year old! Thanks for being awesome to our family!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you Kylie.  You're like family to us.  Taryn really can do it all.  We are so glad that you and your family chose us to be your eye care team!!!

name: Brittany Drowns
text: It was the best customer service I could've asked for! Amanda Brown was the sweetest from the moment I went back to the room! She helped me pick out frames that fit my face and I was so thankful as this is my first time ever wearing glasses! Absolutely 100% pleased.

resp.text: Thank you Brittany!

name: Roy Pearson
text: i would give zero stars if i could. this place sucks

resp.text: We are certainly sorry to learn that you feel this way.  We strive to provide excellence in eye care and eyewear for our patients.  It appears that we have fallen short of our intended goals with you.  We would love the opportunity to change your opinion.  Give us a call at (256) 766-3139 and ask to speak with one of our wonderful managers.

name: Tammy Prince
text: I love this office & will never go anywhere else! They have tons of glasses to choose from and even if they don’t have what you’re looking for, they will find it! The opticians are great and very informative. Such a great atmosphere & amazing service! Thanks!

resp.text: Tammy, thank you for your confidence & trust in us!  We certainly appreciate it.

name: Karan Brawner
text: This office is absolutely beautiful!  I went in looking for frames and Sally helped me.  I tried on many frames and she was very patient and I valued her opinion.  We found the perfect frame for me!!!  Sally is a great asset to your office staff.

resp.text: You are absolutely correct.  Sally is amazing!  Her experience combined with her knowledge simply cannot be duplicated.  Thank you for taking time to offer your opinion of our office and staff!  : )

name: Ginger Witt
text: Florence Eye Center is amazing! Great atmosphere. Best eye doctors and staff around. Sally Pigg, the technician that took care of us was extremely knowledgeable and awesome to work with! Definitely knows her job and how to help. Would recommend to anyone!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you Ginger!  We appreciate you taking time to offer your opinion of our office and staff.  Please let us know if we can be of any additional service to you.

name: Emily Miles
text: I can’t say enough great things about this office, from  start to finish the staff was professional, informative, and caring. I found Taryn was extremely informative and made sure I understood everything before moving on to the next step. She certainly took her time with me and became personable makeing sure my experience was nothing short of amazing. I am completely happy with my experience and will definitely recommend this office to friends and family.

resp.text: : ) Big, Huge, Gigantic smiles from all us at Florence Eye Center!!!

name: Susan Shirley
text: I’ve been going to Florence Eye Center for years. I’ve always had a wonderful experience with everyone. Sally has always been very helpful with everything from the prep before my exam to helping pick out my glasses! She is so knowledgeable about her job! Thanks so much!!!

name: J Conlee
text:
Great atmosphere! Great staff! I especially respected the fact that my tech-person, Kiersten put my phobia of eye doctors to rest. She was calm and took her time to explain each step. And the eye doctor got the debris out of my eye on the first try!!

**edit**

As a former “disgruntled employee” I would have to note that any and all reviews above 3 stars were made with fraudulent intent to cover up the poor reviews of actual customers. The management had a contest for whichever employee has the most high rated reviews on google gets $500.
I don’t understand why they didn’t want to invest their time and money in properly training their staff especially after asking the management several times for help, guidance and training with no avail. Just click on each review and notice how the commenter says similar things for different locations of this branch out in muscle shoals and Madison.
But thank you “owners” (management) for replying to your own employee to toot your own horn and make yourself look like a half decent medical establishment. This isn’t a day spa, people actually come here for medical help and look here for honest reviews from actual customers bc they are spending money on their physical well being, not on a nice day out.

resp.text: We are happy that you such a good experience at our office!  Kudos to Kiersten!

name: Michael Darling
text:
My first visit, with an appointment, I was taken back and left in an exam room for 1 1/2 hr until I opened the door and yelled for someone to help me. Another wait for 20 minutes and I was leaving when the eye doc came in. He said “ oh, I was busy, did no one come tell You?”
This time the ordered my glasses, told me two weeks, and after almost three weeks, I had to go by the office..no one answered the phone tho I tried 3 times... the young girl seemed miffed that I asked her to check if they were in. They were, they handed them to me and said good bye...no fitting to face, no checking if they were right...nothing.
I will find a VSP provider other than FEC next year.

resp.text: We certainly hate to hear that you had a bad experience in our office. It definitely sounds like we failed to provide the level of service we strive for.  Please accept our apologies.

name: Josh Vincent
text: After Walmart quit taking our vision insurance, we made the switch and I’m glad we did. This is a great office, great environment, nice staff and the best doctors. We had great help from Taryn in helping select the correct frame with the best fit. I’ll definitely be back. Thanks!

name: Macie Pigg
text: This place is awesome! Great staff, beautiful set up, outstanding selections of frames. I will definitely be going here for all of my eye care needs!

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Thank you Macie!

(Original)
Thank you Macie!

name: Bill Crawford
text: I enjoyed my experience with this office.  The technology is out of this world.  I had never seen the back of my eye until now.  Thankful for a great experience and Taryn is helpful with glasses selection.

resp.text: Thank you Bill!  We are glad that you had a great experience at our office.  We make every effort to remain at the forefront of technology....thanks for noticing!

name: Pam Ritter
text: I highly recommend Florence Eye Center. Taryn recently helped me pick out the perfect glasses, and I love them! She does a great job!

resp.text: Thank you Pam!

name: Gabriel Carter
text:
Yes I came into Florence eye center today on February 13th 2019 and I could’ve felt more at home. I love the atmosphere here and all of the employees. A huge thanks to Hannah Campbell for assisting me on making a great choice of frames! Thanks again Hannah Campbell.
Mr. Carter

resp.text: Thank you Gabriel!

name: Freda Parkes
text: Beautifully decorated offices. Not the typical “doctor’s office” look and it’s nice. Taryn helped me with my glasses, and she was nice, too!

name: Hope Graham
text: Special thanks to Taryn for helping me pick out my glasses! So informative!  & great office, it’s decorated so nicely AND I love the massage chair!!!!

resp.text: Thanks Hope! We certainly appreciate you taking time to offer your opinion of our office and staff!

name: Charles Swindle
text: I sincerely appreciate the kindness of these good people. Not a long wait at all and staff so courteous. Now Dr Basden he is so considerate, polite, and respectful. I am a diabetic and was having some issues. Dr Basden did a through exam, found the problem and now we are working on things. I am a satisfied lifetime customer.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Swindle! We appreciate your kind words. Please let us know if we can be of any additional assistance to you.

name: Gary Sparks
text: Florence Eye Center is a place where you can find quality help from quality people. One of which is Bailey Pickens. Bailey is great at what she does! She cares for customers like family. For all of your eye care needs, you’ll be satisfied at Florence Eye Center!

resp.text: Thank you Gary!  You're absolutely correct about Bailey.  She loves what she does almost as much as the patients she helps.

name: April Smith
text: Bailey Pickens is the sweetest person! Very sweet and helpful! You are the best. Specks downtown is a very nice facility! You rock Bailey!!!

name: tammy williams
text: Love the eye center and the staff! Always great service and Sally Pigg was awesome to help me get my glasses. Highly recommend going here.

resp.text: We thank you Tammy for your kind words and trust in us!

name: Denise Steele
text: Beautiful office! Amanda was so helpful and very polite! I love Dr. Thigpen too! Excellent care!

resp.text: Thank you Denise!  We are very lucky to have Amanda and Dr. Thigpen! They are two of the most sincerely nice people that we know!

name: Johnnie Lyle
text: This office has the best technology of any office I have ever been to!  Optos is amazing! Choose that option! & let Taryn help you with your glasses!

resp.text: Johnnie, we thank you for your kind review.  We strive to provide the highest level of technology available to our patients.  We appreciate you noticing our efforts!  You are 100% correct about Optos and Taryn!

name: Nick Surles
text: The absolute best eye dr’s office around! Great staff with a friendly environment. Taryn always takes care of me and my family.

resp.text: You're a wise man! Taryn has years of experience and absolutely loves helping people.  Thank you for taking time to tell us about your experience in our office!

name: Naomi Smith
text: I was put in a situation where I had to go to another eye doctor for a visit due to the only eye doctor I'd ever gone to being far away at the time. This place worked with me wonderfully, and the people were super friendly and helpful! If I ever need an eye doctor in Florence again, these are my people for sure!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Naomi.  Please let us know if we can ever be of service to you again.

name: bethany Sparks
text: Florence Eye Center has a good variety of frames, and Bailey Pickens is very helpful. She has nice taste. She is very polite and friendly.

resp.text: Thanks Bethany!

name: Taylor Pickens
text: This is a wonderful eye clinic.  I would definitely recommend family and friends to go there!

resp.text: Thank you Taylor!

name: Anna-Blake Newton
text: Florence eye center is amazing! Taryn was such a great help at helping me pick out the right pair of glasses!

resp.text: Thanks Anna-Blake!

name: Cody Prince
text: This is a great office!  Great glasses selection!  Thanks to Dr. Basden for the most thorough exam!

resp.text: Thank you Cody!  We cannot thank you enough for your kind words.  Please let us know if we can do anything else for you.

name: Margie Stockton
text: So many beautiful frames to choose from, they have the best selection. I appreciate the young lady, Taryn, who helped me and gave me so much information.

name: Ashlyn Nicole
text: Love dr thigpen and how they work with you to get you whats right for you

resp.text: Thank you Ashlyn!  We appreciate your kind words!

name: Nicole Tuberville
text: Highly recommend Florence Eye Center! The staff is AWESOME! Bailey Pickens is always extremely nice and super helpful!

resp.text: Thank you Nicole!

name: Erik Mitchell
text: Great place to go!! I highly recommend Amanda. She’s a great tech!

resp.text: Thanks Erik!

name: Theresia Roach
text:
Everyone at the Florence eye center is excellent and Bailey Pickens is exceptional.
Thanks for all y’all do.

resp.text: Thank you Theresia!

name: Renai Herron
text: Florence Eye Center is a beautiful place with friendly staff and quick service! My daughter broke her glasses on the way to school and Ashton was able to repair them in no time!

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Thank you Renai!

(Original)
Thank you Renai!

name: Tina Hill
text: Florence Eye Center has the best doctors and staff! Sally Pigg is awesome!! My family will always use Florence eye center!

resp.text: We thank you for your kind words and trust in us!

name: Lisa Borden
text: Bailey is always so helpful and cheerful. Always a pleasure to come in. The decor is awesome.

resp.text: Thank you Lisa!

name: Brittany_ Alexandra
text: I've been going here for almost 4 years now and I love the staff here. I started out with glasses in 6th grade, they were very helpful in helping me find the perfect frames. When I got in high school I decided to get contacts to suit my activities and they were very patient and helpful by showing me how to put them in. This office is great with all ages, I love the themed rooms, the coffee bar, and the great frame selections. Thank you for being my favorite and only eye center ❤

resp.text: Thank you for your confidence and trust in us!  We certainly appreciate your kind words.  Our goal is excellence in eye care, customer service, and experience.  Again, thank you for taking time to provide us with positive feedback! Happy New Year!!!

name: It’s me Carrie
text: Bailey was so sweet and helpful during my visit. Definitely would recommend this clinic!!

name: Candace Cox
text: They are very good with my kids. Glad I found this place. My kids love going and we are never in the office long. Thanks for all y'alls great work.

resp.text: Thank you Candace! Please let us know if we can be of any additional service to you and your family.

name: Mary Davis
text: Great service and very friendly staff.  Thank you Kelsey for the help and patience.

name: BJ Wilson
text: Our family loves Florence Eye Center! A courteous and professional staff, like Bailey Pickens, make appointments a breeze.

name: Flory Stucky
text: I'm new to town and had an accident where my glasses got stepped on; the frame was bent and a lens had fallen out. I walked in without an appointment and asked if they could help me out. They had my glasses bent back in shape and the lens in within minutes and no charge! Great service all the way around. Looks like we found our new eye care center!

resp.text: Welcome to the Shoals area! We are happy to have you as part of our community.  Thank you for your kind words! We are glad we were able help you today. Please let us know if we can be of any additional assistance to you.

name: Bridgette Cummings
text: Taryn is the absolute best. I definitely recommend her!

resp.text: Thank you Bridgette!

name: Patricia McCoy
text: Wrong lens inserted on left eye, tried to replace it but it wouldn't come out. Right eye ok after lens implant for distance. Wish I had never wasted the $$ or time. I could see better with my contacts. Florence Eye Center in SC.

resp.text: I'm sorry..I am having trouble finding you in our system. What doctor did you see? We do not do implant surgery at this office. I think you may have us confused with another office. We will be glad to help you in anyway we can in the future.   We are Florence Eye Center in Florence, Alabama.

name: Mason Boersma
text: I had an amazing experience with Taryn, she was super helpful and sweet as well! I highly suggest Florence Eye Center!

resp.text: Taryn knows her stuff!  Sounds like we are preaching to the choir.  Thanks Mason!

name: jackie smith
text: My mother went here for glasses, both times she was not helped or even spoke to. She had to go to the front desk and ask for help after sitting waiting for over 20 minutes. Terrible customer service and very rude. Would not recommend.

resp.text: Jackie, please accept our apology on behalf of your mother.  We pride ourselves on providing excellent customer service and assistance. We are disappointed to learn that we failed to do so with your mother.  Can you tell us the day of the week your mother was in the office?  We will not tolerate this behavior from our staff.

name: slim whitman
text:
Only reason I gave it one star is because there was not a zero option, worst experience I've ever had. Been wearing contacts for over thirty years, have never paid a "fitting" fee. Basically, my contact prescription is being held hostage unless I pay an additional $65.00, after having a contact exam. I'll never step foot into one of these facilities again, and will quickly discourage anyone considering doing so. BTW, I had a contact only exam performed for less than the "fitting" fee, what a joke.

"Edit" Of course I used a different email than my actual email address, funny how you only addressed that instead of the "hostage fee" you charge in addition to the billed charges to ones' insurance. And no, I'm quite positive it was your facility (Muscle Shoals).

resp.text:
We have researched our appointments history and do not see a male patient with the last name Whitman for the past 6 months.   We hope that you mistaken our office with another.   If not, we are certainly sorry to learn that you feel this way about our practice.    It sounds like you've found a practice that suits you.  We hope that you will be happy there.  If we can be of service, please don't hesitate to call us.

Slim, we really aren't sure what to say at this point.  We do have an office in Muscle Shoals and we do charge a fee to fit a patient with contact lenses.  The fee is usual & customary.  Contact lenses are an option not necessity.  If you choose to wear contact lenses, you pay the fee to be evaluated.  We feel the same as you.  We aren't the right office for you.

name: Lafayette Mecham
text: What an incredible place! Beautiful office, great frame selection, and attentive doctors and staff! 👍👍👍I am bringing my entire family here.

resp.text: Thank you!  We make every effort to make each patient's experience with us exceptional.  We certainly appreciate your kind words!

name: Donita Kaye Munsey
text: Very nice building, decorations were great. Loved the fireplace! Friendly and helpful staff and a good selection of frames to choose from.

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Thank you, Donita!

(Original)
Thank you, Donita!

name: Telia Looney
text: I have been a patient at the Florence Eye Center for years now! The doctors are great, and Kasie is always super helpful with choosing new frames and answering questions!

resp.text: Thank you Telia!

name: Tyler Woods
text: Chelsey does an awsome job getting things done!

resp.text: Thank you Tyler!

name: Haley Nicholas
text: Beautiful office. Thanks to Taryn for all of the help!

name: Carmelo Parasiliti
text: Great Doctors & staff, had an eye emergency after hours and they opened up shop and took care of it.  Couldn't ask for a more friendly or talented office.

name: 8VD8OY
text: I Love Florence Eye Center! From the time I walked in to the time I left, I was treated with amazing care surrounded by a friendly staff!

resp.text: Thank you Bradleigh! Please let us know if we can offer any additional assistance to you.

name: B Grissom
text: Outstanding customer service. Thanks Taryn for the help with my glasses!

name: Dakota Wyan
text: love it here!

name: Sinnerella
text: Best thing about this place is Dr Basden. Very kind Doctor.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind comments about Dr. Basden!  Is there anything we can do to improve your opinion of our practice?

name: Jena Smith
text: The was every nice.only thing i don't like is how long i have to wait for my glasses .

resp.text: Jena, thanks for taking the time to send us feedback about your experience at our office.  We certainly appreciate your input!  We agree.  We don't like that patients have to wait for their glasses either.  Many insurance carriers now dictate which lens labs we can order eyeglass lenses from.  Your insurance is one of them.  If you want or need glasses sooner, we will gladly make you a pair in our in-house lab.  Insurance would not cover that pair but we can make them while you wait.  It will take approximately 1 hour.  Have a wonderful day!!!

name: Carmilla Evans
text: They are very nice and everyone keeps a smile on their face. Love you guys, thanx for the hospitality.

resp.text: Thank you so much!  Have a wonderful weekend!

name: Julie Oliverius Online
text: Great set up inside the office and very helpful, friendly staff.  I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Julie, Thank you so very much!!!  We are thrilled to know that you had a great experience at our office.  We apologize for not replying sooner.  Somehow, we missed your kind review.  Again, thank you and please let us know if we can be of service to you!

name: Angie Gibson
text: Beautiful  office,  super friendly  staff.  Open on Saturday.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so much, Angie!  We certainly appreciate your kind words. Please let us know if we can do anything for you.

name: Leornard Smith
text: Poor service. Walked in to look at frames before I made an appointment to get an idea on prices. I was in my work clothes and I guess I didn't look good enough to be a customer. Couldn't get anyone to help me or even make eye contact. Maybe they need glasses lol.

resp.text: Mr. Smith, please accept our apologies for not offering our assistance.   Our front desk & optical staff pride themselves on providing excellent customer service.  We are certainly displeased to learn that we didn't perform our jobs well for you.  We would love an opportunity to regain your trust and confidence.  Please accept our most sincere apologies.

name: Josh Phillips
text: Thanks Taryn for helping my boys with their glasses.

name: Mother Kids
text: I called yesterday they said I didn't need an appointment just come on in today. Got here today they are all booked up. Flashing sign saying walk in now.

resp.text: We are so sorry. Our schedule filled very quickly today...much quicker than we anticipated.  Please accept our apologies.

name: Dena Wilson
text: Super nice doctors. Good staff.

resp.text: Thank You!!!

name: Ashley Graves
text: Very awesome place discount for those without insurance

name: Stanley Carter
text: Great staff and service

name: Stanley Booker
text: Bailey is super helpful

resp.text: Thanks Stanley!

name: Richard Herron
text: Our family has been using Alabama Family Eye Care for several years now and we could not be more pleased. Dr. Curl is amazing! She takes the necessary time to accurately diagnose and treat any and all of your vision care needs. My 9 year old just had his first “official” eye exam and even he commented on how nice Dr. Curl and her staff treated him. I would highly recommend this practice if you are looking for a doctor who will treat you like a person and not just a number.

name: Mary Waldman
text: I ended up in Dr Curl's chair with a piece of dirt in my eye. I'm so happy I did because she's a wonderful doctor who removed it quickly and painlessly. Her office staff is professional and efficient and the office clean and attractive. Everyone observed correct hygene which I appreciate.

name: Sam Addy
text: Dr. Curl and the staff at Alabama Family Eye Care have seen to the eye health of my entire family for years, in my case at least 15 years.  They are always caring, courteous, knowledgeable, and professional.  I have recommended them to others and will continue doing so.  They are just great.

name: Jerry S
text: Dr Curl is one of the very best. My entire family has used her for 16 years. Their office is top notch, service from staff is outstanding and Dr Curl is a true professional. I highly recommend them.

name: Jennifer Sinelnikov
text: Very knowledgeable staff. Everyone wearing a mask. Able to answer all questions asked. Very helpful!!!

name: Brian Barksdale
text: Dr. Curl is awesome! Very thorough exam and testing, and pleasant experience overall. She does a great job explaining everything along the way. Highly recommend!

name: Andrea Steed
text: Dr. Curl and her staff were extremely thorough, kind, personable and helpful throughout my entire appointment.  She made contact and glasses suggestions based on my lifestyle.  I felt like she and the rest of her staff was quick and efficient, but I never felt rushed.  I will definitely continue to receive my eye care here!

name: Paul Mascia
text:
Been a patient of doc Curl for 14 years. Enough said. Regarding the 1star rating: Yo! How about YOU checking coverage out with your insurance company BEFORE you call a doctor???!!!. 2star rating: I was there last month and yes it took 2 weeks to get my glasses...that' s exactly what they told me!
See you next year doc.

name: nkeiru obi
text:
I came here because of all the wonders reviews, but just as a few commenters have said, I was not impressed. They were unorganized in calling my name to be led to the back, they let someone go ahead of me who came after me and had an appointment later than mine.
The gentleman who did the preliminary questions of my eye care was apologetic, I appreciated this. I had the eye doctor with long brown hair...not sure if this was Dr. Curl, I’m not sure that I care anyway...  I found her to be passive aggressive, she attempted to sound sincere when I asked questions but she was rushing me. Looking back I think they were a little behind schedule... but I’m not sure that’s an excuse.
The collection of glassware was nothing to write home about, it wasn’t in style, I was under impressed.
It took a full 2 weeks for the glasses I ordered to come in, I’m not sure if this is really their fault, but worth mentioning....
Flashforward to about 3-4 months later these “new” glasses already broke. It was covered in my insurance for a replacement  but they still made me pay a $20 dollar processing fee. 🤭
Needless to say, I won’t be returning ...But I do want to be fair...so  why did I give 2 stars.. here’s why:
1. The eye doctor ( lady with brown hair) was thorough.. still abrasive
2. The girl who measured the glasses to my face after they came in was very polite, she seemed genuine in wanting to help me find a pair I liked, she was honest
3. They give free bottles of water and fruit snacks and mints while waiting

name: G C
text: I have been using Dr. Curl for several years and always have received great care and treatment.  Very thorough, explains every step clearly and plainly, and her staff is professional yet friendly.  Great place!

name: Sharon Grimes
text:
The Optometrists at Alabama Family Eye Care are the best in my opinion! As I have grown older I have more eye problems and they have helped me through them! The staff is the best also, very knowledgeable, warm and friendly! I'm very happy with Alabama Family Eye Care.

Sharon Grimes

name: Ron Baldwin
text: Prior to moving out of state, my wife and I used Alabama Family Eye Care for a number of years.  Both of us were very pleased with the care that we received.  When I located a new optometrist, she confirmed all of the same potential vision issues that Dr. Curl had been tracking for me.

name: Chainsaw McCulloch
text:
Look - 5 stars says absolute professionalism!!!!  I don’t know of any doctor that takes the time with her patients as much as Dr Kurl does.

The ability of the techs on the optical side are just the same. The attention is wonderful and complete. The part I love is if there is any problem (and I mean any problem) with the glasses OR contacts they always do it for free if something isn’t right.

name: Dougie Fresh
text:
I would give it 10 stars if I could! Amazing staff, beautiful and convenient location in Hoover. They treat you like family and that is very rare at a doctor's office. They walk you through everything and make you feel super comfortable the entire time. The techs are polite, informative and super knowledgeable. The prices are great too!

For those who are tired of being treated like you are just another patient, go here. I promise you, it will be the best decision you have ever made for your family.

name: Jennifer Patton
text: If you are looking for a great optometrist, your search is over.  Dr. Curl is fantastic in every way.  Beautiful office with the newest technology, competent, caring staff, and excellent time management are just a few of the things that that will impress you about this office.  Dr. Curl is thorough and makes me feel  confident that the health of my eyes are in good hands.  I wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Elizabeth Zazueta
text: I am very happy with Dr. Curl & highly recommend her. I have a few issues she has been checking for me & I guarantee you she is very thorough. She does an excellent job of explaining test results, comparing last year's results to this year's & she makes sure to wait for you when she asks, "do you have any questions". I am fond of her technicians. They have always been very kind to me. I have never felt rushed. Picking out glasses has been fun. I just purchased another pair & I enjoyed being allowed to take my time & try on as many as I wanted. I never felt rushed. I feel she truly cares about my well being & that is what we all want. I highly recommend you go see Dr. Curl.

name: Donald Henry
text:
I've been a patient at Alabama Family Eye Care for the last couple of years.  My experience with the staff has always been exceptional and they make me feel like I'm part of their family.

Dr. Curl and Dr. Craig's exams are thorough, as they takes her time to make sure I have the best possible prescription for my contacts glasses.  Dr. Curl recommended a specific type of lenses for my vision and they are awesome!

The optical section has a great selection of fashion forward glasses and the optician did a great job in helping me find the right pair of frames for my personal style.

I will be a patient for many years to come!

name: Lydia Kirkland
text: I’ve been going here since I was in high school, I love the atmosphere and friendly nature of the staff. I never wait too long and if I have an emergency they always are able to fit me in. Great frame selection as well!!

name: Mary Horne
text: Dr. Curl recommended cataract surgery and also recommended a fantastic surgeon. She took care of my eyes post surgery . She is very very thorough and consistent. I trust her so much that I sent my son to see her. She has taken excellent care of his m as well.

name: Veronda Berry
text: Dr. Kurl always gets my prescription spot on. The staff is very friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. I would recommend Alabama Family Eyecare to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words!

name: Maria Fandetti
text: Last minute call for emergency appointment and took me right in. Excellent concern and care.

name: Betty MIMI
text: Excellent service. I appreciate the detailed information about my eye health.

name: Jolene Bernhardt
text: I arrived on time and was greeted by the friendly front desk staff. The wait was less than 5 minutes. I was immediately evaluated by a student doctor who was quite thorough. However, some of my numbers seemed to be incorrect. I waited less than 2 or 3 minutes for Dr Craig. She agreed the numbers weren't matching up to my previous visits. She performed her evaluation and we were thrilled to discover my pressure in both eyes had decreased significantly! Great news! She recommended I return in a few months for my regular pressure check. Checkout was quick and the staff was extremely polite and helpful. I couldn't be more pleased with my experiences with Alabama Family Eye Care.

name: Sherrie F
text: I've been seeing Dr. Curl for 18 yrs. She's the best eye doctor I've ever been to. Her whole staff is friendly and very helpful. Very nice office too. I would recommend Alabama Family Eye Care to anyone.

name: Matt Gray
text: Thanks to Dr. Curl & her amazing staff, I get fantastic eye care. They have all the latest technology to insure that I maintain great eyesight. The care here is excellent & should you need eye wear they have the perfect fit & style.

name: Marty Johnson
text: Great service and care

name: Joe Cory
text: We've had great care by their Ophthalmologists. They are good with kids, thorough, and do a good job of talking through any issues or questions we have. We recently had a billing issue, but their staff helped resolve the issue in a timely manner.

name: Terri K
text: I came to Dr Curl with multiple issues. She couldn’t have been more patient and helpful!  She answered all my questions throughly and didn’t make me feel foolish for asking them. A previous office visit to an ophthalmologist in Vestavia was quite the opposite experience. Thank you Dr Curl!

name: Cletis Smith
text: I've been a patient of Dr. Curl for over 10 years and by far the best and most thorough  eye care I've experienced. A warm, tremendous atmosphere that's comforting for all. Always great to visit and see Drs. Curl, Craig and the staff.

name: Terri K
text: I came to Dr Curl with multiple issues. She couldn’t have been more patient and helpful!  She answered all my questions throughly and didn’t make me feel foolish for asking them. A previous office visit to an ophthalmologist in Vestavia was quite the opposite experience. Thank you Dr Curl!

name: Sally Holsonback
text: Excellent eye care in every respect from Dr. Curl!  I highly recommend her and the staff at Alabama Eye Care.

name: Tracy Hendrix
text: Wonderful doctors and staff.  Very thorough exams.  Very friendly people.  Would highly recommend.

name: Paul Armstrong
text: Dr. Curl and her staff are warm and welcoming. A professional atmosphere, thorough examinations and complete eye care.

name: Bradley Isbell
text: The first question I asked them was do you accepted my type of eye insurance. After I made my appointment I asked them again to make sure. Well guess what? They don't. I wasted my time and lost money taking off of work because they clearly don't care about other people's lives/schedule. Thanks for nothing. You guys suck.

resp.text:
Bradley,

We apologize for our mistake with your insurance. We do accept your type of vision insurance, but the person who booked you was not aware that there are a few plans under that specific insurance that we are not allowed to accept (This is mandated by the insurance company, not us). We absolutely care about your time and schedule and sincerely apologize for our mistake.

name: Sarah Singleton
text: The staff here has been a blessing! Incredibly helpful!

name: Carrie Richardson
text: great service and friendly staff that was helpful!

name: Lindsey Alexander
text: So quick, thorough, and friendly. I’m switching from an eye doctor I’ve used for nearly 10 years.

name: jane smith

name: Joey West

name: Vern Head

text: The staff was amazing. It was my first time getting contacts and they made sure to make sure I knew how to install, take care of and remove my contacts. They were very thorough and personable and made me feel like family!

resp.text: This is so great to here - we are so glad you decided to try contacts (especially with the masks fogging up your lenses)! We are glad the fitting process went smoothly for you.

text: This was the most informative eye exam that I think I've ever had. Dr Dunn explained everything to me that he found about my eyes and that to me is awesome. You can tell that the entire staff really care about their patients. This will be the only place I get my eye exams from now on. There eyeglass selection is really great as well.

text: We visited The Family Eye Center today and the service was exceptional. Our 8 year old needed an eye exam and he was pretty nervous. We felt welcomed from the moment we stepped in until we walked out. A BIG thank you to the staff at The Family Eye Center!!!

resp.text: The first eye exam for kids can feel daunting so we are glad our team was able to put your child at ease. He did great!

text: I love family eye center, the employees are friendly and professional. Dr Perryman is an awesome 👏 friendly , smart she knows her profession very well. I “ve been framed by them a couple of times!!

My children also had a good experience here.

They all made me feel like I had been going there for years and I was apart of their family. Great place!!!!<

text: To say the least my eyes are a challenge for any doctor.Dr Wallace is awsome and really made me feel comfortable with her care.That is very hard to do with my vision.I think ive finally found the right eye doctor.The staff there is also very nice  and attentive.Thanks yall for being so great.

name: David Runyon

When good is not good enough, choose the best - Dr. Hamlin and Family Eye & Laser

name: Tom Myers

name: salina coleman
text: Had a very pleasant experience at this office the Dr. and staff a phenomenal. Would recommend my family and friends any day.

name: Victoria Hill Mitchell
text: We love everyone at family eye. We absolutely love Dr.  Perryman. We have awful luck with glasses with our boys but Mrs Tammy and her side take care of us.  We always feel at home and B always loves going.. Hands the best place to go for all ages.

text: The service I received was amazing. Fast and friendly is always a plus to me. Thanks Family Eye & Laser! I appreciate you guys!!!

name: Simply Me
text: I highly recommend going to this office. The staff is really friendly and professional.

name: Carol Pittman
text:
Did not get the news I had hoped for, but Dr. Dunn and the entire staff were concerned  and courteous.   Very pleased with the services and professional support given.  Thank you from a grateful and blessed customer.

Update: 9/21/2020
Issues still the same.  Nothing worse.  Awesome staff.  Thank you for such caring and supportive talk.

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that Carol. We appreciate your kind review of our team, we are blessed to have you as our patient.

name: Bruce Toney
text:
I absolutely love this place. I always look forward to my visits. All of my matters are always cared for and taken serious. Chasity always takes good of care of me and my family. she truly has a way with kids. Thanks Chas!
Thanks guys see you soon.

name: Taryn Mitchell
text: Dr. Perryman was phenomenal. She’s, by far, the best eye doctor I’ve ever seen. She and her staff are very thorough, they’re so nice, and so personable. I would give them 100 stars if I could. I’m so pleased with them and my decision to go see her. If you’re looking for an eye doctor, go see her!

resp.text: Taryn, we are so pleased you had a 100 star experience with Dr. Perryman and her team! Thanks for your kind review!

name: Ashley Bundrick
text: Everyone is so sweet in the office. I wasn't uncomfortable and Dr Hamlin was very sweet and honest to me today!

name: Freeman Jackson
text: I always have very good services when I visit Dr. Hamlin at family eye & laser in Troy,Al ( 2007 -2020)

name: sabrina calhoun
text:
First time stepping foot in this professional business. My mind was blown from receptionist who was quick and friendly (Tara)....wait time to see the doctor was less than 5 mins. Angela was very quick on her feet and very professional. All the way down to Dr. Dunn who came through the door shaking my hand greeting me like he has known me forever. Also his Asst. that was along his side. She didn't miss a beat. (Didn't get a good look at her name tag😔) Even when it was time to pay (which I hate doing) but the lady that checked me out was also very helpful and extremely nice ( didn't remember her name😔) I will most definitely recommend Family Eye & Laser to all my family and friends.  Never been in a place of business that made me feel so WELCOME and did I mention how good it smell when you walked through the door.
Definitely a 5 STAR in my book...

resp.text: Sabrina, WOW. What an incredible review of Dr. Dunn and his team? It sounds you like you had an excellent visit from start to finish and we are so glad you shared this with us! Your feedback is much appreciated! Thank you for choosing our office.

name: Tanesha Whatley
text: Best office! The doctors and staff are so sweet! I felt like I’ve know Cheyenne for years and met her the day of my appointment, she made me feel so comfortable and was super sweet! She worked me up for my exam! The entire office is so personable with everyone and made ME feel so happy! From start to finish my visit was great!

resp.text: Tanesha, thanks for the incredible review! We are so glad our team made you feel happy at your eye exam - that is high praise!

name: DEREK BRODERWAY
text: One of the best places for your eyes. My father had surgery and i was unable to leave my business and get my contacts. The very nice employees brought my contacts to my work. Amazing people working at this business. Thanks again for all the help.

name: Laurie Harden
text:
Family Eye Care & Laser in Troy, AL is awesome. Cheyenne, Anna & Dr. Hamlin will take excellent care of you. Go there today for any "eye" needs you have. You'll leave "seeing" things much more clearly, with a big smile
On your face.

name: Julie Montgomery
text: Awesome staff. Thank you all so much for putting up with me . I really appreciate your kindness and help. God bless each and everyone of you. Have a blessed week.
