text: Wonderful experience as always. All the staff are very friendly and helpful. Dr. Hamlin is awesome.

resp.text: We are so glad to here your experience was great and we think Dr. Hamlin is awesome too!

name: Jeff Burkett
text: Fantastic group of people, service with a smile every step of the way. I can’t think of a better place for an eye exam or to get glasses fitted. They are from A to Z top notch!!

name: Kaylee Davis
text: Awesome staff - everyone was so nice and outgoing ! Understands what you want and the best options for you ! I would recommend anyone !

name: Susan Grantham
text: I had a little accident this morning and I injured my eye. When I noticed that it had a cut and was bleeding, I called and the wonderful receptionist got me in today! In fact, she got me an appointment 1 1/2 hours after my accident. I was able to see Dr. Hamlin. The nurse was very thorough, and Dr. Hamlin was too. I appreciate them taking care of me at such short notice. Wonderful doctor and wonderful staff.

name: Autumn Baggett-Griggs
text: A great eye care center! Everyone has always been so nice and helpful - they break down your plan for you too so you know exactly what you’re paying for and what you save on. Chasity helped me yesterday and she was just the sweetest! Always the best quality and I love how easy they are to contact.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Autumn! Chasity is one of our newest team additions - isn't she great? We love her spirit. We understand your benefits can be difficult to sort out so we are glad our team was able to guide you through that.

name: Amy Stubblefield
text: Wonderful, patient staff and doctors in dealing with myself and my two young daughters!!

resp.text: We were so pleased to have you and your sweet girls in the office recently. Thanks for the review Amy!

name: Brenda Hatler
text: Cindy and the staff at Family Eye I Troy were efficient, friendly, knowable and made my 1st visit since moving from California the very best folks I've had the opportunity to work with... many thanks!

name: Mary Williams
text: Very well kept very kind people and seen in a timely manner I would have my whole family there Loved it for my daughter

name: Isabella Kate Alvarez
text: Loved the staff! Everyone was so friendly and I was in and out. They did their best to make my experience as convenient as possible and were able to work with my insurance company plus give me a deal on my contacts!! Highly recommend!

name: Tori Dunn
text:
UPDATE:  I had an appointment with Dr. Hamlin and he truly cares for his patients.  Dr. Hamlin & his staff Cheyenne, Paige and Torrie were very helpful in finding a plan that worked for me.  It was a pleasure.

I took my son to see Dr. Perryman and both she and her technician were fantastic with him.  Very patient and accommodating.  He had a great experience.

resp.text: Dr. Perryman is great with kids and we are glad you had that experience as well. Thanks for the review Tori!

name: Zach Brown
text: Absolutley great experience from the get-go. Nice and cozy environment to be in, super nice staff. I went in for one thing, and they actually helped me get glasses and contacts so for the first time in over 11 years I dont need glasses anymore! They were very helpfull and explanitory for helping a firt time user with taking out and putting in contacts. highly recommend them to everyone.

name: Kasey
text: Awesome staff that really takes the time to listen and get to know their patients! Monica (who seemed to be training) made my son feel so comfortable by explaining every detail of the tests, and Dr. Perryman made the exam fun and exciting! Highly recommend this office!

name: Kayla Wright
text: I stopped by to have my glasses adjusted and left with what felt like a brand new pair of glasses that fit my face perfectly. Gillian took the time to make sure I was 100% happy with the way the glasses fit my face and how they felt. She was happy to adjust them multiple times until I was completely satisfied. Thank you!!

resp.text: Gillian knows her stuff and we are glad she was able to adjust your frames to ensure you had the perfect fit! We know that glasses can get out of alignment over time, so stop by anytime you need a tune up! Thanks for your review!

name: Scott Singleton
text: I went there today and was really impressed, the staff was so friendly  and helpful. Thanks  for making me feel like family.

resp.text: We love nothing more than to hear that you felt right at home in our office, thanks for choosing Family Eye Scott.

name: jon adams
text: Tammy is the best. I really enjoy my visits to family eye and laser, everyone makes you feel at home. The doctors and staff are very personable. I'll come back yearly.

resp.text: We love to hear that Jon. It is always a pleasure to have you in our office. Thanks for your kind review of our team!

name: Cheyenne Commander
text: I have the best experience here. Always caring and considerate. Chasity is the best eye technician you can ask for. Definitely my favorite eye place, love it!

name: Penny Zingre
text:
All the staff was very pleasant and friendly. Facility is up to date and there are lots of trendy glasses to choose from.

Thank you Becca and Dr. Hamlin for an enjoyable visit.

If you need glasses, vision or anything dealing with your eyes I would highly recommend you come here!

resp.text: Penny, we are so glad you had a great experience at our office. We are LOVING our newly renovated office and Dr. Hamlin and his team are great! We appreciate your kind review.

name: Renee Cortner
text: Dr. Hamlin and staff have been giving me superior quality service for over a decade.  Regardless of my eye care needs, I leave knowing that every question has been answered and the health of my eyes are the primary concern.  Moreover, the personable and friendly atmosphere of Family Eye Care lets you know you are in good hands. Marcia deftly performed pre-exam duties and engaged me in a wonderful conversation, which yielded a favorable blood pressure. When a patient is put at ease from the beginning to the end of the appointment, all parties reap the benefits. There is little doubt that we all "see eye to eye" on receiving and providing quality service. Do your eyes a favor and place them in "contact" with this facility; their "vision" for using 21st century technology is "eye-opening".

name: Jessica G
text:
Everyone was super friendly and helpful! I had a great time chatting with Bailey, Dr P and Tammy!
Anna and Ms B also did great with my 8 yr old

name: Diane Pifer
text: My husband  charles have a great visit and would go back.  He would tell his friends to go to family eye & laser.  Very nice people there to help u

resp.text: We appreciate your husband's recommendation of us to his friends! Thanks for the review Diane!

name: Janice Barron
text: I have been a patient with Dr Dunn for many years. As always I went today and got a through check up and great conversation. Every one there is extra friendly. They will always be five stars to me ❤️

name: Tres Parker
text: Just as I remember it being. Nurse Chao was awesome in the first few test. Very thorough. Dr Hamlin got me back on track with my vision. Overly pleased.

name: Matthew Bowen
text: Quick, helpful, and informative. Thank you!

name: Carly Dysard
text: I went to the Troy office for a general eye exam. It had been the first time in (too) many years that I’ve had my eyes checked. This is an eye center that is unlike any I’ve been to before. The entire staff was so friendly. Tara at the front desk was so smiley and upbeat. She handled my check in so efficiently. I was sent back quickly with barely a wait time. Emily was my technician and she performed the tests in a cheerful manner and made me feel comfortable. Dr. Dunn gave a thorough exam and fully answered all of my questions I had. I will be getting all of my future exams or vision needs here from now on. Thank you all for being so wonderful!

resp.text: Thanks for your incredible review Carly!

name: Marcus Jones
text: I love when it’s time for my eye appointment!! ( i know that’s  weird 😂😂😂) The workers there always make me feel comfortable from the time i walk through the door till the time i walk out. Thank you to Tara, hailey B., Gillian, Betsey, Lea, Tammy,  Bailey and last but not lest Dr. Morning!!! Thank you all for everything you ladies do!!!

name: Paul B
text: Great office with the best staff. Have been going there since I was a child. Chas (Chastity) took great care with my daughter in her exam, and Dr. Hamlin is great. Tammy in the glass fitting area is awesome, she has been fitting my family with glasses for over 30 years!

resp.text: We are so glad you had a great experience with Dr. Hamlin and his team! Thank you for faithfully choosing our office for not only your eye cares needs but also your daughters! Thanks for the review Paul!

name: Felecia Ginyard
text: Everyone was so nice and professional to my daughter and I and I'm glad I got a chance to come back!!! Thank you Dr. Perryman and staff

name: ANTWAN
text: I would highly recommend Family Eye and Laser-Troy! Mrs. Bella was so nice and calming to my son, and Dr. Phan was kind and patient as well. Truly felt the family aspect!

name: Sharon McSwain-Holland
text: I had a detail eye examination  today. The staff and Dr Dunn were very thorough and professional job.

resp.text: We pride ourselves on the comprehensiveness of our eye exam and we appreciate your review!

name: dbfg 37
text: Great staff. And Dr. Hamlin is awesome. Everyone makes you feel like you are their top priority.

resp.text: We see patients as family and we are so glad you chose our team!

name: Jodie Reeder
text: The staff at Family Eye & Laser are always so kind and helpful.  Cassidy was awesome today helping me try contacts for the first time.  Dr. Hamlin is always so patient and takes his time when explaining things to me.  I can’t say enough about how great everyone was today and always!!

resp.text: Jodie, we are so glad you decided to give contact lenses a try - we know there are times you want to be glasses free. Cassidy is great at teaching people how to insert and remove their contacts! We really appreciate your kind review of our team!

name: Haley Beard
text: Dr. Perryman is amazing!!! I had a wonderful experience and every staff member went out of their way to make me feel comfortable. Very friendly crew with a great and clean atmosphere. Highly recommend!

resp.text: We love Dr. Perryman too! We are so glad you found our office to be clean and inviting. We appreciate your review!

name: Cindy Boutwell
text: Dr. Dunn is thorough, friendly & professional. The staff are always friendly & helpful. I highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks for your kind review of Dr. Dunn and his team Cindy!

name: Kesa Morrow
text: I had to come to this clinic due to a work injury. It was the best experience I ever had at a doctor office. The staff there was amazing even though I was in pain they made me so comfortable and safe. Then when Dr. Hamlin came in his humble spirit calmed me even more. I Would recommend this clinic to everyone that needs an eye doctor

resp.text: Kesa, We know that an eye injury can be painful and scary. We were so glad our team put you at ease and made your visit as pain-free as possible!

name: Amber Johanson
text: The sweetest people ever!!! So helpful ESPECIALLY choosing glasses. The girl who helped me took so much time to carefully pick out more than 10 pairs of glasses for me to try on that she thought would be cute on me. So sweet and professional!

resp.text: We LOVE helping select the PERFECT frame! We have so many good designers to choose from and I am glad our opticians found the right one for you. Thanks for your review Amber!

name: James Hollingsworth
text: Wonderful experience from start to finish.  Started with Emily who was very friendly and professional. Saw Dr. Hamlin who was very upbeat and informative, he took great care in my exam.  Last I saw Jeremy to look at frames and let me tell you, he knows what he is doing! Tell him what you are looking for and he finds you the perfect frames! Thank you again Family Eye Care!

resp.text: James, it sounds like Dr. Hamlin and his team took great care of you! We appreciate your review!

name: Emily Snyder
text: I have been using Family Eye Center for about 10 years now. The staff is always so helpful and friendly. I have had Dr. Dunn as my doctor. Also, I have recently had Cheyenne and she was so helpful and professional. She knew what needed to be done and was very informative with the procedures she was doing. I would definitely recommend Family Eye Center and their staff.

name: Donna Morgan
text: Everyone was very friendly and helpful. I feel like I got excellent care at my appointment. Would highly recommend.

name: Greg Mayo
text: The staff were wonderful. Erin was awesome and very patient. The atmosphere welcomes you as soon as you enter the office!  Along with the friendly and professional staff!  We drive two hours to get our eye care here because of the fantastic service provided.

resp.text: Wow Greg! We are so glad you consider us worth the drive - that is truly a compliment! We appreciate you choosing us. We love Erin, she is always so upbeat and knows her stuff!

name: Vik Lanley
text: My first visit today and it was great! My tech was Cheyenne and she was wonderful. She was super helpful and nice.  I saw Dr Perryman and she was great too! There was some confusion with my insurance (not their fault) and they were so patient with me trying to figure it all out! I highly recommend!

resp.text: We are so glad you had a great experience with Dr. Perryman and her team! Insurance can be confusing so we are happy we were able to help you navigate! Thanks for the review.

name: VisiblyStaggered
text: Cheyenne is amazing! I brought my 4YO to my appointment, and Cheyenne made sure she was included every step of the way. She even got to “help” with a test or two (by pushing a button 😁). The staff definitely left an impression on her, and gave me excellent care per usual. No long wait; in and out in a reasonable amount of time. Highly recommend!

name: Marlon Murrell
text: Dr Hamlin and staff exemplified excellent and compassionate care! They gave me so much encouragement for my chronic dry eye issue. I have so much hope for relief and hope to regain healthy eyes. I am so blessed to be a patient of this wonderful practice.

name: Sivvianne D
text: Everyone was just incredibly sweet and kind. Added bonus was that Dr Perryman understood about TMI & was very informative. Just an all around great group of friendly professionals!

name: Keri F. Richburg
text: Dr. Moring is friendly and informative! Bailey was able to explain all preliminary procedures which set my mind at ease. If you want to enjoy a doctor visit, choose Family Eye and Laser.

name: HealingTouch Chhoun
text: I loved that service from Becca and Betty as soon as I walked in. They made sure to address my needs very professional. I also really like the show room. Very clear and easy to find what I was looking for. Big thanks to Jeremy for his patients in helping me make my selection.

resp.text: It sounds like our team took great care of you! Thanks for choosing Family Eye and Laser!

name: Kamden Reese
text: I would highly recommend Troy Family Eye & Laser! They were really nice! Tech. Cheyenne was awesome and very  patient and calm and told me every step we were moving to . Dr. Hamlin is very patient and makes good conversation also he was enthusiastic . Also they had a very wide variety of glasses . Overall Dr . Hamlin and tech Cheyenne and staff were amazing .

resp.text: Thanks for your recent visit Reese! Dr. Hamlin is incredible with patients and we are so blessed to have Cheyenne on our team as well. We are glad you were pleased with your experience and the selection of frames!

name: Jason Oswald
text: Excellent experience at Family Eye Center.  Rebekah did a great job running some tests, Dr. H is my guy, got my vision sharpened up.  At to top it off Tammy fixed my current frames and got me some news lens ordered in like 5 mins.  Checked out and on my way!   Thank you all for all you do taking care of me and my family!

name: Eddy Pennington
text: I went for some tests and was greeted as I entered the waiting room. Had a short wait and the tests didn’t take long. Very positive experience, as always.

name: Cindy Sanders
text: I have been seeing Dr Hamlin for over 10 years. All my family uses him. I will not see anyone else. Family Eye Center is amazing. You go in see the Dr. See the ladies who let you pick out your glasses. They make your glasses fit right and you are out! Friendly, they treat you like family as well!! This is not just quality but a family experience.

resp.text: WOW Cindy, we really appreciate you what you have to say about our office and Dr. Hamlin and his team. We always want our patients to be happy with their glasses and their selections and we see patients as family!

name: Shondra Warren
text: This is my second visit at Family Eye & Laser, The staff is so nuce but I want to especially thank Mikaela the Tech who made me feel so comfortable, we laughed and talked. He was so relaxing to have a friendly face to make your afternoon after a long hard day. I recommend  Family Eye and Laser to everyone and ask for Mikaela she's the best.

resp.text: Mikaela is the best - we love having her as a part of our team and are so glad that she made your appointment a great one. Thanks for reviewing our team Shondra!

name: Kelly Strickland
text: Wonderful experience for my family today! I would recommend them to anyone!!!

name: Jason Strickland
text: Top notch service

name: Doug Branson
text: What an awesome experience today at Family Eye & Laser. Dr Moring allowed me to give input as to what I want and expect from my contact lenses. After hearing my input she gave options for the type of contacts I use. After my eye exam Hailey B. displayed a lot of knowledge and patience with my eye glasses selection. They have such a vast selection of eye wear that I leaned on her expertise to help make the proper selection. No better Doctor, staff and facility in this area.

resp.text: We always love having you in our office Doug - you keep our staff laughing. We are so glad Dr. Moring and her team were attentive to you contact lens and eyewear needs. One thing you can trust about the ladies in our office, they always have an opinion on what a man should be wearing :)!

name: Gina Andrews
text: Family Eye is always there to help with all your eye care needs. The Troy office is fantastic from small eye issue to large scary issue. All the techs are well trained and very knowledgeable about your needs. Dr. Moring is always very patient with my difficult contact fittings and Dr. Hamlin is great with my husband. He is always very thorough to see if his diabetes is affecting his eyes. They have a doctor for all your needs. Courtney Thompson and Ashley Floyd will be glad to answer any questions or direct you to get the answers you need.

resp.text: We appreciate your stellar review of doctors and staff!

name: Wennica Foster
text: I had a great experience there. All of them were very nice and helpful. Dr. Perryman really did make me feel like family. I would recommend them to anyone!!!

resp.text: Wennica, we see patients as family and are so glad you felt this way! Thanks for your review!

name: LAFONDA EUTSEY
text: They are very Beautiful people... Everyone was very nice.. Made sure you are comfortable..  And there were Smiles for miles.. 5 Stars all the way!!

name: Andi Jacobs
text: I took my 4 year old for her first visit and she made some new friends! I would trust any doctor in this practice with her, but I think she has found her favorite! She loved Dr. Perryman and has been talking about her ever since. Bellia was the BEST getting her worked up and testing her. Tara was wonderful checking us in and out. Hailey was so sweet and patient helping her pick out her new pink glasses. They all went out of their way to calm her nerves, make her laugh and make her feel comfortable. They are so appreciated!

resp.text: Andi, We loved having you and your daughter back in our office recently! She looks adorable in her new glasses!

name: Debra H
text: My dad went to see Dr. Gannon before his cataract surgery today. Everyone was super nice. We use Dr. Dunn and have for many years, he's an amazing eye Dr. I suggest anyone in need of an eye Dr to use Family Eye, if you need surgery I recommend Dr. Gannon.

resp.text: We had been so thrilled to have Dr. Gannon join our team and we are pleased that your dad had such a great experience during his cataract surgery. We are so glad we can offer Dr. Gannon's surgical services here in Troy!

name: Carrie Jaxon
text: Everyone we’ve encountered at Family Eye &Laser has been very professional and helpful. They are wonderful with my 3 year old! Dr. Moring has really been an excellent doctor. Highly recommend!

name: Yvonne Adair
text: It felt like I was in very good hands.

name: Esther Faulkner
text: Wonderful experience. I was sent to get an early eye exam by my primary care doctor because I was having severe migraines. We were able to get to the bottom of the issue quickly.

resp.text: Migraines are terrible! So glad our team could help! Thanks for the review Esther!

name: Brandon Senn
text: My visit with Dr. Hamlin and tech Bailey was awesome. Both were very professional and kind. I would recommend this location for eye care to anyone.

name: Sheri Brooks
text:
They are always so kind to me. I was going to the ones for the VA for a while and I forgot what it felt like to have medical professionals treat you like a human being. I’m also a big introvert with an anxiety disorder, but I’ve never felt overwhelmed there. They treat you like family. I cannot remember the name of the young lady that was in the exam room with me, but I appreciate her for putting up with my truly random convo topics!
I would rather pay out-of-pocket to see Dr. Hamlin and his staff than get the services from the VA for free!

resp.text: Wow Sheri! That is high praise. We agree, Dr. Hamlin has such a way of putting his patients at ease. We see patients as family and so glad you chose our office!

name: KAREN ANDERSON
text: The staff is so welcoming and friendly! Dr. Perryman was great and Mikaela, Cheyenne, and Paige were so nice! Tammy helped me pick out the perfect pair of glasses and a pair of sunglasses and Kathy was able to fit me right in on the schedule!

resp.text: Sounds like our whole team took excellent care of you Sandra from the front desk to the optician! We are so glad you chose our office Karen! Thanks for the great review!

name: Dick Hassett
text: Paid over $300.00 for a and eye exam and on pair of glasses that is going to take 2 weeks before their ready. Entirely too expensive. Better off going to wal mart

resp.text: Jar, I am sorry that you are unsatisfied. It sounds like your glasses were filed on your visions savings plan. When we courteously file your vision savings plan for you, then most of the time your vision savings plan require us to use a specific lab of their determination to make your glasses. This requires us to mail off your frame, wait for it to return and we receive it, we re-verify the measurements to ensure it is right for you. You are right, this process can often take two weeks. We get as frustrated as you do when we have to wait, especially knowing that we can often make your glasses in our lab in less than 24 hours.

name: Sarah Gambles
text: Best eye center in town! Everyone is super friendly and knowledgeable. They offer innovative diagnostic and treatment options as well as a great selection of designer and affordable frames. Low wait time and staff that feels like family. I’ll never go anywhere else!

name: Jasmine Austin
text: Love them so helpful and ALWAYS professional.

name: Lakisha Johnson
text: I thoroughly enjoyed my experience at Family Eye and Laser Center. Chastity, my technician, was very caring, genuine and concerned. From the moment you walk in and meet a smiling face such as Tara you KNOW you’re in the RIGHT place...I recommend Family Eye and Laser Center ANYDAY!!! Mikaela and Dr. Moring are also extremely helpful!!!

name: Shemekia Mcclure
text: Professional staff. Dr. Hamlin is super nice and patient!

name: Tawana Lowery
text: Great service with and the staff members were very friendly and kind. Chasity D is extremely phenomenal in providing exceptional service to the patients.

name: Wade Godbold
text: Family eye care has been my place to go for contacts for many years. The recently updated office is nice. My last visit I had  Cheyenne as my tech.  She was very knowledgeable and very helpful.

resp.text: We are loving our newly renovated office Wade and we glad you did too! Cheyenne does an incredible job and we appreciate your review!

name: Beverly Nickson
text: On July 1st was my very first time going to the eye doctor in years!!  When I first walked in Mrs Betty was so sweet and professional we even had a 5 min conversation lol. When it was time for me to go back Mrs Becca Hunt was so sweet, professional and she answered all my questions.She  made me feel comfortable until Dr came in.I would recommend everyone to come here. Dr Dunn is Great!!

resp.text: Beverly, we are so glad you felt at home in our office. We see patients as family and always want you to feel like you our spending time with a friend. Thank you so much for taking the time to tell others about our practice.

name: Mary Louise Martin
text: My visit was good as usual I enjoy having this office for my eyes I am very well pleased. If someone could let me know how long I'm going to keep having these halo's after my eyes were dilated

resp.text: That is great to hear Mary! Dilation usually only last 4 - 6 hours so if you are still having problems make sure to give the office a call!

name: Beth Tothero
text: My first visit and it was fantastic.  The staff was wonderful and made the whole experience a pleasure.  Will be back when needed.

name: Noah Pettis
text: Family Eye & Laser is by far the best place for an eye exam. Dr. Dunn and Bailey were both very helpful!

name: Lance Steward
text: Best time I've had doing a eye exam.  Marcia made me very comfortable and treated me like family.  She explained everything she was doing and made me less nervous.  Would diffidently recommend.

resp.text: So great you felt like your eye exam was THE BEST! Thanks for your review Lance!

name: Shauna Sanders
text: Old and new staff are very polite and nice. I enjoyed seeing old friends that are just like family!

name: Jasmine Austin
text: Love them so helpful and ALWAYS professional.

name: Beth Tothero
text: My first visit and it was fantastic.  The staff was wonderful and made the whole experience a pleasure.  Will be back when needed.

name: Jameka Caffie
text: I always have a great experience when I come here. Dr. Hamlin is so pleasant and informative. Love Tammy too. Overall, this is a great place for eye care needs.

resp.text: Jameka, we are so glad you had a pleasant experience at our Troy office. Dr. Hamlin and his team are great!

name: Amber Carnley
text: As always, Dr. Hamlin and his team provided exceptional service. Dr. Hamlin, Bellia, Anna, Morgan, and Lea made my visit comfortable, efficient, and productive. :)

name: Skyela Cedotal
text: Probably the best eye care experience I have ever had anywhere!! From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with hellos and smiles!! The technician Paige B. was just so sweet and understanding! Dr. Hamlin was absolutely amazing and you can tell he loves what he does. He explained everything to me and even told me things I didn't even know!! And the optician, Monica, was also very sweet and helpful!! Definitely should have seen them sooner!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review us!  We're excited to pass on such high praises to Paige B, Dr. Hamlin, and Monica!!

name: Anastasia
text: I absolutely love Family Eye Center! My family has been going there for a few years now. Dr. Morning is always so kind and personable! I saw Cheyenne, Mikaela, and Paige too and all of them treat people like family! I definitely recommend them to everyone!

resp.text: Anastasia, we see patients as family and we are so glad you felt at home!

name: Us Beelers
text:
Professional staff, exceptional service and an aesthetically delightful office that makes an appointment pleasurable.
From the moment you walk in the door and are greeted by Tara, to the very end when you see Tammy for glasses it is just a smooth and efficient office. Paige was personable and professional, Torrie and Lea were also very competent, and of course Dr. Hamlin is the best! Thanx to all!

resp.text: Us, we are so glad you love our newly renovated office and we are glad you had a pleasant experience in our office - thank you for your kind review!

name: Mike Thompson
text: Wonderfull Staff from Tara at Check In, Anna & Bellia doing my Testing, Dr. Dunn thoroughly doing my eye exam and making me feel Comfortable through the process, Tammy helping me pick out Glasses and the proper fit to Lea at Check Out. Great Experience.

name: Carla B
text:
Dr Dunn and Cheyenne was great. Whole staff amazing. Definitely recommend this office. Great experience.

Every time I go. They treat me well. Katie was good too.

name: Hayden Youngblood
text: I love Dr. Dunn and the staff at Family Eye & Laser Center. They are so sweet and knowledgeable!

name: Steve Shanks
text: Had a great experience.  Was very impressed with Jeremiah in Optical who helped me not only with my glass but with my insurance.  Very knowledgeable and friendly.  Will defiantly return and recommend.

resp.text: Steve - we are so glad to hear that Jeremy impressed you -  we know how difficult it can be to navigate insurance and so glad he was about to help.

name: Courtney Taylor
text: Family Eye Center is always great. I am a college student and live away from home and when I need eye care, I am sure to go to them. Also, I went for a check up yesterday and Cheyenne was amazing. So sweet and very good at her job!

name: Joan Price
text: Makala was very pleasant to be around. She was patient with me and answered all of my questions. I rate her performance a big 10!

resp.text: SO GLAD! Mikaela is such an asset to our team - thanks for giving her a shout out!

name: Shannon Grantham
text: Chasity was the best. She made my 1st appointment here so much more relaxing and plus a little entertaining!!!!

name: halee dix
text: Had an awesome experience. I haven’t been in years. The office was so nice with the new upgrades and so clean!! Dr Hamlin was great  and Cheyanne was very sweet and spent the time to explain everything to me and was very knowledgable about everything.

resp.text: Welcome back Halee! We are LOVING our newly renovated office and so glad you found it pleasing. Thanks for the review of our team!

name: Jessica Benoskie
text: Chasity was THE BEST. She made everything easily understandable and respected that I was on a strict time schedule, which was amazing. She was prompt, professional and friendly! Congrats on Graduation Chasity!

resp.text: She is the BEST and we are so glad you enjoyed your time with her! Thanks for the review Jessica!

name: BRANDY HORSTMAN
text: Dr. Hamlin, Cheyenne, and Lea were awesome!! First time visit and it was a great one.

name: Maria Duncan
text: This was my first visit at Family Eye & Laser.The Staff was so nice but I would like to especially thank  Chasity D.the tech who made me feel so comfortable she was so helpful and kind.I saw Dr.Hamlin and he was Great too! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

resp.text: WOW Maria! We are so glad that Chasity and Dr. Hamlin made such a great first impression. We really appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your recent visit.

name: Latifa Anderson
text: Really enjoyed my experience at Family Eye Center yesterday! The staff was so kind to me and the cookies and coffee were definitely a plus! Mikaela got me ready to see the doctor and she was really informative of every test she was performing on me and Dr. Moring was great! They have a great variety of frames to chose from also!

resp.text: Cookies and coffee never hurt anyone! ;) We are so glad you chose our office!

name: Joanna JL
text: I’ve been a patient of Dr Hamlin’s for over 22 years. That speaks for itself. Cheyanne is amazing as always. I’ve never had anything but wonderful experiences over the years. You can’t go wrong choosing them for your total Family Eye & Laser needs. (You never know when a bug will fly in your eye or cut off your corneas with random Mascara mishaps-my luck)

name: Sid Griswold
text: Over the weekend i almost became Ray Charles in 1 eye due to a limb striking my eye & ripping my cornea. 😂THANKFULLY. K.D was able to get me in ASAP, once I was there it was smooth sailing. Marcia made sure I was as comfortable as possible which I gotta say was probably not the easiest thing to do, so Kudos to her! Shortly after Dr. Hamlin Assessed the situation, explained everything thoroughly & prescribed drops & a bandage. The following days Dr. Perryman was able to get my vision back to 20/20 allowing me to see the light again & to be able to see all the low hanging limbs next time.  WAR EAGLE.

resp.text: Sid...love your rendition of your eye injury. I am so glad our team was able to get you back to 20/20!

name: Mary Hoppenbrouwer Lindsey
text:
It was a great experience. Dr. Dunn and all the staff were very patient and I liked the way everything was explained to me. I had a little concern about having my eyes dilated due to a bad reaction in the past, but Dr Dunn had his staff call where I had my eyes dilated in the past so he could order a different type drop. I had no problem from the drop except my eyes were still slightly dilated after 36 hours, but seem to be almost back to normal now. I don't believe I have such a thorough exam in my l life. I still have 2 more to go although I may go in tomorrow to be fitted for my glasses so they might be ready when I go for the tests.
I give a big thumbs up and thank everyone I came in contact with at Family Eye Center.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review us, Mrs. Mary! Our opticians look forward to SEEing you soon, and we're certainly glad we were able to accommodate your special eyes :)

text: Chasity was extremely nice and so helpful!

name: Shakira Jones
text: I have only been a patient at Family Eye Center for a few years now but out of all of my previous eye doctors, Family Eye Center tops them all. All the staff is extremely friendly and informative. Dr. Moring is my optometrist and she is absolutely amazing. She makes sure i am as comfortable as possible and does her absolute best to assess every issue i can possibly throw at her regarding my eyes, haha. My technician Cassidy is just as amazing as well. She made my initial work-up as fun an easy as possible. unlike other people who just look at you like you are stupid when you tell them any and wont even crack a smile. Cassidy kept my laughing the entire time. i am also super appreciative of Cassidy for finding the answer to a question i asked that she did not initially know the answer to. Family Eye Center is a great experience from the minute you walk in the door. i would HIGHLY recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: We were so glad to have you in our office again Shakira! Cassidy IS incredible. She is a new addition to our office but has worked in eye care previously and we a thrilled to have to her. We are glad to hear that she made your exam and enjoyable one!

name: C. Herring
text:
Enterprise Optical located in Enterprise, Al is once again above compliment! I have written a previous review concerning the immense amount of professionalism and care that the doctors and personnel provide; but once again, they have exceeded my expectations of their care. From the minute you walk into the door, you notice the constant upgrades that the facility is experiencing due to them becoming a part of Family Eye Care. This demonstrates that they wish to be on the leading edge of optical care with new equipment and a welcoming patient waiting area. I was welcomed by Cindy and Paige at the reception desk with a pleasant smile and greeting (unlike some medical practices that basically show that you are bothering them by requesting assistance); you will not see this here!
The wait time was incredibly short and I was escorted back to the back with questions of my day and further concerns of my wellbeing. Once I was in the examination room, I was greeted by Melissa and Dr. Mary-Kate Moring. They both intently listened to my eye concerns and took attentive time ensuring that my eyes were examined and explained any problems or developments with by contacts and vision. I didn’t feel a bit like I was rushed out of the office by “writing off” any questions or concerns; this gave me confidence once again that they really do care.
After my exam, Melissa took as much time AS I NEEDED to ensure that I fully understood how to place and remove my contacts, as well as care of them. They also supplied any contact lens products that would assist me while I was getting used to the care and wear of them. While talking to Melissa, I told her that I recommended them to a family that needed eye care, but they probably could not afford eye care. She informed me that they work with the needs of many families when it comes to eye care, and they fully understand the hesitation of families to seek eye care due to finical needs. She continued to tell many that they have many eye care packages to assist those families in need of eye care; when comes to vision, cost should not be a factor. Again, this demonstrates a deep concern for an individual’s eye care needs.
Once again, this visit amazed me! They really do care when it comes to my vision and eye care. It is ironic in the fact that they are becoming a part of Family Eye Care; each visit leads me to believe that not only do they care for me and my families’ eye care, but now I can say that they are now a part of my Family.

resp.text: We so appreciate you taking time to review us once again! We strive to provide the best patient care and are glad to hear that we are exceeding these expectations. Melissa and Dr. Moring look forward to seeing you next year-- we think you'll love the completed remodel!!

text: Very personable and thorough exam. However, she spends as much time needed with each patient to get it right.

text: My eye exam yesterday with Dr. Huynh was wonderful. For the past 10 years, I’ve never been able to wear contacts full time. I have dry eyes and contacts have always irritated them and been incredibly uncomfortable. She sat with me and examined my eyes thoroughly, and helped me find the perfect pair of contacts! I’m getting married this upcoming Saturday and I really didn’t want to wear my glasses as I walk down the isle. So I am thankful for her for essentially making my wedding day even better!

name: Faye Mitchell
text: After buying glasses from Jc penny they were the wrong  prescription I was first told you didn't buy the insurance after acting  stupid . They sent them back 3 times to get them right. One pair broke I offered to pay for the repair dum rep said we don't do that you have to buy a new pair I just said that I wanted to buy a new pair of frames. We don't just sale the frames . I called the  corporate office she said oh yes just go to the store. (Me) I did an your rep said y'all don't do that. They are untrained people DON'T go to jcpenny optical.

name: TM
text:
This optical is horrible. I waited for 45 minutes then left on my first visit. The second visit I picked glasses and the manager messed up and had to enter them into the system several times (it took over an hour). The third visit they had my glasses ready, but my frames were damaged, so they sent them off again. The fourth visit, I my frames were in store with no prescription lenses. The next visit I picked up my frames, but quickly realized the prescription in one eye was inaccurate.I took the glasses to my eye dr, and she examined the glasses and told me the prescription was not the one she had prescribed and was "way off". On the next visit to JCP optical, they refused to admit their mistake. I will NEVER go to this location again
I have also had a friend who had a similar experience. The manager (angela) at this location has no idea what she's doing. I've never received such horrible service with eyeware ever. I hope to spare anyone else this type of experience. Buying glasses should be a pleasant and exciting experience.

name: Linda Brown
text: Never buy glasses at Penneys Riverchase ,Hoover. 3 months, still no glasses. Sick and tired of the excuses !!!! Already paid for. Think it's time they pay me for the 3 months of waiting. Again, never go there, you'll be blind as a bat, before you get your glasses !!!!!

text: I went there yesterday to get some adjustments on my glasses only to find out they were permanently closed.

text: Will definitely recommend. Quick service ! I’ve been having vision problems for the last year and decided to finally get things checked out they explained everything to me as they went on with each test. The whole team were on point ! Nice and friendly and the lady who sold me my glasses was very nice loved her attitude. She helped me feel better about now wearing glasses. I officially joined the glasses gang woohoo !

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our team is some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: No Way
text: Wowee!! Dr. Kuo was very knowledgeable and thorough. She explained things during the eye exam that I'd never heard before. One important thing that I liked is that she used seperate lenses that she placed up to my eyes and asked me to distinguish the differences when I looked through them and when they were removed. Because those changes were not dramatically different, Dr. Kuo recommended my prescription not be changed. This was good news for me because I didn't need to get my eyes used to another stronger prescription. Dr. Kuo was outstanding and my experience with Lenscrafters today was awesome!! Omg I was a walk-in!

text: I’m not sure what all these other reviewers are talking about bc I had a great experience here. I tried to find glasses at my optometrist and the frames I liked were all just so expensive. I also tried to get frames through Warby Parker and just didn’t love any. I came here on a whim after feeling disappointed at my optometrist and found glasses within 30 minutes. We did have a bit of a wait to see someone and check out, but we came in RIGHT before close anyways. The guy who rang up my glasses found my insurance no problem. I brought my old glasses (like 8 years old old) and asked if he could replace one of the nosepieces and he ended up replacing them both since they were so old and discolored! It was so nice. The glasses were ready the next day also which is stupid fast.

Don't get me wrong, the brands and styles are very high quality. So, the prices are warranted, but I just don't want very expensive frames.

text: Great welcome. My son who has been diagnosed in autism spectrum felt very comfortable. Dr. Appel has a great spirit and all his staff including Adam answer all your questions without hesitation!

name: Bobby Eads
text: Dr. Appel continues to provide excellent vision care with professionalism, kindness and empathy. I highly recommend him!

name: Stephanie Brazier
text: Dr. Appel is very patient and explains everything step by step.  Very friendly and professional. Highly recommend him.

name: Ginger Clements
text: I had what could have been a serious situation and called Dr. Appel's office. I was told to come in right away. He assessed the situation thoroughly and assured me it was not as serious as I thought, but to keep monitoring and call again if I had any indication of trouble.  Just to be certain he also scheduled a follow-up so he, too, could monitor any changes. Dr. Appel has been there for our whole family for many years and I highly recommend him. His staff is caring and concerned and the atmosphere is warm and friendly.

name: Bruce Sides
text: Dr. Appel was great. Friendly but thorough in my eye exam. Will definitely be back to see him again!

name: Joshua King
text: My experience with Dr. Mark Appel could not have gone any better. He and his team are the most humble, friendly and intelligent optometry specialists I have been around in a long time. Dr. Appel has been doing this for years, and is one of the best in the business. Thanks, Dr. Appel!

name: Tangy Armstrong
text: Dr. Appel was kind and friendly however, I do not think he took the necessary time to get my perscription right. I did have on a old pair of contacts when I went in for my appointment and if he gaged that perscription as a starting point he was wrong. I had to call and make an appointment to go back and have him check my script. They gave a another trial pair for my right eye that was better but then my left eye was still blurry. I am still having problems seeing distance and up close espescially but I will not go back to Dr. Appel. I feel he should have gotten it correct especially on the second try.

Stopped in without an appointment due to my nose piece being broken suddenly. Not even a Pt. there, the young gentleman fixed my glasses within minutes and wouldn’t allow me to pay for the repair.

name: Brian T. Swords
text:
June 24th 2019: Called for a diabetic eye exam. I asked and was told I did not need money. Arrived, was examined and then taken into the eyeglass showroom, where I was told I needed $63. Explained. She said whomever told me that was wrong. I asked for my presciption (of which I did not originally request). She said they would mail it, after they received payment. Mailed the payment 7/3/19. Received a text message to schedule another appointment on 5/25/20 (more than 10 months later). Called CEC. Told them I was still trying to finalize our previous transaction. She said she would mail my prescription that day. Received the prescription on 6/15/20 (11 months after payment). ... Nope. Never again.

Credit due: Doc McKissick (spelling?) had a great attitude and performed professionally.

name: Tom Mclemore
text: Called with an issue with my eye and was seen promptly. Very professional and courteous staff and Dr. M. is first rate. Will definitely make this my personal optometrist.

name: C G
text: Great staff and eye doctors, very professional. We have gone here for 7 years now!
